key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>3 Pieces - Scarlet Rose Heart</font>
When using skills, you have a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to increase attack speed by <font color='#ff8ae5'>2%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>120</font> sec.
 This effect also applies to normal attacks.
 - This can only occur once every <font color='#ff8ae5'>180</font> sec.
<font color='#ff8ae5'>6 Pieces - Blooming Scarlet Rose</font>
Your hits grant a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to deal <font color='#ff8ae5'>240%</font> non-elemental damage. This can only trigger when Scarlet Rose Heart is active. Cannot strike the same target twice in <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> sec.

key.tooltipDescription: A piece of vintage fashion, a la the great and mighty $npcName:23090005$.
$npcName:11000187$ poured her all hopes and dreams into these earrings.
$npcName:11000366$ used to spend hours trying to get these on her pet kitty, $npcName:11000367$. They're yours now.
$npcName:11000502$ wears these earring in an attempt to calm his rebelliousness nature. The results are debatable.
$npcName:11000284$'s second most beloved treasure. The crystal shines brilliantly in the sun. She would be absolutely heartbroken to hear it was dismantled or sold.
From Empress $npcName:11000075$ to you, for accomplishing something special for Maple World.
Turtle earrings. Supposedly, anyone who wears these will live forever.
This simple-looking clock can actually capture a moment of time and hold it forever. Only those who've been professionally trained can activate this mechanism.
These earrings symbolize $npcName:11000075$'s faith in you.
Contains the memories Masharr saw in the orb of prophecy. Sift through them carefully, and you might find a clue that'll forever change the world.

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>3 Pieces - Scarlet Rose Heart</font>
When using skills, you have a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to increase attack speed by <font color='#ff8ae5'>2%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>120</font> sec.
 This effect also applies to normal attacks.
 - This can only occur once every <font color='#ff8ae5'>180</font> sec.
<font color='#ff8ae5'>6 Pieces - Blooming Scarlet Rose</font>
Your hits grant a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to deal <font color='#ff8ae5'>240%</font> non-elemental damage. This can only trigger when Scarlet Rose Heart is active. Cannot strike the same target twice in <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> sec.

<font color='#ff8ae5'>3 Pieces - Scarlet Rose Heart</font>
When using skills, you have a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to increase attack speed by <font color='#ff8ae5'>2%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>120</font> sec.
 This effect also applies to normal attacks.
 - This can only occur once every <font color='#ff8ae5'>180</font> sec.
<font color='#ff8ae5'>6 Pieces - Blooming Scarlet Rose</font>
Your hits grant a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to deal <font color='#ff8ae5'>240%</font> non-elemental damage. This can only trigger when Scarlet Rose Heart is active. Cannot strike the same target twice in <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> sec.

key.tooltipDescription: The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating this armor for Knights competing in the arena. It's made from a light, durable material that keeps you protected yet light on your feet.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating this armor for Archers competing in the arena. The material is lightweight, allowing the wearer to stay nimble enough to evade attacks.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating this armor for Thieves competing in the arena. The material is lightweight, allowing the wearer to stay nimble enough to evade attacks.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating this armor for Warriors competing in the arena. It has a special coating that helps the wearer withstand attacks for longer periods of time.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating this armor for Rogues competing in the arena. It has a special coating that helps the wearer withstand attacks for longer periods of time.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating this armor for Berserkers competing in the arena. It's made of a tough, resilient material that helps the wearer endure all sorts of damage.
The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating this armor for Heavy Gunners competing in the arena. Its thickness allows it to repel ranged attacks.
The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating this armor for Assassins competing in the arena. It's imbued with a special reagent that helps the wearer resist magic attacks.

key.tooltipDescription: The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these pants for Knights competing in the arena. They're made from a light, durable material that keeps you protected yet light on your feet.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these pants for Archers competing in the arena. The material is lightweight, allowing the wearer to stay nimble enough to evade attacks.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these pants for Thieves competing in the arena. The material is lightweight, allowing the wearer to stay nimble enough to evade attacks.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these pants for Warriors competing in the arena. They have a special coating that helps the wearer withstand attacks for longer periods of time.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these pants for Rogues competing in the arena. They have a special coating that helps the wearer withstand attacks for longer periods of time.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these pants for Berserkers competing in the arena. They're made of tough, resilient material that helps the wearer endure all sorts of damage.
The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these pants for Heavy Gunners competing in the arena. Their thickness allows them to repel ranged attacks.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these pants for Assassins competing in the arena. They're imbued with a special reagent that helps the wearer resist magic attacks.

key.tooltipDescription: The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these gloves for Knights competing in the arena. They're made from a light, durable material that keeps you protected yet light on your feet.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these gloves for Wizards competing in the arena. They're imbued with a special reagent that helps the wearer resist magic attacks.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these gloves for Archers competing in the arena. The material is lightweight, allowing the wearer to stay nimble enough to evade attacks.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these gloves for Thieves competing in the arena. The material is lightweight, allowing the wearer to stay nimble enough to evade attacks.

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>3 Pieces - Scarlet Rose Heart</font>
When using skills, you have a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to increase attack speed by <font color='#ff8ae5'>2%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>120</font> sec.
 This effect also applies to normal attacks.
 - This can only occur once every <font color='#ff8ae5'>180</font> sec.
<font color='#ff8ae5'>6 Pieces - Blooming Scarlet Rose</font>
Your hits grant a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to deal <font color='#ff8ae5'>240%</font> non-elemental damage. This can only trigger when Scarlet Rose Heart is active. Cannot strike the same target twice in <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> sec.

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>3 Pieces - Scarlet Rose Heart</font>
When using skills, you have a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to increase attack speed by <font color='#ff8ae5'>2%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>120</font> sec.
 This effect also applies to normal attacks.
 - This can only occur once every <font color='#ff8ae5'>180</font> sec.
<font color='#ff8ae5'>6 Pieces - Blooming Scarlet Rose</font>
Your hits grant a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to deal <font color='#ff8ae5'>240%</font> non-elemental damage. This can only trigger when Scarlet Rose Heart is active. Cannot strike the same target twice in <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> sec.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these boots for Wizards competing in the arena. They're imbued with a special reagent that helps the wearer resist magic attacks.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these boots for Archers competing in the arena. The material is lightweight, allowing the wearer to stay nimble enough to evade attacks.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these boots for Thieves competing in the arena. The material is lightweight, allowing the wearer to stay nimble enough to evade attacks.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these boots for Warriors competing in the arena. They have a special coating that helps the wearer withstand attacks for longer periods of time.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these boots for Mages competing in the arena. They have a special coating that helps the wearer withstand attacks for longer periods of time.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these boots for Rangers competing in the arena. They have a special coating that helps the wearer withstand attacks for longer periods of time.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these boots for Rogues competing in the arena. They have a special coating that helps the wearer withstand attacks for longer periods of time.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these boots for Berserkers competing in the arena. They're made of tough, resilient material that helps the wearer endure all sorts of damage.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these boots for Priests competing in the arena. They're made of tough, resilient material that helps the wearer endure all sorts of damage.
The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these boots for Heavy Gunners competing in the arena. Their thickness allows them to repel ranged attacks.

The legendary blacksmith Roman worked his fingers to the bone creating these boots for Assassins competing in the arena. They're imbued with a special reagent that helps the wearer resist magic attacks.

key.guideDescription: \n<font color='#7A7A7A'>This item once belonged to an ancient warrior tribe that entered the Land of Darkness in search of conquest and glory during the War of Light and Darkness. key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>3 Pieces - Scarlet Rose Heart</font>
When using skills, you have a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to increase attack speed by <font color='#ff8ae5'>2%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>120</font> sec.
 This effect also applies to normal attacks.
 - This can only occur once every <font color='#ff8ae5'>180</font> sec.
<font color='#ff8ae5'>6 Pieces - Blooming Scarlet Rose</font>
Your hits grant a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to deal <font color='#ff8ae5'>240%</font> non-elemental damage. This can only trigger when Scarlet Rose Heart is active. Cannot strike the same target twice in <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> sec.

key.tooltipDescription: Dr. Kartronic's first propeller prototype, used by $npcName:23000054$. This prototype emphasized safety over performance, utilizing cooling technology that prevents the system from overheating.
One of Dr. Kartronic's later propeller versions, used by $npcName:23000055$. This version pursued maximum performance, and has low durability due to excessive heat.
MK 52 Omega's propeller. An iteration on the design of Alpha and Beta's propellers, it uses gas compression to increase both performance and efficiency.
Perhaps these wings will let you fly like $npcName:23000019$.
This is the source of $npcName:23000020$'s stormy power.
This was once the wing of $npcName:23000021$. Beyond that, it is a mystery.
A cape given to new members of the Wall Climbers.

These wings absorbed a portion of $npcName:23090005$'s power when he was injured. It is advised you only use this in well-lit places, as people will probably throw stones if they mistake you for $npcName:23090005$.
This cape commemorates the growth of the Barrota Trading Company from a tiny caravan to a major economic power. The inside is embroidered with the words, "Our feet are faster than your wings."
This cape is woven from specially treated spider silk. Bugs have a nasty habit of getting stuck to it, so avoid wearing it in $map:02000023$.
A breathtaking work of art, handcrafted using only the veins of fallen leaves.
A gift given to $npcName:11000595$ by $npcName:11000677$ long ago.
This rare cape is imbued with $npcName:11000031$'s holy power.
A traditional Pigming cape given to you in thanks. The feathers are said to have the purifying properties.
$npcName:11001097$ labored long and hard to develop this cape for the modern adventurer. It's as practical as it is environmentally friendly.
A cape in honor of your first steps as a hero of Maple World.
This gear was forged for heroes who put their honor on the line and competed with their all!
A cape shaped like a mooncake.
key.guideDescription: Wear it alongside $item:12100081$ to increase your movement speed.

key.tooltipDescription: A necklace commemorating the union of soul mates $npcName:11000064$ and $npcName:11000222$.
$npcName:11000424$ stitched this by hand.
This flashy necklace bears the mark of the T'oomba.
This is $npcName:11000283$'s lucky charm.
It's steeped in the power of $npcName:23000021$'s people. $npcName:23000019$ favors its beautiful design.
It's steeped in the power of $npcName:23000021$'s people. It isn't as elegant as $npcName:23000019$'s, but the magic within is much more potent.
$npcName:11000402$ purchased this charm from $npcName:11000283$ for an obscene amount of money.
A cherished heirloom that $npcName:11000187$ received on her wedding day. The decades have left their mark on it.
$npcName:11000376$ says he got this from an alien. There's no evidence of this, or even that aliens exist, but he can't be convinced otherwise.
A token of thanks from $npcName:11000910$. It's considered a true mark of honor.
A necklace brimming with the spirit of Corona Lake.
A gift $npcName:11000075$ gave to $npcName:11000058$ when they were young.
A necklace $npcName:11000178$ made while waiting for $npcName:11000492$. You can feel the love and care that was put into the craftsmanship.
An engraving reads, "May luck be with you."

key.guideDescription: Shining Force increases physical/magic resistance by 90 and bonus attack by 144 for 15 sec. Can only occur once every 45 sec. All 3 items in the Excellent Diamond set must be equipped. The effect can't be triggered in battlegrounds or arenas.

key.tooltipDescription: This gear was forged for heroes who put their honor on the line and competed with their all!
A precious pendant of the Shuabritze family.
key.guideDescription: Kindred Strength increases weapon attack by 2.6%, bonus attack by 115, and piercing by 2.4% for 15 sec. Can only be occur once every 45 sec. All 3 items in the Shuabritze Family set must be equipped. The effect can't be triggered in battlegrounds or arenas.

Potent Precision increases accuracy by 6 and critical rate by 60 for 15 sec. Can only occur once every 45 sec. All 3 items in the Excellent Onyx set must be equipped. The effect can't be triggered in battlegrounds or arenas.

key.tooltipDescription: A necklace that holds the song of the sirens. Long ago, the sirens sang with all their hearts to sailors passing by their islands. Apparently the singing was so terrible that it threw the sailors into a frenzied rage.
$npcName:11000178$ made this ring to celebrate $npcName:11000492$'s birth. $npcName:11000492$'s name is inscribed on the inside.
A ring cast aside by ex-lovers.
Could a creature like $npcName:23000099$ really have experienced true love? For whom did $npcName:23000099$ intend this ring?
Imbued with the stone giant of Vayar, who defended the mountains to the bitter end.
$npcName:11000421$ found this coral ring while swimming through the depths.
This cheaply-made ring is cherished by members of Humblis. It represents loyalty and honor.
A charming ring used by a clock rabbit to lure Marr and his younger sister.
Whoever wears this ring shall be granted the ability to transform after uttering the magic words, "abra cadabra."
One of $npcName:11000304$'s most cherished rings. Although it doesn't match her style, it's adorned with an ever-blooming flower.
The Andrea family sigil. The care put into the engraving stands testament to the influence this family once had.
This ring brings light to $npcName:11001058$'s soul. In the hands of a true master, this light will never fade.

key.guideDescription: Potent Precision increases accuracy by 6 and critical rate by 60 for 15 sec. Can only occur once every 45 sec. All 3 items in the Excellent Onyx set must be equipped. The effect can't be triggered in battlegrounds or arenas.

key.tooltipDescription: A gift from the Moropapa to an honored guest. Inscribed with blessings for happiness and health.
This gear was forged for heroes who put their honor on the line and competed with their all!
A ring passed on to members of the Shuabritze family.
key.guideDescription: Kindred Strength increases weapon attack by 2.6%, bonus attack by 115, and piercing by 2.4% for 15 sec. Can only be occur once every 45 sec. All 3 items in the Shuabritze Family set must be equipped. The effect can't be triggered in battlegrounds or arenas.

Shining Force increases physical/magic resistance by 90 and bonus attack by 144 for 15 sec. Can only occur once every 45 sec. All 3 items in the Excellent Diamond set must be equipped. The effect can't be triggered in battlegrounds or arenas.

key.tooltipDescription: A ring containing Bjorn's sadness. Wearing it for too long may result in frostbite.
A tough leather belt. Standard issue for guardsmen.
A belt worn only by the Dark Wind elite.
Why was this on a giant tortoise? Can a tortoise even wear a belt?
Even though this has been buried at sea for a long time, it's spotless and untouched by rust. The color and design marks it as a noble's possession.
$npcName:11000420$ made this belt out of discarded fishing line. It was a slow day.
Part of the official battle uniform of the royal guards.
$npcName:11000044$ made this belt himself to suit his cutting-edge sense of fashion.
A belt favored by secret agents. Can be used in a weapon in a pinch.
The green beads on this belt represent House Vidrem. Made by the best craftsman in $map:02000001$.
The belt of $npcName:11000685$, protector of the Green Lapenta of Life. It brings the wearer dreams of everlasting life.
It is customary for the royal family to award a belt such as this to heroes who have made a mark on history.
This item is marks a promise of eternal friendship and trust between comrades who overcame great trials together.
This belt is perfect for someone making their first steps in Maple World.

Archmage Asimov of Ellinia presents belts like this to his favored students and guests. It is steeped in the power of a fragrant baum flower. Once this power fades, it is nothing but a simple grass belt, but it is still a mark of honor.

<font color='#ff8ae5'><Series-A Side Effect: Shadow Formation>
Physical and magic damage increase by <font color='#ff8ae5'>3%</font>, but attacks have a chance of increasing or reducing health by <font color='#ff8ae5'>10%</font> at random. (Disabled if health is <font color='#ff8ae5'>20%</font> or lower)

<Series-A Reaction: Pain Suppression>
Removes Kandura's Pendant's health reduction effect.

Disabled in battlegrounds and arenas.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nKandura was an apostate member of the Guidance and the leader of BeyondLink. Also known as the Shadow Hunter, he possessed the ability to command living shadows. The BeyondLink research staff sought to extract this power and turn it into a powerful magical artifact. Known as the Tris Project A series, they tested their creation in the form of a belt which inadvertently transformed the test subject into a mass of shadows. The researchers have attempted to cover up the results of their experiment, but the A series remains hidden somewhere, creating ever more ravenous shadows.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A belt with the inscription "The belt to beat all belts, for the belt, by the Belt." It's not clear whether these are the ravings of a mad man or a genius artist, but one thing is beyond doubt. Belton crafts a fine belt.

A belt awarded to the champion of Duel Square. Despite being an underground fighting ring, the large number of highly skilled fighters who compete make the championship title a great and highly-prized achievement. Championship belts are so highly valued on the black market that the only champion yet to sell theirs is Vasara Chen, the Square's 53rd champion.

Gear used by the first expedition of Knights to venture into the Land of Darkness in the War of Light and Darkness. Born from a partnership between expert blacksmiths and great mages, these powerful items were lost and forgotten when the Shadow Gate was sealed following the demise of the expedition team. Not only is this gear incredibly rare, it is also dangerous, as it may have been touched by either the light, or darkness.
A belt with a buckle shaped like a mooncake.
key.guideDescription: Wear it alongside $item:11800090$ to increase your movement speed.

key.tooltipDescription: Archmage Asimov of Ellinia presents belts like this to his favored students and guests. It is steeped in the power of a fragrant baum pollen. Once this power fades, it is nothing but a simple belt, but it is still a mark of honor.
A belt containing Erda's sadness. It drains the warmth from your body.

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>3 Pieces - Scarlet Rose Heart</font>
When using skills, you have a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to increase attack speed by <font color='#ff8ae5'>2%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>120</font> sec.
 This effect also applies to normal attacks.
 - This can only occur once every <font color='#ff8ae5'>180</font> sec.
<font color='#ff8ae5'>6 Pieces - Blooming Scarlet Rose</font>
Your hits grant a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to deal <font color='#ff8ae5'>240%</font> non-elemental damage. This can only trigger when Scarlet Rose Heart is active. Cannot strike the same target twice in <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> sec.

key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>A weapon infused with the fury of the Land of Darkness, where battle never ceases. Injects an explosive poison into your targets.</font>
Replaces the look of cannons when equipped, but not their projectiles.
Replaces the look of cannons when equipped, but not their projectiles.
Replaces the look of cannons when equipped, but not their projectiles.
Replaces the look of cannons when equipped, but not their projectiles.

key.tooltipDescription: If monsters are fire, then this is the extinguisher. At least, that's what you always tell Aisha.

key.guideDescription: Replaces the look of cannons when equipped, but not their projectiles.
Replaces the look of cannons when equipped, but not their projectiles.
Replaces the look of cannons when equipped, but not their projectiles.
Replaces the look of cannons when equipped, but not their projectiles.
Replaces the look of cannons when equipped, but not their projectiles.

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5'>Narubashan's Fury</font>\nUse Gatling Fire after <font color='#ff8ae5'>6</font> basic attacks to increase the attack speed of <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> allies within <font color='#ff8ae5'>6</font>Â m by <font color='#ff8ae5'>35%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>25</font> sec. This effect can only happen once every <font color='#ff8ae5'>5</font> minutes. In battlegrounds and arenas, weapon attack is reduced by half, and Narubashan's Fury will not trigger.
key.guideDescription: \n<font color='#7A7A7A'>The unfettered power of Narubashan emanates from this item.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: Standard issue equipment for Terrun Calibre trainees.
Gear custom made for Terrun Calibre initiates.
Klend, an artifact restoration specialist, personally excavated and restored this item.
A weapon favored by crooks who travel in and out of the Land of Darkness for their shady dealings.
Members of Dark Wind use weapons like this when it's time to defend the city.
A versatile weapon and one of the keys to Blackstar's ability to control the world of darkness. Also a handy solution to any problems or complications that Blackstar may face.
The guardians of Maple World use weapons like this to fight the Demon King.
The secret agents of the Maple Guardians are outfitted with these. They're made from materials only found in Taliskar.
Anyone below the rank of commander in the Royal Guard is forbidden from wielding a weapon such as this.
$npcName:11000604$ discovered this beneath the burning tree in Peronia Woods. It may be scorched, but it's still useful.
A potent life force flows from the green lapenta.
An absentminded warrior left this behind after taking a quick nap.
Outfitted with a device that senses and absorbs nearby latent energy. By optimizing its application of force, it becomes tremendously effective and frighteningly destructive.
Runeblade gear traded by the Barrota Trading Company.
This item was traded from one Alikar prisoner to another behind the prison guards' backs.
Gear given to Runeblades in Terrun Calibre who show superior skill in both magic and swordsmanship.
Stronger than Baz's steel.
Infused with Baz's silver wisdom.
Infused with Baz's golden wisdom.
Ishura discovered this relic of Baz in the Land of Darkness. It's filled with mysterious rune powers.

$item:030000450$, unsealed using powerful magic extracted from $item:030000437$. Just as $npcName:23090005$ drained the life from his victims, this item tries to steal the life force of whoever wields it. It's probably best to undo $npcName:23090005$'s curse before you use this.

<font color='#ff8ae5'>Raging Destruction</font>\nHas an <font color='#ff8ae5'>8%</font> chance to deal <font color='#ff8ae5'>360%</font> dark damage on hit. Can only trigger once every <font color='#ff8ae5'>8</font> sec. Inactive in battlegrounds and arenas.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>A weapon infused with the fury of the Land of Darkness, where battle never ceases. Detonates the power of darkness to instantly lead enemies to their graves.</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>Frenzy</font>
Chance on hit to increase attack speed by <font color='#ff8ae5'>20%</font>.

<font color='#ff8ae5'>Dark Succor</font>
In the Land of Darkness, chance on hit to restore <font color='#ff8ae5'>5%</font> health.

Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas.</font>
key.guideDescription: \n<font color='#7A7A7A'>This item once belonged to an ancient warrior tribe that entered the Land of Darkness in search of conquest and glory during the War of Light and Darkness. It is made of expertly crafted steel, and imbued with life energy by shamans of old. Although the warriors fell in battle, their equipment has lived on to protect generations of warriors.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A blade for combatants willing to test their limits in the scorching desert.
key.guideDescription: Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas.

key.tooltipDescription: When $item:15400064$ was thrown on the undying flame, $npcName:23090005$'s curse was undone and his power was bestowed upon this blade. The flames have only made it more potent.
The spirit of Narubashan flows through this ancient gear.

key.tooltipDescription: Runes were woven into the steel of this blade to make it conduct mana more easily. Terrun Calibre uses blades like this for much of their magic. Of course, it makes a passable sword, as well.

Knuckles generously provided to friends of the gray wolf. They are intended to be used for justice.

Replaces the look of knuckles when equipped.

key.tooltipDescription: These knuckles are lightweight and easy to use. This makes them useful for beginners, but more experienced fighters will want proper battle knuckles.

key.tooltipDescription: An orb made for heroes who fight without fear or hesitation.
key.guideDescription: Triggered effects inactive in battlegrounds and arenas.

key.tooltipDescription: This gear was forged for heroes who put their honor on the line and competed with their all!
This orb has been passed down through the generations. Its most recent wielder was Junta.

key.guideDescription: Replaces the look of orbs when equipped.
Replaces the look of orbs when equipped.

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5'>Raging Offense</font>\nHas an <font color='#ff8ae5'>8%</font> chance to deal <font color='#ff8ae5'>270%</font> animus damage on hit. Can only trigger once every <font color='#ff8ae5'>8</font> sec. Inactive in battlegrounds and arenas.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>A weapon infused with the fury of the Land of Darkness, where battle never ceases. Detonates the power of Animaru to instantly lead enemies to their graves.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: Orbs used by Guidance trainees. It's nothing extraordinary, but trainees aren't allowed to use anything more potent.
This legendary brew is said to grant eternal youth. Drinking this will immediately restore <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
A $npcName:22300149$ egg. As nutritious as it is delicious. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>4</font> health per sec over <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
Emergency rations for guards stationed near $map:02000001$. Eating this will restore <font color='#00aaef'>4</font> health per sec over <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
These chewy gummy treats are sure to get stuck between your teeth. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>4</font> health per sec over <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>5 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Immune to Shadow Toxin</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A vaccine against the shadow poison of the $map:02000146$. Can be created with the mixer that $npcName:11000264$ made at the behest of $npcName:11000032$. Use to become immune to shadow poison for 5 min.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Physical Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: An ancient tonic favored by the great warriors of $map:02000051$. Drinking this will increase physical attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Magic Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: The mages of $map:02000023$ cultivate a local herb to brew into these tonics. Consume to increase magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Max Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This tonic was smuggled from a secret $map:02000100$ laboratory. Consume to increase your max health by <font color='#00aaef'>5%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes</font>.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Defense</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A wise woman brewed this tonic to ease the aches and pains of the adventurer's lifestyle. Consume to increase defense by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes.
It's like an elixir, but smaller. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>25%</font> of your health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

A potion made of refined red herbs. It's best to swallow it down in one gulp. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>200</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

A potion made of refined orange herbs. It's best to swallow it down in one gulp. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>400</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

A potion made of refined white herbs. It's best to swallow it down in one gulp. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>600</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

A rare potion made by specially refining red herbs. The alchemical recipe has only recently become widely available. It's best to swallow it down in one gulp. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>800</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

A rare potion made by specially refining orange herbs. The alchemical recipe has only recently become widely available. It's best to swallow it down in one gulp. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>1,000</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

A rare potion made by specially refining white herbs. It's best to swallow it down in one gulp. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>1,200</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
A common herb found just about anywhere. It tastes sour and slightly sweet. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> health per sec over <font color='#00aaef'>28</font> sec.
A common herb found just about anywhere. It tastes sour and slightly sweet. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>20</font> health per sec over <font color='#00aaef'>28</font> sec.
A common herb found just about anywhere. It tastes sour and slightly sweet. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>40</font> health per sec over <font color='#00aaef'>28</font> sec.
An extremely rare herb. It tastes sour and slightly sweet. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>60</font> health per sec over <font color='#00aaef'>28</font> sec.
An extremely rare herb. It tastes sour and slightly sweet. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>75</font> health per sec over <font color='#00aaef'>28</font> sec.
An extremely rare herb. It tastes sour and slightly sweet. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>80</font> health per sec over <font color='#00aaef'>28</font> sec.
An extremely rare herb. It tastes sour and slightly sweet. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>95</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>28</font> sec.
Cures all diseases.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 600 Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Sparkling juice with chunks of fresh strawberry. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>75</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 976 Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A juice made of layered syrups. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>122</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 1157 Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This juice was squeezed from fresh, zesty oranges. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>301</font> health instantly and <font color='#00aaef'>107</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 1528 Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A popular juice with a strong berry flavor. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>191</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 1768 Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A mad mixture of coconut juice, milk, and soda. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>221</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.

Fresh milk from a cow. Gulping it down will instantly restore <font color='#00aaef'>20</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec. Can be used for cooking or brewing, and is available from merchants.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: A freshly laid egg. Crack it and eat it raw to recover <font color='#00aaef'>4</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec. It can be used as an ingredient in cooking, and is available from merchants.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Strength</font>
key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:22000022$ collected this honey and put it in a pot. Eating it will increase strength by <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> minute.
A juicy apple with crisp, golden skin. The sweet flavor warms and revitalizes the body. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>4</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

A mushroom hardy enough to survive shadow poison of $map:02000146$. It glows with a blue light. While it thrives in the wild, it tends to die under domestic conditions. Eating it will stun you for 3 sec.
Ground-up $item:20000102$ powder. This powder will send anyone into a fit of uncontrollable laughter. Consume to become stunned for <font color='#00aaef'>2</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Dexterity</font>
key.tooltipDescription: DNA extracted from the monsters who crossed into our world via the $map:02000146$. This may be the key to understanding the Land of Darkness. Consume to increase dexterity by <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> minute.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Intelligence</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Raw samples "procured" from the Goldus Pharmaceuticals warehouse. Increases intelligence by <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> minute.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Luck</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This DNA was extracted from various disease-resistant plants. Mixing them all together and drinking the results seems like a good idea. Increases luck by <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> minute.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Accuracy</font>
key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000124$ dedicated his life to developing this medicine. It increases accuracy by <font color='#00aaef'>2</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> minute.
A powder used to harden stone surfaces. Also makes you sneeze if inhaled. Consume to become stunned for <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> sec.
A leaf drizzled with honey. A favorite snack among the fairfolk of $map:02000023$. Munch on these to restore <font color='#00aaef'>4</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Magic Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Boil and eat this $npcName:21000054$ tail to light a fire in your soul. Increases magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> minute.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Physical Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:21000053$ droppings. The creature's fiery stomach burns away the toxins in the moss it eats and leaves only a nutritionally dense, if smelly, snack. It's become a rarity ever since $npcName:11000273$ of $map:02000076$ started praising it as a health food. If you're feeling adventurous, consume it to increase physical attack by <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> minute.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>10 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Reduces Movement Speed</font>
key.tooltipDescription: The remains of a wild $npcName:21000029$. So sticky that it will reduce your movement speed by <font color='#00aaef'>30%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>10 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='22'>10 Poison Damage per Sec</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A captured $npcName:29000033$. Tastes amazing when cooked properly. Consume to receive <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> poison damage per second over <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> sec.

This new medicine from Goldus Pharmaceuticals is especially effective on leg injuries for some reason. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>4</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

Enoki mushrooms that only grow in deep, unpolluted valleys. These delicious mushrooms are a great source of protein. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>4</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

Enoki mushrooms become overripe when grown in desolate areas with little sunlight. The overripe mushrooms are known for their dizzying but remarkable taste. Consume to become stunned for <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> sec.
In the early morning, while the rest of the world sleeps, fairies go out into the field and harvest dew drops from the grass of their forest. Consume to cure poison.
A red flower that blooms near lava. It's as hot as its volcanic home. Deals fire damage when consumed.
Refreshing, flavorful clam meat. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>4</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
This chicken is used in a variety of festive dishes. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>4</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>20 Sec Cooldown | 5 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Size</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This medicine supposedly makes you grow taller. It sounds like some sort of scam. Consume to become taller for <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>20</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='16'>Increases Max Health/Physical Resistance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A hot cup of ramen with flavorful broth, thick pieces of chicken, and crunchy vegetables. There's even a fresh egg inside! Consume to increase health by <font color='#00aaef'>70</font> and physical resistance by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='16'>Increases Max Health/Defense</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A golden rotisserie chicken. Everyone loves its crispy skin and juicy meat. Increases health by <font color='#00aaef'>150</font> and defense by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='16'>Increases Max Health/Magic Resistance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Savory squid dried in the ocean breeze. Grill it with butter for a tasty snack. Increases health by <font color='#00aaef'>90</font> and magic resistance by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes.
A basic firework that explodes in all directions. It's time to celebrate!

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Cooldown | 30 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Experience +50%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Use to increase the experience gained from defeating monsters, fishing, and performing by <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> minutes. You may only use one at a time.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Hr Cooldown | 1 Hr Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Experience +50%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Use to increase the experience gained from defeating monsters, fishing, and performing by <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> hour. You may only use one at a time.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Cooldown | 30 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Experience +100%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Use to increase the experience gained from defeating monsters, fishing, and performing by <font color='#00aaef'>100%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> minutes. You may only use one at a time.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Hr Cooldown | 1 Hr Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Experience +100%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Use to increase the experience gained from defeating monsters, fishing, and performing by <font color='#00aaef'>100%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> hour. You may only use one at a time.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Cooldown | 30 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Experience +200%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Use to increase the experience gained from defeating monsters, fishing, and performing by <font color='#00aaef'>200%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> minutes. You may only use one at a time.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Hr Cooldown | 1 Hr Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Experience +200%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Use to increase the experience gained from defeating monsters, fishing, and performing by <font color='#00aaef'>200%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> hour. You may only use one at a time.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A tasty $npcName:22000005$ tail. Big bites are recommended. Increases physical and magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> minute.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Enjoy a glass of thick, chunky milk. Increases physical and magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>1%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> minute.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000002$ baked this bread to help $npcName:11000055$ grow big and strong. Increases physical and magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>1%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> minute.
An extremely rare herb. It tastes sour and slightly sweet. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>40</font> health per sec over <font color='#00aaef'>28</font> sec.

A potion made of refined green herbs. It's best to swallow it down in one gulp. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>600</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>2 Min Cooldown | 15 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Invisibility</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A blend of herbs found only in the Land of Darkness. Drinking this will make you invisible to enemies for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> sec, but decrease your movement speed by <font color='#00aaef'>40%</font>. Invisibility is broken if you take action or are attacked by an enemy.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>2 Min Cooldown</font>\n<font size='24'>Throws Stun Grenade</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Place a bomb that stuns enemies when detonated. Use it to stun enemies within the area for <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> sec. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>2</font> minutes.
A refreshing and crunchy cucumber. Some people seem to dislike the taste and smell. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>16</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
Nothing beats the crisp crunch of a fresh carrot. The taste isn't too bad, either. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>40</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>7</font> sec.

Ripe redberries. A few are sour, so be careful. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>16</font> health per second for 5</font> sec. Can be used for cooking or brewing, and is available from merchants.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: Unripe whiteberries. The stringent taste numbs the pain. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>40</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>7</font> sec. Can be used for cooking or brewing, and is available from merchants.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: Ripe blueberries. It can be hard to harvest these, as animals tend to eat them before they get ripe. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>80</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>7</font> sec. Can be used for cooking or brewing, and is available from merchants.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 392 Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Most people can't stop at one glass of this delicious cherry drink. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>49</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 752 Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Nothing beats the summer heat like fresh lemonade. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>94</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 1368 Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Whether you love it or hate it, one thing is certain: This drink exists. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>171</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='16'>Increases Max Health/Defense</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Eat this prawn, shell and all, for an authentic seafood experience. Consume to increase health by <font color='#00aaef'>50</font> and defense by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='16'>Increases Max Health/Magic Resistance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: The high heat of charcoal grilling has drained all the excess oil from the chicken, making the meat tender and the skin crispy. Consume to increase health by <font color='#00aaef'>270</font> and magic resistance by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='16'>Increases Max Health/Physical Resistance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: The grease has been drained from this pork belly, and the skin is golden and crispy. Consume to increase health by <font color='#00aaef'>190</font> and physical resistance by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='16'>Increases Max Health/Defense</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Black bean noodles are a must-have Chinese dish. Diced onions and pork chunks are sautÃ©ed and smothered in a black bean sauce, then poured over fresh noodles. Consume to increase health by <font color='#00aaef'>120</font> and defense by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='16'>Increases Max Health/Physical Resistance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Sliced rice cakes smothered in red-hot pepper sauce. Throw some fishcakes in the mix to bring out the flavors even more. Consume to increase health by <font color='#00aaef'>140</font> and physical resistance by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='16'>Increases Max Health/Magic Resistance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Korean-style fried chicken tossed in sweet and spicy chili sauce. A healthy mix of diced green onions and sweet sauce brings out the best flavors. Consume to increase health by <font color='#00aaef'>140</font> and magic resistance by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 831 Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Kids like to poke a hole in the lid and sip this sweet yogurt drink slowly. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>215</font> health instantly and <font color='#00aaef'>77</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 508 Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A cup a day helps keep the doctor away. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>132</font> health instantly and <font color='#00aaef'>47</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 1136 Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Quick, easy, and palatable. Who needs solid food, anyway? Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>142</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='16'>Increases Max Health/Magic Resistance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: The whipped cream makes this shortcake even sweeter. Consume to increase health by <font color='#00aaef'>220</font> and magic resistance by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='16'>Increases Max Health/Defense</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Fresh squeezed lemon brings this fried shrimp to life. Figuratively. Consume to increase health by <font color='#00aaef'>250</font> and defense by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='16'>Increases Max Health/Physical Resistance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: The soft cream cheese filling and the sweet cupcake come together to form the perfect bite. Consume to increase health by <font color='#00aaef'>250</font> and physical resistance by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes.
The baba fruit is irresistably sweet, but it's also known to throw its consumers into fits of laughter. Consume to become stunned for <font color='#00aaef'>2</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>2 Min Cooldown | 5 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Invisibility</font>
key.tooltipDescription: The ghost of one of Turka's many victims. Hiding inside this ghost will make you invisible to enemies for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> sec, but decrease your movement speed by <font color='#00aaef'>40%</font>. Invisibility is broken if you take action or are attacked by an enemy.

A refined potion that contains red herbs infused with the forgotten power of Lapenta. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>200</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> sec.

A refined potion that contains orange herbs infused with the forgotten power of Lapenta. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>400</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> sec.

A refined potion that contains white herbs infused with the forgotten power of Lapenta. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>600</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> sec.

A refined tonic that contains rare red herbs infused with the forgotten power of Lapenta. Drink this tonic to recover <font color='#00aaef'>800</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> sec.

A refined tonic that contains rare orange herbs infused with the forgotten power of Lapenta. Drink this tonic to recover <font color='#00aaef'>850</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> sec.

A refined tonic that contains rare white herbs infused with the forgotten power of Lapenta. Drink this tonic to recover <font color='#00aaef'>1,000</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 1493 Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Fresh squeezed juice blended with ice. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>389</font> health instantly and <font color='#00aaef'>138</font> health per second over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Meso Gain</font>
key.tooltipDescription: These eye drops are golden for a reason. Use to increase mesos gained from monsters by <font color='#00aaef'>20%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minutes. Has a <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> minute cooldown.
This coconut from Karkar is sweet and delicious. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health.
These Karkar coconut cookies are nutritious and delicious. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>1,000</font> health.
This juice is made with all organic grapefruits. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>940</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Cooldown | 1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='22'>Increases Size and Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: These delightful flowers are just begging to be smelled. What's the worst that could happen? Smell to grow bigger and increase attack by <font color='#00aaef'>1%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> minute.
Created from the snow of Cold Heart. The shiny ice crystals will make your heart flutter.
These fireworks were crafted with pink flower petals. They're very fragrant.
Fireworks that shine like stars in the night sky. Some fuddy-duddies don't like shiny things, so use responsibly.
Paint the sky with love. This is perfect for professing your true feelings to the one you love.
Give a big thumbs up! Everyone loves a big thumbs up.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Duration\n<font size='24'>Summons Bat Swarm</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Summon a swarm of bats around you.
Bathe in simmering starlight.
Shower yourself in fragrant pink petals.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>2 Min Cooldown</font>\n<font size='24'>Removes Disabling Effects</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A pill of concentrated herbs. So bitter, it'll snap you out of whatever you've done to stun yourself. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>2</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>2 Min Cooldown</font>\n<font size='24'>Removes Disabling Effects</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This potent brew will rouse you to wakefulness, but too much is bad for you. Removes all disabling effects. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>2</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Physical Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: An ancient tonic consumed by the brave Warriors of $map:02000051$. The alchemical recipe has only recently become widely available. Consume to increase physical attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes. The effect will continue even if you die.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Magic Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A refined herbal tonic created by the Mages of $map:02000023$. The alchemical recipe has only recently become widely available. Consume to increase magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes. The effect will continue even if you die.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Max Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A tonic smuggled out of a $map:02000100$ laboratory. The alchemical recipe has only recently become widely available. Consume to increase your max health by <font color='#00aaef'>5%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes. The effect will continue even if you die.
A fresh baked cupcake straight out of the oven. The soft cake and sweet icing come together to form the perfect bite. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health.
A juicy squid grilled on a stone plate. It's perfectly salty and chewy. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health.
Made with fresh cherry chunks. It's so delicious that your taste buds will revolt if you don't drink it right now. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health.
Made with fresh strawberry chunks. You'll be smelling like strawberry for days. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health.
Fresh squeezed lemonade is just the thing to put some bounce in your step. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health.
Bring some regularity to your life with this delicious yogurt drink. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health.
This grapefruit juice is so sweet, you'll pucker your lips with joy. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health.
This juice has ruined countless lives due to its addictive sweetness, but you'll probably be okay. Consume to instanty recover <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Attributes</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Courage in a bottle. Consume to increase strength, dexterity, intelligence, and luck by <font color='#00aaef'>7</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Movement Speed</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This potion will give you a head start on your adventures. Consume to increase movement speed by <font color='#00aaef'>15%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes</font>.
This legendary brew is said to grant eternal youth. Drinking this will immediately restore <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
This was made for $npcName:11000003$ to help work out his crankiness. Throw it at other Maplers to splash them with blue paint.
Just hearing this guard whistle makes you want to stand at attention.
$npcName:11000547$ uses a flute like this to summon her eagle. It probably won't work for you, unfortunately.
$npcName:11000787$ made this cucumber-infused gin and tonic while reminiscing about his old days as a bartender. Drink at your own risk.
Shake it to see what happens! Warning: Not recommended when you are at low health.
You can see $npcName:11000767$'s enthusiasm for sailing in this chart. Are you ready to show YOUR passion?
$npcName:11000002$ used this to roast whole pigs. You must turn the handle manually to cook a perfect roast.
Sweep! Sweep with all your might! Sweep as if your life depends upon it!
This vine came from one of the plants $npcName:11000036$ grew in Ellinia. It's a shy vine, and will recoil from anyone who tries to touch it.
$npcName:11000790$ grew this in his garden. Consume to temporarily lose control of your body.
$npcName:11000097$ invented this slick-looking device. But does it actually work? Who knows!
$npcName:11000185$ can't live without this item. It sees a lot of use at open houses.
A bomb used by $npcName:11000777$ to avoid socializing.
Even robots would rather sit than stand. Though it was made for $npcName:11000772$, it's comfortable enough for just about anyone.
Made by the talented $npcName:11000773$ out of $item:20000102$. Consume to temporarily lose consciousness.
The culmination of $npcName:11000033$'s wisdom. Summons an adorable fairy.
This art came with a popular male pop-star's album. Could it be that this is what $npcName:11000420$ was after when she bought the record?
$npcName:11000081$ made this scroll as a joke. It's quite a sight when it starts spraying water like a fountain.
$npcName:11000515$ smuggled these supplements out while working at $map:02000216$. Consume to suddenly but temporarily grow in size.
This spotlight once shined down on $npcName:11000406$. Perhaps you can help it find a new star worthy of its illumination.
A party invitation from $npcName:11000711$. What are you waiting for? Open it!
One of $npcName:11000253$'s favorite hair styling products. For a more polished appearance, try using $item:20000229$.
$npcName:11000764$ is constantly reading this book of truly cringe-worthy jokes.
A book recording every mistake $npcName:11000512$ has ever made. After reading just a few pages you'll feel intensely sympathetic towards her.
Tea leaves that $npcName:11000544$ has collected from marketplaces throughout Maple World. They fill the air with a lovely fragrance.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Physical Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: An ancient tonic favored by the great warriors of $map:02000051$. Drinking this will increase physical attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Magic Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: The mages of $map:02000023$ cultivate a local herb to brew into these tonics. Consume to increase magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Max Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This tonic was smuggled from a secret $map:02000100$ laboratory. Consume to increase your max health by <font color='#00aaef'>5%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes</font>.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Defense</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A wise woman brewed this tonic to ease the aches and pains of the adventurer's lifestyle. Consume to increase defense by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes.
A campfire for you and your friends. You can feel the warmth of $npcName:11000758$'s kindness burning in the flames.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>20 Sec Cooldown</font>\n<font size='24'>Summons Dark Energy</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A potion made of distilled Shadow World darkness.
This legendary brew is said to grant eternal youth. Drinking this will immediately restore <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
key.guideDescription: This can only be used in the personal arena.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>20 Sec Cooldown | 5 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Size</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This fruit tape has been injected with wholesome vitamins and minerals.
key.guideDescription: Consume to grow taller for 5 sec. Has a cooldown of 20 sec.

key.tooltipDescription: Finally, a snack that combines the fruity flavor you crave with the leathery texture you deserve!
key.guideDescription: Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>940</font> health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

key.tooltipDescription: This delicious pumpkin candy is the perfect treat for the season.
key.guideDescription: Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>150</font> health over <font color='#00aaef'>7</font> sec. Can't be used after QRQRQR on TKTKTK.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Duration\n<font size='24'>Summons Bat Swarm</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Bats are more than a candyâ€”they're a lifestyle.

Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.
The level-up booster remains even after death and the timer does not continue while logged out. Additional experience boosters cannot be used while an existing level-up booster is active.

<font color='#FFFFFF'>Level-up Booster Effects:</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Combat Experience +50%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Performance Experience +50%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Fishing Experience +50%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Meso Drops +50%</font>

Applying too many of the eye drops in such a short period of time may have an adverse effect on your vision, so there is a <font color='#ff5400'>15</font> minute cooldown before it can be used again.

key.guideDescription: Grants a <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> chance to deal <font color='#00aaef'>200%</font> non-elemental damage for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> min. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>10 Min Cooldown | 3 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Activates Shield</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A potent tonic used to keep nobles safe during assassination attempts.
key.guideDescription: Reduces speed by <font color='#00aaef'>80%</font> and summons a defensive shield for <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> sec. The shield blocks all but the most powerful attacks. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Grants Boost</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A tonic that draws out your latent powers.
key.guideDescription: Increases attack and magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>4%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>3 Min Cooldown | 20 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Guarantees Critical Hits</font>
key.tooltipDescription: One sip of this brings everything into focus.
key.guideDescription: All attacks deal critical damage for <font color='#00aaef'>20</font> sec. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>5 Min Cooldown | 5 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Grants Iron Defense</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Makes your skin as hard as steel. Great for combat; not so great for yoga.
key.guideDescription: Reduces incoming physical and magic damage by <font color='#00aaef'>15%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> min. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.tooltipDescription: The bottled experiences and memories of heroes past.
key.guideDescription: Consume to immediately gain <font color='#00aaef'>50,000</font> experience.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Physical Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: An ancient tonic consumed by the brave Warriors of $map:02000051$. The alchemical recipe has only recently become widely available. Consume to increase physical attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes. The effect will continue even if you die.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Magic Attack</font>

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Max Health</font>

Consume to increase your max health by <font color='#00aaef'>5%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes. The effect will continue even if you die.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Defense</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A tonic made by a wise woman to relieve the suffering of adventurers. The alchemical recipe has only recently become widely available. It's sweet enough to make you forget about how exhausted you are. Consume to increase your defense by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes. Thanks to a special ingredient present in the tonic, the effect will continue even after death.

key.tooltipDescription: Use to increase the experience gained from defeating monsters, fishing, and performing by <font color='#00aaef'>100%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> minutes. You may only use one at a time.
A potion brimming with vital energy.
key.guideDescription: Consume to instantly jump to level 50. Automatically completes all epic quests up to level 49. \n\nNote that you will not receive the meso and item rewards for quests completed this way.

key.tooltipDescription: A potion brimming with vital energy.

key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your offensive abilities.\nIncreases damage dealt to enemies by <font color='#00aaef'>6%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min, but reduces max health by <font color='#00aaef'>30%</font>.\nThe effect will continue even after death.
