key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your offensive abilities.\nIncreases physical and magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>6%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min, but reduces max spirit by <font color='#00aaef'>30</font>.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Damage 7%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your offensive abilities.\nWhen health is below <font color='#00aaef'>30%</font>, increases the damage dealt to enemies by <font color='#00aaef'>7%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Damage 5%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your offensive abilities.\nIncreases damage dealt to enemies by <font color='#00aaef'>5%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min, but increases damage received by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font>.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Damage 7%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your offensive abilities.\nFor <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min, increases damage by <font color='#00aaef'>7%</font> whenever <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> or more hostile targets are within <font color='#00aaef'>6</font>Â m.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Damage +6%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your offensive abilities.\nFor <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min, increases damage by <font color='#00aaef'>6%</font> whenever health is <font color='#00aaef'>100%</font>.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Accuracy +5</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your offensive abilities.\nIncreases accuracy by <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Piercing Resistance +5%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your offensive abilities.\nIncreases physical/magic piercing resistance by <font color='#00aaef'>5%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Attack Speed +4%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your offensive abilities.\nIncreases attack speed by <font color='#00aaef'>4%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Attack Speed 6%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your offensive abilities.\nIncreases attack speed by <font color='#00aaef'>6%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min, but deals <font color='#00aaef'>80</font> damage per sec.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Spirit Cost -10%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your offensive abilities.\nDecreases the spirit cost of abilities by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.\nThe effect will continue even after death.</font>

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Natural Health Recovery +150</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This magic elixir boosts your defensive abilities.\nIncreases natural health recovery by <font color='#00aaef'>150</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.\nThe effect will remain even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Critical Evasion +200</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your defensive abilities.\nIncreases critical evasion by <font color='#00aaef'>200</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Defense +6%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your defensive abilities.\nFor <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min, increases defense by <font color='#00aaef'>6%</font> whenever health is <font color='#00aaef'>70%</font> or higher.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Defense 4%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your defensive abilities.\nIncreases defense by <font color='#00aaef'>4%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Evasion +6</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your defensive abilities.\nIncreases evasion by <font color='#00aaef'>6</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Elemental Damage Reduction +5%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your defensive abilities.\nIncreases fire, ice, electric, dark, holy, and poison damage reduction by <font color='#00aaef'>5%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Movement Speed +4%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your defensive abilities.\nIncreases movement speed and ground mount speed by <font color='#00aaef'>4%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.\nThe effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Serves Fried Chicken</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Places crispy fried chicken for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> sec. If a party member moves within <font color='#00aaef'>3</font>Â m of the chicken, they will eat it to increase physical and magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>6%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min. Does not stack with offensive elixirs. The effect will continue even after death.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nThis appears to be from Prism Falls. The texture is a bit tough.</font>

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Serves Veil Burger</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Places mega veil burger for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> sec. If a party member moves within <font color='#00aaef'>3</font>Â m of the burger, they will eat it to increase accuracy by <font color='#00aaef'>7</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min. Does not stack with offensive elixirs. The effect will continue even after death.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nThis juicy burger is rich with veil ox flavor.</font>

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Serves Spicy Noodles</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Places spicy noodles for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> sec. If a party member moves within <font color='#00aaef'>3</font>Â m of the noodles, they will eat it to increase damage dealt to enemies by <font color='#00aaef'>6%</font>. Does not stack with offensive elixirs. The effect will continue even after death.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nThese extra hot noodles were seasoned with spices from $map:02000039$.</font>

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Serves Blueberry</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Places Ellinian mega blueberry for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> sec. If a party member moves within <font color='#00aaef'>3</font>Â m of the blueberry, they will eat it to increase defense by <font color='#00aaef'>6%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min. Does not stack with defensive elixirs. The effect will continue even after death.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nA gigantic blueberry. Size is guaranteed; flavor is not.</font>

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Serves Fresh Fruit</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Places fresh fruit for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> sec. If a party member moves within <font color='#00aaef'>3</font>Â m of the fruit, they will eat it to increase max health by <font color='#00aaef'>6%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min. Does not stack with defensive elixirs. The effect will continue even after death.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nMany farmers lose their lives every year in the ongoing war against fruit-thieving monkeys. Honor their sacrifice by sharing a sweet snack with the ones you hold dear.</font>

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Serves Chocolate Cake</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Places chocolate cake for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> sec. If a party member moves within <font color='#00aaef'>3</font>Â m of the cake, they will eat it to increase evasion by <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min. Does not stack with defensive elixirs. The effect will continue even after death.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nMany adventurers have risked their lives in Sweet Tooth Valley in an attempt to get a taste of such tasty desserts.</font>

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>3 Min Cooldown | 10 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Activates Bright Brilliance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A tonic that helps you tap into the true power of certain skills.
key.guideDescription: Reduces spirit consumption by <font color='#00aaef'>70%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> sec. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>10 Min Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Activates Blood Bond</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Absorb the very life force of your enemies with this special tonic.
key.guideDescription: Grants a chance to recover <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> of your health over <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec each time you deal damage. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>3 Min Cooldown | 10 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Activates Swift Wind</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A sip of this will make you feel as light as the wind.
key.guideDescription: Increases movement speed by <font color='#00aaef'>65%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> sec. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>3 Min Cooldown | 1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Activates Focused Rage</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A tonic that reveals what lies in the heart of all people: rage.
key.guideDescription: Grants a <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> chance to deal <font color='#00aaef'>200%</font> non-elemental damage for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> min. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>10 Min Cooldown | 3 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Activates Shield</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A potent tonic used to keep nobles safe during assassination attempts.
key.guideDescription: Reduces speed by <font color='#00aaef'>80%</font> and summons a defensive shield for <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> sec. The shield blocks all but the most powerful attacks. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Grants Boost</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A tonic that draws out your latent powers.
key.guideDescription: Increases attack and magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>4%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>3 Min Cooldown | 20 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Guarantees Critical Hits</font>
key.tooltipDescription: One sip of this brings everything into focus.
key.guideDescription: All attacks deal critical damage for <font color='#00aaef'>20</font> sec. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>5 Min Cooldown | 5 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Grants Iron Defense</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Makes your skin as hard as steel. Great for combat; not so great for yoga.
key.guideDescription: Reduces incoming physical and magic damage by <font color='#00aaef'>15%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> min. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Cooldown | 30 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Enables Auto-Fishing</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Double-click to obtain auto-fishing buff.
key.guideDescription: The buff lasts for 30 mins. This timer is paused whenever you log off. Use the voucher, and then use your Fishing Pole to begin auto-fishing. Currency will be deducted on-demand if auto-extension is active.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Hr Cooldown | 1 Hr Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Enables Auto-Fishing</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Double-click to obtain auto-fishing buff.
key.guideDescription: The buff lasts for 1 hour. This timer is paused whenever you log off. Use the voucher, and then use your Fishing Pole to begin auto-fishing. Currency will be deducted on-demand if auto-extension is active.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>3 Hr Cooldown | 3 Hr Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Enables Auto-Fishing</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Double-click to obtain auto-fishing buff.
key.guideDescription: The buff lasts for 3 hour. This timer is paused whenever you log off. Use the voucher, and then use your Fishing Pole to begin auto-fishing. Currency will be deducted on-demand if auto-extension is active.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Cooldown | 30 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Enables Auto-Performance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Double-click to obtain Auto-Performance buff.
key.guideDescription: The buff lasts for 30 min while logged in. Meret will be deducted if auto-extension is used.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Hr Cooldown | 1 Hr Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Enables Auto-Performance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Double-click to obtain Auto-Performance buff.
key.guideDescription: The buff lasts for 1 Hr while logged in. Merets will be deducted if auto extension is used.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>3 Hr Cooldown | 3 Hr Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Enables Auto-Performance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Double-click to obtain Auto-Performance buff.
key.guideDescription: The buff lasts for 3 Hr while logged in. Merets will be deducted if auto extension is used.

key.tooltipDescription: Lulu, a Bunny with the Roaming Merchant Union, has gone through a lot of trouble to get this potion. Consume to instantly restore <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec. Found in Mystery Boxes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='14'>Increases Attack/Health/Movement Speed</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This cookie was baked in commemoration of Zakum's return. It's delicious and made with healthy ingredients, unlike Zakum.
key.guideDescription: Increases attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font>, max health by <font color='#00aaef'>5%</font>, and movement speed by <font color='#00aaef'>5%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>60 Min Cooldown | 60 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Set Bonfire</font>
key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#00aaef'>Sets a warming bonfire on the ground for <font color='#00aaef'>60</font> minutes. Increases fishing experience by <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> up to <font color='#00aaef'>20</font> allies within <font color='#00aaef'>12m</font>. Warming Bonfire remains even if you move to a different map or disconnect from the game. Its effects are limited to its range.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nSmelling the grilled fish puts me in the mood for some ice-cold soda.</font>

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Cooldown | 30 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Set Up Donation Pot</font>
key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#00aaef'>Sets a donation pot on the ground for <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> minutes. Increases performance experience by <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> up to <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> party members within <font color='#00aaef'>3m</font>. Only affects party members.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nThis donation pot motivates performers and solidifies the bonds among them, but sadly does not help them earn mesos.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: One sip of this brings everything into focus.
key.guideDescription: All attacks deal critical damage for <font color='#00aaef'>20</font> sec. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.tooltipDescription: It's like an elixir, but smaller. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>25%</font> of your health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
A potion brimming with vital energy.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory to use it. Consume to instantly reach level <font color='#00aaef'>50</font>.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>90 Min Cooldown | 90 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Fantastic Level-up Booster</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Give your leveling a kickstart with this collection of helpful boosts.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.
The fantastic level-up booster remains even after death and the timer does not continue while logged out. Additional experience boosters cannot be used while an existing level-up booster is active.

<font color='#FFFFFF'>Fantastic Level-up Booster Effects:</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Combat Experience +100%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Performance Experience +100%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Fishing Experience +100%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Meso Drops +50%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Physical and Magic Attack +3%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'>Attribute boosts are not granted on battlegrounds.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: This chest contains Dark Flame Earrings with 2 extended slots.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='20'>Can Fish Items</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This sparkling golden nickel silver pot grants a chance of catching 2nd Anniversary Commemorative Coins.
key.guideDescription: Grants a chance to obtain 2nd Anniversary Commemorative Coins from fishing for <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> min.\n<font color="#FF5F5F">Any new bait will replace your current bait.</font>

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Cooldown | 30 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Enables Auto-Fishing</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Double-click to obtain auto-fishing buff.
key.guideDescription: The buff lasts for 30 mins. This timer is paused whenever you log off. Use the voucher, and then use your Fishing Pole to begin auto-fishing. Currency will be deducted on-demand if auto-extension is active.

key.tooltipDescription: Double-click to obtain Auto-Performance buff.
key.guideDescription: The buff lasts for 30 min while logged in. Meret will be deducted if auto-extension is used.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A Steamed Dumpling made with a thin casing and filled with juicy meat. It's quite hot, so try not to burn your mouth!
key.guideDescription: Consume to increase your physical and magic attack by 4% for 15 minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Attack Speed</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A pan-fried dumpling whose bottom is fried and top is steamed. It's a tasty harmony of crunchy and chewy!
key.guideDescription: Consume to increase your attack speed by 5% for 15 min.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Accuracy</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A tasty snack made by boiling soft dumplings and yeast-fermented rice.
key.guideDescription: Consume to increase your accuracy by 6 for 15 min.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Piercing</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A rice cake made with mugwort, and a red bean filling. It's chewy and sweet.
key.guideDescription: Consume to increase your piercing by 3% for 15 min.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Max Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A delicacy made from chicken stuffed in soft glutinous rice and wrapped in a lotus leaf. It smells delicious!
key.guideDescription: Consume to increase your max health by 5% for 15 minutes.

key.tooltipDescription: This experience tonic grants experience on use. It was made from boiling sweet peas in honor of Pink Bean.
key.guideDescription: Consume to immediately gain <font color='#00aaef'>300,000</font> experience.

key.tooltipDescription: Let's imbue your feelings for Ray into a flame and launch it high into the sky.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Ray's favorite dish. Stir-fried pork seasoned with garlic, soy sauce, salt, and spicy green peppers. A delicious, home-style dish.
key.guideDescription: Consume for your physical and magic attack to increase by 3% for 15 minutes.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Max Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A dish that Ray can make with confidence. He learned it while playing the role of a chef in a drama.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>60 Min Cooldown | 60 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Experience +50%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Use this for a little help with your leveling.
key.guideDescription: Increases hunting, performance, and fishing experience by <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font>. These effects persist even after death, and the timer is paused while logged out. Only the effect of the most recently used experience voucher will be applied. Another can be used once the effect wears off.

key.tooltipDescription: This legendary brew is said to grant eternal youth. Drinking this will immediately restore <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
For 120 seconds, your avatar's body temperature parameter is locked, thereby protecting you from frigid winds.\n"Used in the dungeon Xenon System Link 4: Ice Beast's Den.
Fireworks specially crafted for the 68th Chinese National Holiday. You can see 5 enormous, flashy stars.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: Fireworks to celebrate the birthday of a dedicated adventurer. Happy Birthday!
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: This legendary brew is said to grant eternal youth. Drinking this will immediately restore <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Physical Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: An ancient tonic consumed by the brave Warriors of $map:02000051$. The alchemical recipe has only recently become widely available. Consume to increase physical attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes. The effect will continue even if you die.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Magic Attack</font>

Consume to increase magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes. The effect will continue even if you die.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Max Health</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A tonic smuggled out of a $map:02000100$ laboratory. The alchemical recipe has only recently become widely available. Consume to increase your max health by <font color='#00aaef'>5%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes. The effect will continue even if you die.
This legendary brew is said to grant eternal youth. Drinking this will immediately restore <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
It's like an elixir, but smaller. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>25%</font> of your health. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
These fireworks were crafted with pink flower petals. They're very fragrant.
Paint the sky with love. This is perfect for professing your true feelings to the one you love.
A fresh baked cupcake straight out of the oven. The soft cake and sweet icing come together to form the perfect bite. Consume to instantly recover <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='20'>Can Fish Items</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A special magnetic lure that can only be used at the Star Sands Fishing Hole. You may obtain a Shiny Moon Fragment and event meret while fishing at the Star Sands Fishing Hole.
key.guideDescription: Grants a chance to obtain Shiny Moon Fragment and event meret from fishing for <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> min.\n<font color="#FF5F5F">Any new lure will replace your current lure.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: Fireworks that explode like brilliant flower petals. Be considerate of those around you during use.
This delicious pumpkin candy is the perfect treat for the season.
key.guideDescription: Restores <font color='#00aaef'>150</font> health per second for <font color='#00aaef'>7</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Duration\n<font size='24'>Summons Bat Swarm</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Bats are more than a candyâ€”they're a lifestyle.
key.guideDescription: Summons a swarm of bats around you for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> min.

key.tooltipDescription: This was meant to help plants grow tall until one hapless gardener actually tried some and grew enormous.
key.guideDescription: This will make you go through one heck of a growth spurt.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>20 Min Cooldown | 20 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Physical & Magic Attack</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your offensive abilities.\nIncreases physical and magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> min.\nDoes not stack with offensive elixirs. Effect persists even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>20 Min Cooldown | 20 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Defense</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A magic elixir that boosts your defensive abilities.\nIncreases defense by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>20</font> min.\nDoes not stack with defensive elixirs. Effect persists even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Increases Defense</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A tonic made by a wise woman to relieve the suffering of adventurers. The alchemical recipe has only recently become widely available. It's sweet enough to make you forget about how exhausted you are. Consume to increase your defense by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> minutes. Thanks to a special ingredient present in the tonic, the effect will continue even after death.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>10 Min Cooldown | 3 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Activates Shield</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A potent tonic used to keep nobles safe during assassination attempts.
key.guideDescription: Reduces speed by <font color='#00aaef'>80%</font> and summons a defensive shield for <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> sec. The shield blocks all but the most powerful attacks. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Grants Boost</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A tonic that draws out your latent powers.
key.guideDescription: Increases attack and magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>4%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>3 Min Cooldown | 20 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Guarantees Critical Hits</font>
key.tooltipDescription: One sip of this brings everything into focus.
key.guideDescription: All attacks deal critical damage for <font color='#00aaef'>20</font> sec. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 20 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Hellflame Neutralization</font>
key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#00aaef'>Neutralizes Infernog's hellflame for 20 min upon use.\nCan be used only on $map:02000410$. The effects are removed when the battle ends.</font>
key.guideDescription: \n<font color='#7A7A7A'>A coating cream to protect your gear and body from Infernog's hellfire. The recipe that was handed down orally in Tristan's family was analyzed and successfully mass produced in Sky Fortress.\n"It has a foul smell but there's nothing better than this against the Balrogs' unique magic." - Tristan</font>

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 20 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Protection from Evil Spirits of Hell</font>
key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#00aaef'>Provides protection against Infernog's evil spirits from hell for 20 min upon use.\nCan be used only on $map:02000410$. The effects are removed when the battle ends.</font>
key.guideDescription: \n<font color='#7A7A7A'>A device to protect the user's soul from Infernog's Hell Fog and evil spirits of hell. It's a prototype developed by the Sky Fortress Fleet's Supernatural Positive Science Division. With Tristan's advice, the funtion to adjust the spiritual world's frequency and block the interference of souls labeled as evil spirits in the material world was completed.\n"My ancestors would not have suffered hardship if they had this device." - Tristan</font>

Created from the snow of Frostheart. The shiny ice crystals will make your heart flutter.

Give a big thumbs up! Everyone loves a big thumbs up.

key.tooltipDescription: A tonic that helps you tap into the true power of certain skills.

key.tooltipDescription: A tonic that reveals what lies in the heart of all people: rage.
key.guideDescription: Grants a <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> chance to deal <font color='#00aaef'>200%</font> non-elemental damage for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> min. Item abilities inactive in battlegrounds and arenas. This effect persists even after being tombstoned.

key.tooltipDescription: The bottled experiences and memories of heroes past.
key.guideDescription: Consume to immediately gain <font color='#00aaef'>6,000,000</font> experience.

key.tooltipDescription: Quickly moves <font color='#00aaef'>2</font>Â m forward. Deals <font color='#00aaef'>60</font> damage to <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> enemy in your path.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 min cooldown | 10 sec duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Max Health +250</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Increases max health by <font color='#00aaef'>250</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 hr cooldown | 1 hr duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Enables Auto-Performance</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Double-click to obtain Auto-Performance buff.
key.guideDescription: The buff lasts for 1 hr while logged in. Merets will be deducted if auto extension is used.

key.tooltipDescription: All your fatigue instantly disappears when bite into this nutritious zongzi filled with glutinous rice.
key.guideDescription: Recovers <font color='#00aaef'>1200</font> health. Has a <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec cooldown.

key.tooltipDescription: A special magnetic lure that can only be used at the $map:63000060$. You may obtain a $item:30001153$ while fishing at the $map:63000060$.
key.guideDescription:
How to Get It:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Collect via mail after logging in while the event is in progress.
- Purchase from the $map:63000060$ Fisherman's Shop.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Any new lure will replace your current lure.</font>

Use the event map shortcut to quickly and easily navigate to $map:63000060$.

key.tooltipDescription: Celebrate the heat of the summer with these cool fireworks!

key.tooltipDescription: These fireworks will make you feel like you can take on the world! (Disclaimer: fireworks will not grant you the power to take on the world.)

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Sec Cooldown</font>\n<font size='24'>Heals Nearby Allies</font>
key.tooltipDescription: The Green Hoods created this device for fighting monsters out in the wilds. Use it to restore <font color='#00aaef'>150</font> health to nearby allies.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Serves Pizza</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Places a $item:20000981$ on the ground that lasts for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> sec. Increases bonus attack by <font color='#00aaef'>200</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min to party members within a <font color='#00aaef'>3</font>Â m radius who consume the pizza. Does not stack with other attack-type elixirs. This effect persists even after being tombstoned. This item's effect only applies in chaos raids.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nA hot pizza for your friends. The smell alone is enough to make you salivate.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A common herb found just about anywhere. It tastes sour and slightly sweet. Consume to recover <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> health per sec over <font color='#00aaef'>28</font> sec.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Sec Cooldown</font>\n<font size='24'>Heals Nearby Players</font>
key.tooltipDescription: The Green Hoods created this device for fighting monsters out in the wilds. Use it to restore <font color='#00aaef'>400</font> health to all nearby players.
Places a blockade wall in front of you. Players can't pass through the blockade, but they can destroy it. Use it when you need to hide, but be careful not to block your own escape!

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>8 Sec Cooldown | 8 Sec Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 1768 Health</font>

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>15 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Serves Fresh Fruit</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Places fresh fruit for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> sec. Does not stack with defensive elixirs. The effect will continue even after death.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nMany farmers lose their lives every year in the ongoing war against fruit-thieving monkeys. Honor their sacrifice by sharing a sweet snack with the ones you hold dear.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher that grants access to Maple World's special shop.
key.guideDescription: This voucher can be used to hire an assistant, or to customize your character at $npcName:11000255$'s Beauty Shop, Marcus's Dye Workshop, or a plastic surgeon.

key.tooltipDescription: A welcome pack full of goodies to help you on your adventures.
key.guideDescription: Double-click this item in your inventory to get what's inside.

key.tooltipDescription: A single-use walkie-talkie that will summon a Rotors Air helicopter taxi.
key.guideDescription: Select a location on your map and click the helicopter icon to travel there. It costs <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> walkie-talkie to go somewhere you've been before, and <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> walkie-talkies to travel to a new location.

key.tooltipDescription: A magic key that creates more keys. Magic this powerful takes time to recharge. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>24</font> hours.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: Adds <font color='#00aaef'>6</font> slots to the gear, furnishing, mount, and misc tabs of your inventory. Each tab can have up to <font color='#00aaef'>48</font> slots. Cannot be used if you've already reached maximum capacity.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: This voucher allows you to change your name. You will be logged out after changing your name. The new name will appear when you log back in.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: This voucher will change your character's gender. You will be logged out after changing your gender. The new gender will appear when you log back in. You can select your new face and hair from the options in the preview image below.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Note that the gender of any character skins you own will not change.

key.tooltipDescription: A magic key that creates more keys. Magic this powerful takes time to recharge. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>24</font> hours.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000515$, manager of the $map:02000216$, runs a remote trade service for VIP customers.
key.guideDescription: Use this radio anytime, anywhere to call a business helicopter and conduct trade in the $map:02000216$.

key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000515$, manager of the $map:02000216$, runs a remote trade service for VIP customers.
key.guideDescription: Use this radio anytime, anywhere to call a business helicopter and conduct trade in the $map:02000216$.

key.tooltipDescription: This radio has a direct line to Henry's General Hospital ER.
key.guideDescription: Calls for an emergency helicopter to treat the wounded. It cannot be used in dungeons.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>10 Min Cooldown | 10 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Lapenta Aegis</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This item channels the power of the Holy Lapenta, granting you protection while in the Shadow World.
key.guideDescription: Use this item to receive a temporary boost. It can only be used in the Shadow World, and will disappear once you leave. The timer for the effect will continue even while you are logged out.

key.tooltipDescription: This package contains <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> walkie-talkies that will let you call an air taxi. Also includes a bonus gift of merets, courtesy of Rotors Air Taxi.
key.guideDescription: Use to obtain merets and Rotors walkie-talkies.

key.tooltipDescription: This package contains <font color='#00aaef'>25</font> walkie-talkies that will let you call an air taxi. Also includes a bonus gift of merets, courtesy of Rotors Air Taxi.
key.guideDescription: Use to obtain merets and Rotors walkie-talkies.

key.tooltipDescription: This package contains <font color='#00aaef'>50</font> walkie-talkies that will let you call an air taxi. Also includes a bonus gift of merets, courtesy of Rotors Air Taxi.
key.guideDescription: Use to obtain merets and Rotors walkie-talkies.

key.tooltipDescription: This package contains <font color='#00aaef'>100</font> walkie-talkies that will let you call an air taxi. Also includes a bonus gift of merets, courtesy of Rotors Air Taxi.
key.guideDescription: Use to obtain merets and Rotors walkie-talkies.

key.tooltipDescription: This package contains <font color='#00aaef'>150</font> walkie-talkies that will let you call an air taxi. Also includes a bonus gift of merets, courtesy of Rotors Air Taxi.
key.guideDescription: Use to obtain merets and Rotors walkie-talkies.

key.tooltipDescription: A package of <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> elixirs that can instantly restore <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health. Elixirs have a <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> sec cooldown.
key.guideDescription: Use to obtain elixirs.

key.tooltipDescription: A package of <font color='#00aaef'>50</font> elixirs that can instantly restore <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health. Elixirs have a <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> sec cooldown.
key.guideDescription: Use to obtain elixirs.

key.tooltipDescription: A package of <font color='#00aaef'>100</font> elixirs that can instantly restore <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health. Elixirs have a <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> sec cooldown.
key.guideDescription: Use to obtain elixirs.

key.tooltipDescription: Contains <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> single-use walkie-talkies that you can use to call an emergency helicopter.
key.guideDescription: Use to obtain emergency radios.

key.tooltipDescription: Contains <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> single-use walkie-talkies that you can use to call an emergency helicopter.

key.tooltipDescription: Contains <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> Lapenta essences that grant you protection while in the Shadow World.
key.guideDescription: Use to obtain Lapenta essences.

key.tooltipDescription: A starter pack for Maplers who have created characters before. It is said that whoever begins their adventure with this pack will be blessed with good fortune.
key.guideDescription: Double-click this item in your inventory to get what's inside.

key.tooltipDescription: A disposable walkie-talkie produced by Rotors Air Taxi. Because it's only intended for special events, it doesn't have all of the functions of a normal walkie-talkie.
key.guideDescription: Calls an air taxi to travel to places you've already visited. However, this can't be used to travel anywhere you haven't been before.

key.tooltipDescription: This radio has a direct line to Henry's General Hospital ER.
key.guideDescription: Calls for an emergency helicopter to treat the wounded. It cannot be used in dungeons.

key.tooltipDescription: This package contains <font color='#00aaef'>300</font> walkie-talkies that will let you call an air taxi. Also includes a bonus gift of merets, courtesy of Rotors Air Taxi.
key.guideDescription: Use to obtain merets and Rotors walkie-talkies.

key.tooltipDescription: A pouch containing merets.
key.guideDescription: Use to get merets.

key.tooltipDescription: Use this voucher to change your hairstyle and hair color one time.
key.guideDescription: If you want to change your hairstyle, go to $map:52000008$ in $map:02000107$ and talk to $npcName:11000255$.

key.tooltipDescription: Use this voucher to change your face and eye color one time.
key.guideDescription: Go to $map:52000010$ in $map:02000107$ and talk to $npcName:11000071$ if you want to change your face.

key.tooltipDescription: Use this voucher to change your cosmetics one time.
key.guideDescription: Go to $map:52000008$ in $map:02000107$ and talk to $npcName:11000256$ if you want to liven up your face and experiment with new cosmetics styles.

key.tooltipDescription: You can change the color of your equipment one time for free by using this voucher.
key.guideDescription: Go to $map:52000009$ in $map:02000107$ and talk to $npcName:11000257$ if you want to breathe new life into your equipment by changing its color.

key.tooltipDescription: Allows you to send one channel chat for free.
key.guideDescription: This voucher will be used instead of merets when you use channel chat.

key.tooltipDescription: Allows you to send one world chat for free.
key.guideDescription: This voucher will be used instead of merets when you use world chat.

key.tooltipDescription: Use this voucher to revive on the spot one time.
key.guideDescription: This coupon will be used when you revive on the spot.

key.tooltipDescription: Use this voucher to change your skin tone one time.
key.guideDescription: To change your skin, talk to Doctor Zenko at $map:52000010$ in $map:02000107$.

key.tooltipDescription: A package carefully prepared by a slime looking for friends to play MapleStory 2 with.
key.guideDescription: Use this to obtain items.

key.tooltipDescription: A pouch containing merets.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#ff5400'>Double-click this item in your inventory to obtain its contents.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>10 Sec Cooldown | 3 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Alters Voice</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Raise the pitch of your voice with this helium gas. Just don't overdo it.
key.guideDescription: The timer for this effect will continue even while you are logged out. The system message sound cannot be changed.

key.tooltipDescription: A magic key that creates more keys. Magic this powerful takes time to recharge. Has a cooldown of <font color='#00aaef'>24</font> hours.

key.tooltipDescription: A mystical scroll with the power to open a teleport gate, bringing all party members to one location.
key.guideDescription: Automatically used by pressing the Summon Party button while in a party. Cannot be used in dungeons, event maps, or houses.

key.tooltipDescription: A mystical scroll with the power to open a teleport gate, bringing all guild members to one location.
key.guideDescription: When used, gives guild members the option to teleport to you. Cannot summon guild members who are on other continents. Cannot be used in dungeons, event maps, or houses.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher that can be exchanged for a specially designed Halloween weapon.
key.guideDescription: These can be exchanged for various Halloween weapon skins by taking them to $npcName:11001164$ in $map:02000333$. One voucher will get you one weapon. $npcName:11001164$ will be available on Maple Island until November 26, so don't miss your chance!

key.mainDescription: Connect to Goldus Bank\nSummons Bank Safe
key.tooltipDescription: Goldus Bank developed this MTM, or Mobile Teller Machine, to allow its customers to access bank services from anywhere in the world. All the comforts of your local branch at the click of a button.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory to summon a safe.

key.mainDescription: Connect to Goldus Bank\nSummons Bank Safe
key.tooltipDescription: Goldus Bank developed this MTM, or Mobile Teller Machine, to allow its customers to access bank services from anywhere in the world. All the comforts of your local branch at the click of a button.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory to summon a safe.

key.tooltipDescription: Contains a gender change voucher and a variety of other beauty vouchers.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to get what's inside. Using $item:20300007$ will not change the gender of any outfits you own.

key.tooltipDescription: Contains an exceptional hat just for you.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to get what's inside. Contains a hat that is suitable for your character's job. <font color='#FF4040'>Beginners will receive a star item for a random job.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: Contains an exceptional suit just for you.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to get what's inside. Berserkers, Knights, Wizards, Priests, Rangers, Heavy Gunners, and Assassins will receive a suit that corresponds to their respective job. <font color='#FF4040'>Beginners will receive a star item from a random job. Thieves, Runeblades, and Soul Binders cannot use this item.</font>

key.guideDescription: Use to get mesos.

key.tooltipDescription: This package contains <font color='#00aaef'>25</font> walkie-talkies that will let you call an air taxi. Also includes a bonus gift of merets, courtesy of Rotors Air Taxi. Because it's a special item, you will also receive a pouch containing <font color='#00aaef'>1,500,000</font> mesos.
key.guideDescription: Use to obtain merets and Rotors walkie-talkies.

key.guideDescription: Calls an air taxi to travel to places you've already visited. However, this can't be used to travel anywhere you haven't been before.

key.tooltipDescription: This voucher allows you to change your name. You will be logged out after changing your name. The new name will appear when you log back in.

key.tooltipDescription: Adds <font color='#00aaef'>6</font> slots to the gear, furnishing, mount, and misc tabs of your inventory. Each tab can have up to <font color='#00aaef'>48</font> slots. Cannot be used if you've already reached maximum capacity.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: This voucher will change your character's gender. You will be logged out after changing your gender. The new gender will appear when you log back in. You can select your new face and hair from the options in the preview image below.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Note that the gender of any character skins you own will not change.

key.tooltipDescription: This voucher will grant you <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> additional character slot. You can add up to <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> additional slots. It cannot be used if you've already reached maximum capacity.

<font color="#FFFFFF">This attribute change voucher can be only used on level 50 epic weapons. The max attack of the weapon, its type, and the value of its bonus attributes will change upon use.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Cannot use on weapons that do not have bonus attributes or allow a max attack increase.
Voucher cannot be used on items with fixed bonus attributes.
Even after using the voucher, you may wind up with the same attribute types and values.</font>

Even after using the voucher, you may wind up with the same attribute types and values.</font>

<font color="#FFFFFF">Cannot use voucher on the following items:
- Armor that has two strength/intelligence/dexterity/luck as bonus attributes (except gloves).
- Gloves that have strength/intelligence/dexterity/luck as bonus attributes.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A special package containing a lot of cool items.
key.guideDescription: Can be only used for level <font color='#ff8ae5'>48</font> to <font color='#ff8ae5'>50</font> weapons, tops, bottoms, and suits that are normal, rare, exceptional, or epic. Enchants the item to <font color='#ff8ae5'>+10</font> to <font color='#ff8ae5'>+12</font>. Double-click the item in your inventory window to get what's inside. Cannot be used on items that are enchanted to <font color='#ff8ae5'>+10</font> or higher.

key.guideDescription: Use to get mesos.

key.tooltipDescription: A box containing vouchers to change the attributes of an item.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click the item in your inventory window to get what's inside.

<font color="#FFFFFF">This attribute change voucher can be only used on level 50 epic and legendary weapons. The max attack of the weapon, its type, and the value of its bonus attributes will change upon use.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Cannot use on weapons that do not have bonus attributes or allow a max attack increase.
Voucher cannot be used on items with fixed bonus attributes.
Even after using the voucher, you may wind up with the same attribute types and values.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A box containing vouchers to change the attributes of an item.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click the item in your inventory window to get what's inside.

<font color="#FFFFFF">This attribute change voucher can be only used on level 50 epic and legendary hats, suits, tops, bottoms, gloves, and shoes. The value of its bonus attributes will change upon use.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Cannot use on items that do not have bonus attributes or display an attribute change count.
Even after using the voucher, you may wind up with the same attribute types and values.</font>

<font color="#FFFFFF">Cannot use voucher on the following items:
- Armor that has two strength/intelligence/dexterity/luck as bonus attributes (except gloves)
- Glvoes that have strength/intelligence/dexterity/luck as bonus attributes.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: The accessories in this box possess special powers. If you equip all 3, you can gain the Kindred Strength effect.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to get what's inside.\nKindred Strength increases weapon attack by <font color='#00aaef'>2.6%</font>, bonus attack by <font color='#00aaef'>115</font>, and piercing by <font color='#00aaef'>2.4%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> sec. Can only be occur once every <font color='#00aaef'>45</font> sec. All <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> items in the Shuabritze Family set must be equipped. The effect can't be triggered in battlegrounds or arenas.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher used to increase the number of dungeon rewards you can receive.
key.guideDescription: Click the Add Rewards button for a dungeon in the dungeon directory window to add dungeon rewards.\nThe more rewards you add, the more vouchers will be used.\nThe increased rewards will reset when the dungeon reward count is reset. You cannot add rewards from inside the dungeon.

key.mainDescription: Connect to Goldus Bank\nSummons Bank Safe
key.tooltipDescription: Goldus Bank developed this MTM, or Mobile Teller Machine, to allow its customers to access bank services from anywhere in the world. All the comforts of your local branch at the click of a button.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory to summon a safe.

key.tooltipDescription: A special package created to commemorate G-Star 2016. Contains items that can help you grow during your adventures. Also contains Jonathan, a seagull who'd love to sit on your head.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click the item in your inventory window to get what's inside. The item expires 30 days after opening.

<font color='#FFFFFF'>Contains the following items:</font>

<font color='#FFFFFF'> - 30 Elixirs</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - 30 Master Potions</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A disposable walkie-talkie produced by Rotors Air Taxi. Because it's only intended for special events, it doesn't have all of the functions of a normal walkie-talkie.

key.tooltipDescription: A package containing potions and vouchers to help you level.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click the item in your inventory window to get what's inside.
You must be level 50 or higher to use this.

<font color='#FFFFFF'>$item:20000320$ Effect (90 Min Duration)</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Combat Experience +50%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Performance Experience +50%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Fishing Experience +50%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Meso Drops +50%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Physical and Magic Attack +3%</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'>Attribute boosts are not granted on battlegrounds.</font>

The level-up booster remains even after death and the timer does not continue while logged out. Additional experience boosters cannot be used while an existing level-up booster is active.

Double-click the item in your inventory to use it. Select Adventure -> Level Up at the bottom of the screen to check on the status of your level up.

<font color='#FFFFFF'>Main Level up Rewards</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - </font><font color='#C888FF'>Fantastic +9 Enchant Scroll</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - </font><font color='#C888FF'>Excellent +8 Enchant Scroll</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - </font><font color='#C888FF'>Mysterious Weapon Box</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - </font><font color='#C888FF'>Devorak's Box</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - </font><font color='#45D1FF'>Wild Rider Box</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - Experience Up! Level Up Potion
 - Free Beauty Voucher Package
 - Lulu's Key Shard
 - Double Fun Weapon Box
 - Dance-to-the-Beat Box
 - Name Tag: Twinkling Star (30 Days)
 - Chat Bubble: Twinkling Starlight (30 Days)</font>
<font color="#FF5F5F">You also have a chance to get items not mentioned above.
You can still claim your reward after you've reached level 50.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll that gives you your daily rewards.

key.tooltipDescription: A box containing Mendel's sweet Valentine's Day chocolate.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click this in your inventory to receive 1 item of your choice. Whichever NPC receives the most chocolate by the end of the event will grant their promised boon. 

<font color='#FFFFFF'>Promised Boons</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - </font><font color='#FFFFFF'>Blake: Special Hairstyle 20% Discount</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - </font><font color='#FFFFFF'>Miel From the Star: Lovely Bunny Appearance Resale</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - </font><font color='#FFFFFF'>Startz: Auto-fishing Meso Event</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - </font><font color='#FFFFFF'>Ishura: Experience +200% Hot Day</font>
<font color='#FFFFFF'> - </font><font color='#FFFFFF'>Chairman Goldus: 7 Day Premium Club Membership</font>

key.tooltipDescription: This special perk celebrates your first Premium Club Membership purchase.

key.tooltipDescription: A box that holds various cube-shaped furnishing materials. Use it to obtain a set of four matching blocks.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory to acquire that item. The acquired material is automatically added to the material list and can be viewed when furnishing your home.

key.tooltipDescription: Allows you to trade an item that's already reached its trade limit.
key.guideDescription: Use these ribbons to add an additional trade to gear that has already reached its trading limit.\n\n<font color="#FF5F5F">Only usable on epic and legendary gear that is level 50 or above. Not usable on permanently bound, broken, or locked items.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A package of 50 Trader's Ribbons. These handy ribbons allow you to trade items that have already reached their trade limit.

key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to obtain 1 item of your choice. It will be added to your furnishing list, accessible in Furnishing Mode.

key.tooltipDescription: A capsule containing a random pet. Is it an exceptional pet like a hard-adventure boss, or a rare monster you'd catch in the wild? There's only one way to find out!

key.tooltipDescription: A box that contains a Dark Lumiera fragment. Combine to obtain a weapon fragment that suits your job.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to get what's inside.\nThe weapon fragment inside will be bound to your character, so think carefully before opening it.

key.tooltipDescription: This meret-filled gold egg has a tendency to explode, showering you and those around you in merets.
key.guideDescription:
Double-clicking the item grants you event merets and posts a link in chat. Up to 5 players may click the link to receive their own event merets.

<font color="#FF5F5F">This message will only be displayed within the same map.</font>
<font color="#FF5F5F">A total of 500 event merets are distributed between you and the other 5 players you share with.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A disposable walkie-talkie produced by Rotors Air Taxi. Because it's only intended for special events, it doesn't have all of the functions of a normal walkie-talkie.
key.guideDescription: Calls an air taxi to travel to places you've already visited. However, this can't be used to travel anywhere you haven't been before.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher used to increase the number of dungeon rewards you can receive.
key.guideDescription: Click the Add Rewards button for a dungeon in the dungeon directory window to add dungeon rewards. The more rewards you add, the more vouchers will be used. The increased rewards will reset when the dungeon reward count is reset. You cannot add rewards from inside the dungeon.

key.tooltipDescription: This proprietary personal portal, developed by Grumi Games, lets you host your own mini-games. Gather up your friends, have fun, and get experience while you're at it!
key.guideDescription: Double-click to open a mini-game portal.

key.mainDescription: <font size='24'>Instantly recovers health and spirit by 30%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A lucky mooncake that makes you feel like something joyful will happen when you take a bite.
key.guideDescription: Double-click this in your inventory to instantly recover 30% health and spirit and also receive one of the items below.

key.mainDescription: <font size='24'>Instantly recovers health and spirit by 80%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A mysterious mooncake that makes you feel like something exciting will happen if you take a bite.

key.tooltipDescription: Automatically used to claim an extra dungeon clear reward.
key.guideDescription: If you clear a dungeon with this in your possession, you'll receive an additional clear reward. Note that this count will count toward your max rewards, and that it cannot be used if you have already reached the dungeon's reward limit. The number of vouchers required to obtain the extra rewards varies by dungeon.

key.tooltipDescription: Double-click to obtain auto-fishing buff.
key.guideDescription: The buff lasts for 1 hour. This timer is paused whenever you log off. Use the voucher, and then use your Fishing Pole to begin auto-fishing. Currency will be deducted on-demand if auto-extension is active.

- Receive 1 via mail after logging in.
- Receive upon winning MC Kay events (PvP events excluded).

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Cooldown | 15 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='14'>Increases Attack/Health/Movement Speed</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Colorful sugar powder is sprinkled over this chocolate. The sweet taste is one of its kind.
key.guideDescription: Increases attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font>, max health by <font color='#00aaef'>5%</font>, and movement speed by <font color='#00aaef'>5%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> min.

key.tooltipDescription: A box containing a title and insignia that can only be used by elite members of Sky Fortress.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click the item in your inventory to obtain the Alliance Guardian title and Alliance Guardian insignia. The status of the Alliance Guardian insignia will change to in use as soon as it's obtained.

<font color='#FFD200'>Alliance Guardian Insignia Effects

- Common Monster Damage +3%
- Attack Speed +3%

</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A box containing a title and insignia filled with spring blessing.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click the item in your inventory to obtain the Harbinger of Spring title and Golden Flame Butterfly insignia. The status of the Golden Flame Butterfly insignia will change to in use as soon as it's obtained.

<font color='#FFD200'>Golden Flame Butterfly Insignia Effects

- Boss Damage +3%
- Piercing +3%

</font>

key.tooltipDescription: Automatically used to claim an extra dungeon clear reward.
key.guideDescription: If you clear a dungeon with this in your possession, you'll receive an additional clear reward. Note that this count will count toward your max rewards, and that it cannot be used if you have already reached the dungeon's reward limit. The number of vouchers required to obtain the extra rewards varies by dungeon.

key.tooltipDescription: A treasure dungeon bonus reward voucher. You can get boxes containing spirit guardstones and spirit spellstones from treasure dungeons.
key.guideDescription: You must add to the dungeon reward count to enter a treasure dungeon. Click the Add Rewards button at the dungeon entrance window to add dungeon rewards. Each click of the button uses twice as many vouchers. The increased reward amount will reset when the dungeon reward count is reset. You cannot add rewards from the inside of the dungeon.

key.tooltipDescription: This healthy vitamin-infused candy will give your pet a boost for a few days.
key.guideDescription: Double-click this item, then drag a hungry pet into the Feed Pet window. Using the same kind of candy will cause the duration to stack. You can feed your pet for up to 365 days. Feeding this candy to your pet will overwrite any other type of candy effects. Hungry pets get no benefit from candy.

key.guideDescription: A voucher that allows you to instantly change to a hairstyle without visiting the beauty salon. You can only change to a hairstyle that matches your gender.

key.tooltipDescription: An ad balloon that displays the text of your choosing (max 100 characters). The balloon stands wherever you place it for 24 hours, displaying your message to anyone who interacts with it. You can also allow players to use the balloon to travel directly to your home.
key.guideDescription: The ad balloon appears only in the channel where it is placed. Each account owner may place up to 3 per channel, but only on top of common field blocks. Take note that the duration timer is not paused for maintenance, and the ad test cannot be changed once placed.

key.tooltipDescription: Double-click to enter the name of the character who will received the matching Buddy Badge. Your own badge will appear in your inventory, while your friend's will arrive by mail. When two characters with paired badges are within 1.5Â m of each other, a special effect will be triggered.
key.guideDescription: The special effect only triggers when two characters with paired badges stand in close proximity. Moving causes the effect to end after 5 seconds. Note that opening the chest binds the badge to this character.

key.tooltipDescription: Send a worldwide message with a special background and fancy icons. Thanks to advances in modern science, you can now shout symbols at an ear-shattering volume audible across the globe!
key.guideDescription: You can send a Super Chat message by double-clicking a theme, or using the Channel Selector at the bottom of the chat window. Themes are automatically consumed when you send a message.

key.guideDescription: To view all unlocked medals, go to the Mushking Royale Medals menu and press the + button.
