key.tooltipDescription: Latent flame absorbed by $npcName:21000087$. Collect 50, gather them in a reliquary at $map:02000049$, then say the magic words to make $item:30000201$.
Fishing tackle you can sell to a merchant.
A net you can sell to a merchant.
An antique vase of unknown origin.
An antique shard of unknown origin.
An old book written in an ancient language. Can be sold to a merchant.
The fossil of an ancient aquatic creature. Can be sold to a merchant.
A pearl with a beautiful shine. Can be sold to a merchant.
A squishy red starfish. Can be sold to a merchant.
A hard pebble. Can be sold to a merchant.
A sharp $npcName:21000059$ claw. Can be sold to a merchant.
Mud commonly found under the rocks in $map:02000051$. Mixed with a lot of moss.
A precious ore only found in the Land of Darkness. It takes the highest skill to polish this black stone.
This key opens the barbed wire fence that blocks the 8th floor of the Golden Tower.
A record of $npcName:11000173$'s transactions. Mentions an iron deal with $npcName:11000171$ of $map:02000100$.
$npcName:11000172$'s master key. Opens the rental storage building in $map:02000064$.
A suspicious ledger listing transactions by date.
A message for $npcName:11000492$. "We've been found out! I'm going to $map:52000037$ in $map:02000043$. Come find me!"
This old notebook lists various transactions. It was dropped by the $npcName:11003167$ in $map:52000037$.
A photo of $npcName:11000012$ and an old lady smiling together. Found in a cargo box that belongs to $npcName:11000492$.
The last letter $npcName:11000492$ sent to his mother before disappearing.
A mesh bag $npcName:11000190$ uses to store herbs.
A maple branch infused with the power to disrupt ice magic.
A ball of light carried by $npcName:21000069$. Put your ears against it to hear music that fills you with the desire of dance.
A bag full of black mushrooms collected by $npcName:11000190$. Give it to Hofmann's wife.
A tool used to dig out clams along the beach.
A message from $npcName:11000074$ to $npcName:11000075$ in a sealed envelope. By the look on $npcName:11000074$'s face, it might be about $npcName:11000057$.
A list of adventurers you've defeated.
A circuit board taken from a robot. Used to hack communication devices.
An ID card that belongs to $npcName:11000526$, the leader of the Barrota Trading Company.
A badge belonging to the head of the Barrota Trading Company.
A wanted poster for $npcName:11000064$, issued for the murder of Winn Stilton.
This bottle used to contain a sample of an experimental medicine.
A USB stick containing the hacking files $npcName:11000594$ created using $item:30000035$.
Bullies took this brand new jacket from $npcName:11000526$.
Bullies took these brand new sneakers from $npcName:11000526$.
A blueprint of Fellowstone Tower, a futuristic high-rise tower.
$npcName:11000221$ lovingly prepared this lunch for her father, $npcName:11000222$.
It's unclear who owns this key. It doesn't look all that useful.
A ring $npcName:11000223$ gave to $npcName:11000224$ as a token of love.
A mysterious bag that was found behind the altar of $map:02000229$.
An analysis of the medicine produced by Goldus Pharmaceutical.
Lost shoes that belong to $npcName:11000081$.
Part of the oil pipeline.
Part of the oil pipeline. It's too corroded to be of any use.
A cardboard box often used when moving house.
$npcName:11000110$ collected this maple seed from the hills of $map:63000001$. Nutritious and delicious, it's used in many dishes.
This rock used to be common in the Vayar Mountains. Now that the Vayar Mountains have split, it's become very rare.

This stone is infused with ancient knowledge. The stone giants of ancient Vayar used to carry it with them to gain supernatural insight. They became puppets of evil when their stones were corrupted. You can sense the location of other cachamaxai with this rock.
A fragmented shard of the Blue Lapenta. Mysterious spies stole it from the Command Center.
A weekly real estate brochure issued to the brokers of Goldus Real Estate. Filled with information about house rentals.
$npcName:11000076$ collected this pouch of $itemPlural:30000181$ from $map:02000146$.
An official recommendation from $npcName:11000076$ for you as a defender of Maple World.
A book written by Moda, a pioneer in the field of geology. It's one of the oldest known works on the subject.
Research notes prepared by a young geologist. They focus on mysterious and unexplained geological phenomena.
Tells the story of Dr. Renovo, a man who once dug an underground tunnel to study the principles of geology.
A "love potion" made from the tears of $npcName:11000285$, a romantic turtle who pines for a lover who passed away. It looks suspiciously like water.
A bag containing cash and records of illicit dealings. $npcName:11000529$ offered this bag to someone who would reveal the secret of $npcName:11000044$.
An ancient book containing every bit of $npcName:11000042$'s peerless magic knowledge.
An ancient tribe gave this lucky charm to $npcName:23000020$ as a token of respect. Place it in your home for pleasant dreams and inspiration.
Glass slippers belonging to $npcName:11000284$. She's never worn them for fear they might break.
Ingredients for a banquet in the empress's honor. There's only a little left after the recent earthquake.
Young frogs from $map:02000022$. They're natural prey to the native lizards. Release them on the lotus leaves in $map:02000022$ to keep them safe.
A rare fish from the deepest waters of Ellua River. Fishing enthusiasts the world over compete to get their hands on this fish.
Material taken from $npcName:21090182$. It has a broad grain pattern, making it ideal for building instruments.
A bucket borrowed from Jake the farmer. It's been filled with water.
A list of the contracts between $npcName:11000526$ and $npcName:11000044$, as well as other services that have been performed.
A small flame capable of purifying souls and objects of demonic influence. It was taken from an everlasting flame of purification.
A blueprint stolen from $npcName:11000301$.
A blueprint discarded by $npcName:11000353$. Use the blank side to take notes.
A book of matches. Perfect for starting a fire.
The evil $npcName:11000303$ dropped this mask upon death.
$npcName:21000052$'s claw. Sharp and hard, it is often used to make sewing needles.
The font in this book is so small that it's hard to read. It looks like someone placed it on the wrong bookshelf because they couldn't read the title.
$npcName:11000335$'s master key. It unlocks the robot storage in $map:02000163$.
$npcName:11000335$'s latest invention, a robot with full artificial intelligence. Made-to-order for the wealthiest 0.1%.
The Pigmings use this as an offering in their rituals.
Shiny, golden sand found in some parts of the Vayar Mountains. Known for its power to purify souls.
A history book containing records and anecdotes of Maple World.
A mask taken from a $npcName:21000225$. Legend has it that you can summon $npcName:21000425$ by placing it on the altar at $map:02000047$.
A feather infused with the holy power of Vayar. Believed to bring good luck.
Signature bread baked by the Mendel Confectionery. Simple yet addictive.
An axe made from sturdy bamboo and knife-like blades. $npcName:11000203$'s name is carved on the handle.

This wooden horn was created with the help of $npcName:11000479$ of $map:02000076$. Because it makes a sound similar to the call of a $npcName:23000019$, $npcName:23000021$ will open the gate if you play this horn in front of his nest in $map:02000046$.
Cement made from $npcName:21000029$ residue.
A time capsule containing the memories of Manu and his wife Madelle.
A key to one of Kumbawanka's treasures.
$npcName:29000023$'s cape. Gives off a mysterious light.
This ice pack will come in handy on hot summer days.
A red meteorite fragment. Polish it to make a nice conversation starter for your home.
A blue meteorite fragment. Polish it to make a nice conversation starter for your home.
A green meteorite fragment. Polish it to make a nice conversation starter for your home.
A key for a locked bookcase.
A flier for iron distributed by $npcName:11000173$.
$npcName:11000368$'s potion. It speeds up tree growth.
A record if iron deals between $npcName:11000173$ and $npcName:11000171$. It will come in handy when interrogating $npcName:11000171$.
Contains an electronic chip that can open $npcName:11000173$'s safe.
Dark energy removed from $npcName:11000304$'s $item:30000187$ in order to temporarily purify it.
It's unclear who owns this flask. Doesn't look all that useful.
A camera with an excellent zoom lens.
A cool photo of $npcName:11000406$.
This balloon belongs to $npcName:11000389$, the balloon peddler.
$npcName:21000062$'s hide.
The hide of $npcName:22000022$, tyrant of $map:02000117$.
This style of notebook is often used as a ledger by members of the Barrota Trading Company. Its owner is unknown.
It's unclear who owns this pendant. Doesn't look all that useful.
A shiny bolt exclusively used in city water tanks.
An oxidized and corroded bolt from a city water tank.
This money was taken from a convenience store cash register.
A mass of old and rusty scrap iron. It can be melted in a waste-treatment plant furnace.
Made by melting scrap iron in a furnace. Solidify it to make iron ore.
Pudding made by $npcName:11000002$. It's sweet, delicious, and dangerously addictive.
This conical tree was cultivated by $npcName:11000368$.
Freshly harvested honey.
It's unclear who owns this ring. Doesn't look all that useful.
Hard and tasteless. $npcName:21090071$ likes to chuck these apples at enemies.
A lovingly packed lunch for $npcName:11000111$'s uncle. It shows how much $npcName:11000111$ cares.
Alberto whittled this jewel box by hand. It's empty and waiting to be filled.
A ruby necklace Alberto gave to Roanna as a token of everlasting love. Its brilliant shine has stood the test of time.
Roanna's jewel box. It contains the ruby necklace Alberto gave her as a token of everlasting love.
A picture of $npcName:11000424$'s granddaughter, Maggie. Old and faded, you can feel how much $npcName:11000424$ misses her.
Maggie, the granddaughter of $npcName:11000424$, made this headband for her doll. It's adorned with a big purple ribbon.
A box for storing precious items. It contains the diamond engagement ring $npcName:11000325$ purchased for his girlfriend.
Toh used to carry this copper key. It might open the lock on the gate to the mine. It's said to be Toh's den.
Thick, green sap extracted from the stalks and leaves of $npcName:21000038$. It smells terrible, but it's coveted for its magical properties.
A corn dog made of fresh $npcName:21000059$. Every bite is juicy and delicious.
An ornithology encyclopedia written by Dr. Elivan. It contains information on every bird living in Maple World.
This red ore is commonly found in regions with active volcanic activity.
A topical cream created by $npcName:11000695$ to lift transfiguration curses.
A residency permit for the apartment buildings built by the Goldus Construction Company.
key.guideDescription: Grants access to Maple Apartments in $map:02000119$ for 30 days.

key.tooltipDescription:
Contains various furnishings for your land. The ideal package for designing a modern house.

<font color='#ff5400'>Double-click the package in your inventory after purchase.
</font>
A rare opal. You could sell it to a merchant for a good price.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: A rare sapphire. You could sell it to a merchant for a good price.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: A precious diamond. You could sell it to a merchant for a good price.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: A logbook of $npcName:11000444$'s 10-year voyage. It's become hard to read due to water smearing the ink on the pages.
A navigation permit issued by the Adventurer's Guild. You need this permit to anchor your ship at docks around Maple World.
This deed certifies that this land belongs to $npcName:11000342$. Does not guarantee home insurance. Call the number on the back for more information.
Imbued with the souls of the heroes who defeated $npcName:23090005$ long ago. Use the $npcName:11000345$ to awaken the souls.
A relic reclaimed by an awakened soul. It can be used to restore the power of $item:13200028$.
In ancient times, sorcerers used these chests to seal away important items. Contains $item:13200028$, which has been restored by $npcName:11001046$.
A nameless wildflower. It's unclear how it might be useful.
An old, dull sword. Looks pretty useless.
A crumpled paper flower. If you open it up, you'll see an unfinished drawing of $npcName:11000010$ from $map:02000001$ on the back.
Full of black, raw stones reclaimed from the Golden Tower.
An agreement to forgive $npcName:11000502$ in order to avoid future conflict.
A freshly laid golden egg. A rare item that sells at a high price.
A useless pebble.
A key for room 1004 at the Troy Inn, where $npcName:11000179$ used to stay.
A bundle of mail addressed to $npcName:11000492$.
The mayer of $map:02000100$ issued this search warrant for the office of $npcName:11000526$, chief executive of the Barrota Trading Company.
A business application filed by $npcName:11000491$ claiming oil development rights in $map:02000100$ and centered around $map:02000148$. The suggestions section is blank.
A business application filed by $npcName:11000491$ claiming oil development rights in $map:02000100$ and centered around $map:02000148$. It has been endorsed by $npcName:11000245$.
An expensive-looking gold bar. May not be real gold.
A scribbled note: "Every full moon for the last five years, here I am, in this place... Why must I endure this curse?"
A wireless energy-transmitting chip developed by Dr. Kartronic during the MK 52 project. As he was once the director of the $map:02000187$, this can also be used to open $map:02000232$.
$npcName:11000114$ brought this balloon in hopes of finding its owner. A name tag on the string reads "$npcName:11000389$."
A weapon dropped by the leader of the monsters that attacked the northeast outpost in $map:02000054$.
A component of the latest crossbow design from $map:02000203$.
A jewel found in a basket in $map:02000238$. The basket was once full of items to be distributed to the audience.
A scroll listing construction materials required at $map:02000136$. Signed by $npcName:11000220$.
Contains secret orders from $npcName:11000044$, addressed to someone in Dark Wind. The message has been sealed and cannot be read.
This rare, nearly weightless ball of fuzz floats around in the wind. No one knows where it came from, or how it was created.
Black, hard-rimmed glasses lost by $npcName:11000595$. Looking through the lenses makes you dizzy.
A gelatinous substance acquired by hunting $npcName:22090107$. It has a distinctive smell that makes you dizzy.
Lenty's favorite shoe. It was crushed under some rocks.

Permeated with dark energy, this fragment has the power to drive the cruel-hearted further into the depths of evil. Uniting the scattered fragments creates a mirror that allows one to see into the Land of Darkness of the past. Take it to $npc:11000327$ in $map:02000001$.
$npcName:11000074$ commissioned this painting from $npcName:11000530$. It looks very much like $npcName:11000058$, but something seems... off.
A letter sealed with the wax stamp of $npcName:11000075$.

The heart of the stoniconda, a vicious snake that once terrorized the mountains of $map:02000051$. Legend says that its skin and bones melted in a river of lava, but that the heart still remained somewhere beneath the flowing magma.
It's said that tens of thousands of $npcNamePlural:21000037$ can sprout from one of these tiny seeds.
$npcName:22000007$ gained the power to control the wind by eating this fruit.
A treasure passed down among traditional witches. It's said that you can use it to hold souls.

$npcName:11000531$ was a celebrated poet in Maple World. This is a posthumous collection of his work. $npcName:11000531$, who runs a bookstore in $map:02000147$, signed the last page of the book as a joke.
A sharp dragon claw that pulses with dark energy.
A source of evil extracted from the claws of a demon. $npcName:23000025$ could use this to bring chaos and darkness to forests of $map:02000023$.
A complete accounting of the spells of Akabonari, the pop star of witches.
A milky-white feather taken from $npcName:11000677$. It's soft and fluffy.

A rock imbued with the power of evil and chaos. It's often used as a crude currency in the Shadow World. <font color='#00aaef'>Can be used to purchase items from Shadow Merchants in the Shadow World Shelter.</font>
A fragment of karma that has been shattered by a mysterious force. All that remains is a sliver of unremarkable stone.
A plastic bag containing blended tropical fruits and ice. This refreshing treat is all the rage.
A material for repairing broken ladders. Also used in mushroom house construction.

A crumpled note found in $npcName:22090166$'s pocket. It reads as follows:\n"My beloved daughter, there is nothing I would not have done to trade in the hand that fate dealt us. I have moved heaven and earth to make you whole, and procured a special serum that should reverse your malady. Soon you will awaken, and things can be as they were before. Wait for me, we will be together soon."
Flint discovered in $map:02000048$. Even the slightest friction will create sparks.
An emblem carried by the Penumbran Host. Includes descriptions of their battle strategy written in a dark language.
A flame made from concentrated hellfire. It can unlock $map:02000207$, where ancient treasures await.
A small, smooth rock.
Glasses lost by $npcName:11000710$. Be a hero and return them.
Monsters stole this ladle to pick on the slow-moving $npcName:11000705$.
Sweet and sticky yellow liquid. Believed to boost energy and have an anti-aging effect.
$npcName:29000001$ liver from $map:02000172$. It smells like a rabbit's toilet.
A fish bait container. It's very portable.
A key carried by employees of the palace.
$npcName:22000011$'s cursed axe. They say that just carrying it will turn you into a zombie...
Contains a variety of $npcName:40000022$'s everyday items, along with some important documents.
An encoded Lumina Liberation Army message. It reads, "$map:03000135$, underground passage, parking lot."
Details on the 12th civilian rescue plan of the Lumina Liberation Army.
A no entry sign for construction areas.
Explosive industrial oil. Used as an ingredient in homemade grenades.
A crude liquid extracted from $item:20000102$. The main material for making $item:20000046$.
A secret command from $npcName:11000076$ is written on this.
$npcName:11000804$'s report on $npcName:11000076$'s secret orders.
A decorative fountain pen made of pure gold. It was awarded to $npcName:11000492$ as commendation for being an exemplary manager.
A pendant $npcName:11000492$ kept secret for years. He looks at it whenever he misses his mother.
This used to be $npcName:11000526$'s favorite watch. It's made of solid gold.
A golden badge that's been passed down to the leadership of the Barrota Trading Company for generations. $npcName:11000526$'s name is engraved on it.
Glasses with broken lenses. Since you can't wear them, you may as well sell them.
It's not worth it to patch these old socks. Better to sell them than to be seen wearing these ratty things.
Secondhand gum. Yuck! You should sell it to a merchant.
This vintage wallet looks like it was dunked in toxic waste. Maybe a merchant will take it off your hands.
A rusty nail. You should sell it to a shop.
When your leg is broken, you use a crutch. When your crutch is broken, you sell it to a shop.
Water used to boil herbs for potions. Can be obtained from monsters.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: Water used to boil herbs. Can be obtained from monsters.
Has a rejuvenating effect. Dry before boiling. Can be obtained from monsters.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: This fruit has energy-boosting properties. Its juice is used to make potions. Can be obtained from monsters.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: A rare mushroom that thrives in dark, creepy places, like crypts. Used to make potions. Can be obtained from monsters.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: A mix of shrimp, squid, clam, and other seafood. Can be purchased from crafting material merchants.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: A medley of fruits, including lemons, oranges, grapes, and more. Can be purchased from crafting material merchants.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: A mix of vegetables, including carrots, onions, potatoes, and more. Can be purchased from crafting material merchants.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: A collection of grains, including rice, barley, wheat, and more. Can be purchased from crafting material merchants.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: A package of dairy products, including cheese, cream, and chocolate, used to bake various pastries. Can be purchased from crafting material merchants.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: Contains all sorts of flavorings for a variety of drinks. Can be purchased from crafting material merchants.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: Suspicious meat obtained from a monster. Used as a cooking ingredient.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: Suspicious seasoning obtained from a monster. Used for cooking.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: Suspicious sweetener obtained from a monster. Used for cooking or making drinks.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: A fresh chicken for your next culinary masterpiece. Can be purchased from crafting material merchants.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: This wide-tooth comb is a must-have item for the fashion-sensitive $npcName:21000013$.
This drink will keep you hydrated while working under the scorching sun. It's $npcName:11000352$'s favorite.
A natural insecticide made by $npcName:11000867$. While it's extremely effective against bugs, it's harmless to humans.
It's not technically a hat, but $npcName:21000161$ uses it like one. At least it's warm!
This used to be an apple. Long ago. Now it just stinks.
$npcName:11000471$'s old camera was passed down from his father. What image was $npcName:11000471$ trying to capture with this?
This toolbox was left behind at the outer walls of Fellowstone Tower. Filled with old, sturdy tools used by the laborers of $map:2000136$.
The key of $npcName:40000030$, who monitors the prisoners of $map:03009023$.

A reward given to guild members who have attained victory in the Arena of Glory. <font color='#00aaef'>These can be used to purchase items at the $map:02000001$ guild lounge or from Valor Token merchants.</font>
A residency permit for the apartment buildings built by the Goldus Construction Company.
key.guideDescription: Grants access to Maple Apartments in $map:02000002$ for 30 days.

key.tooltipDescription: A residency permit for the apartment buildings built by the Goldus Construction Company.
key.guideDescription: Grants access to Maple Apartments in $map:02000107$ for 30 days.

key.tooltipDescription: A residency permit for the apartment buildings built by the Goldus Construction Company.
key.guideDescription: Grants access to Maple Apartments in $map:02000092$ for 30 days.

key.tooltipDescription: A carp with radiant golden scales. It's impossible to find a reasonable price for this.
The monsters of $map:02000006$ love to collect shiny things. This is one of their baubles.
The monsters of $map:02000006$ collect shiny things such as this blade. The hilt is missing.
It is said that the water that flows from the highest tree in $map:02000024$ nourishes the whole forest. Belhi managed to bottle this water, which supposedly carries the essence of life itself.
A bottle containing curative water from the tree at the top of $map:02000024$.
An instrument with the power to repair the fountain of melody high up in $map:02000095$.
A sack hidden by the GMs that is rumored to contain good fortune.
This voucher lets you hire an assistant from Helping Hands. Show it to $npcName:11000700$ in $map:02000001$ to hire the assistant of your choice.
A lever-operated key used to open the bar doors of $map:03000145$.
The original manuscript of a book that is about to be published by $npcName:11000929$, who has a long and storied history in $map:02000051$.
The original manuscript of a book that is about to be published by $npcName:11000929$, who has a long and storied history in $map:02000051$.
The original manuscript of a book that is about to be published by $npcName:11000929$, who has a long and storied history in $map:02000051$.
An ember held in the bosom of $npcName:21000255$. Although it's a tiny flame, it's able to generate a surprising amount of heat.
It lives in the thickets of $map:02000267$ near $map:02000051$, where it feeds on the grass. It's difficult to spot due to their camouflage, but it's quite valuable as a gourmet ingredient.
The clump of fur from the brave wolf Anka. A clump of fur like this is said to bless you with a long family line.
A box to store Anka's fur.
A suspicious-looking envelope containing materials for assistant item crafting. Only an assistant may open it.
key.guideDescription: Used to craft assistant items.

key.tooltipDescription: A key for the chest on the 5th floor of the Golden Tower.
A key for the chest on the 1st floor of the Golden Tower.
A key for the chest on the 2nd basement of the Golden Tower.
A key for the chest in the palace Undercroft.
A key for the chest in the underground banquet hall.
A key for the chest in the Cusp of Life.
A key for the excellent chest in the Cusp of Life.
A chip containing the encrypted attack parameters that were programmed into $npcName:23000054$.
A feather plucked from the sacred griffins that have awakened in the Vayar Mountains.
This boulder, which is supposedly the source of life for the golems of Vayar, is enchanted with the sacred aura of $map:02000055$. It may be the key to returning the golems to their original purpose.
It is said that these horns are the source of the devilins' darkness.
A snail commonly hunted for food in $map:02000076$. They've recently started to turn violent.
$npcName:21000353$ slime is highly valued for its medicinal properties.
Eaten raw, $npcName:21000003$ caps are deadly poison. But in the hands of an expert, they can be made into a life-saving remedy.
First-aid medicine made by $npcName:11000832$. No one knows what the ingredients are, but no one can doubt its effectiveness.
$npcName:11000973$'s diet regimen. But upon closer inspection, it looks like the plan is more focused on gaining weight, not losing it.
Fresh eggs from $npcName:21000160$.
Apples from the golden apple tree found in $map:02000186$. Consuming this is supposed to limber up your joints and make you very flexible.
A cupcake that's been sweetened with cocoa tree extract instead of regular sugar.
A packed lunch lovingly made by Mani with healthy, fresh ingredients.
Water the cornfield with this bucket.
A fire flower that only grows in the lava fountains of $map:02000096$. It's not common, as picking it tends to result in horrific lava burns.
A durable $npcName:21000374$ fang. Try not to cut yourself on it.
An orange $npcName:21000303$ mane. The spiky hairs are hot to the touch.
$npcName:21000377$'s saliva. It's so toxic that it instantly disintegrates anything it makes contact with. Exercise extreme caution.
An apple delicately balanced on a cloud of whipped cream. It's a mouth-watering sight.
A colorful candy cane. Its delightful scents and bright appearance play with the senses.
Soft-serve ice cream on a crispy cone. It doesn't matter how bad your day isâ€”one bite is enough to lift your spirits.
This ticking drum was taken from an unsuspecting $npcName:21000278$. It is said that master chronomancers can use drums like this to travel through time at will.
A memory chip used to copy important data from a computer.
A memory chip used to copy important data from a computer. A copy of $npcName:11000985$'s research is on here.
A mystical crystal that reflects a wide spectrum of colors depending on the angle of the light.
A sky blue stone that looks like it contains the essence of the azure sky itself.
A crimson stone that evokes both a feeling of fiery intensity and humble modesty.
A key used to wind up $npcName:21000280$'s clockwork.
$npcName:21000280$'s clockwork key. Remarkably, it wasn't damaged from the fall.
A cape in a gorgeous shade of purple. They say the most poisonous mushrooms are the ones that look the most beautiful.
$npcName:11000979$'s water bottle. Contains fairy water.
A key to the break area for traveling merchants in $map:02000042$.
An umbrella big enough to cover anything you might carry on your back.
A roll of toilet paper. You never know when you might need it!
Has the power to purify and protect the forest of $map:02000023$.

This power was created by harnessing the soul of the forest. It has the power to purify the shadows that now reside there. It was given to you by $npcName:11000031$ to brighten $map:02000206$ with the light of the forest.
Contains the power of the sacred earth, which nurtures all life.

This soil has been blessed by the essence of the earth itself. It has the power to purify the shadows that now reside in the forest. It was given to you by $npcName:11000001$ to repel the shadows from the griffin hatchlings in $map:02000177$.
An incoherent jumble of numbers and symbols. Perhaps it's the coordinates for buried treasure... Or a cryptic message left by a mysterious stranger!
Route and navigation information for the ghost ship Victoria. Could this be the clue to uncover the secret of the Victoria?
The engineers of the Time Institute created this device in secret at $map:02000309$. It contains a code that can unlock the secrets of the Time Hall.
The engineers of the Time Institute created this device in secret at $map:02000309$. It contains a code that can unlock the secrets of the Time Hall.
The engineers of the Time Institute created this device in secret at $map:02000309$. It contains a code that can unlock the secrets of the Time Hall.
White shirt and purple pants worn by $npcName:11000857$. Only the king may wear purple in $npcName:11000857$'s kingdom.
The souls of $npcName:11000857$'s servants, released from $npcName:11000745$'s spell.
Corn grown from $npcName:11001006$'s field. A favorite of the local monsters.
A horned helmet. It used to belong to $npcName:21000201$, so it might be too big for person-sized people to wear.
Show off your artistic side with this all-natural henna. A best-selling item at Cathy Mart during the summer.
A young ram with soft pink fur.
$npcName:11000304$ cast a spell of bewilderment on this mask. Whoever wears the mask is brainwashed into unconditionally obeying the person who put the mask on them.
A $item:30000307$ bundle from $npcName:11000996$.
A ghoul who roamed the Land of Darkness. If it absorbs too much shadow energy, it will become a $item:20000103$.
A key to one of Katramus's many doors.
A power source for $npcName:11000145$'s time machine.
An auxiliary power source for $npcName:11000145$'s time machine.
The black box to $npcName:11000145$'s time machine.
A stabilization device for $npcName:11000145$'s time machine.
The key to a treasure chest at $map:02000301$.
The key to a treasure chest at $map:02000302$.
The key to a treasure chest at $map:02000303$.
$npcName:11000064$ left this letter for $npcName:11000529$ before leaving.
A letter from $npcName:11000097$ to Raymon.
An audio message recorded for $npcName:11000492$'s mother.
This fell off an old computer in $map:02000187$. The rust and corrosion has rendered it useless.
An ice shard created when the frozen crystals of $map:02000260$ started to fracture.
The horn of an ancient arctic $npcName:21000199$. The warriors of old would sharpen these and use them as weapons.
Rubble from the body of a $npcName:21000089$. It is engraved with the symbols of the ancient stone giants.
A lightweight sensor designed to analyze and track human bodies.
$npcName:11001044$'s bag full of presents for good boys and girls. It is full to bursting with wonderful gifts that are bound to delight children everywhere.
A costume worn by $npcName:11001044$ during the holiday festival. Made of a special fabric designed to keep the wearer nice and toasty.
A wrench that's been insulated against electromagnetic waves.
Hardened magma. This stone is both rare and durable, making it quite valuable on the market.
The only light source that can illuminate the crystal beacon in $map:02000192$. According to legend, whoever illuminates the beacon with a $item:30000352$ will gain eternal life.
A hybrid energy crystal made by combining solar and electric energy. This technology is state-of-the-art, and has endless applications.
These logs would be perfect for a fire.
A core power source used in advanced robotics. After the AI is programmed, you can combine this with an arc atomic chipset to create your desired robot.
A core power source used in advanced robotics. After the AI is programmed, you can combine this with an arc atomic chipset to create your desired robot.
A hard drive ripped from an old computer in $map:02000187$. It's heavily encrypted.
A rare cobra that lives in $map:02000263$. Its venom can kill an able-bodied person in a matter of minutes, so a word of warning: don't get bit.
A magic rune that can return you to a desired point in time. It is extremely rare, even for a $npcName:21000279$.
Focus on your true desire to make an image of it appear. The image will vanish after a short period or if your concentration breaks.
Lays out the paths of destiny before you. Concentrate and choose wisely, for not every path leads to a happy fate.
A gift for $npcName:11000186$'s mother. It is engraved with $npcName:11000186$'s family initials.
A gift for $npcName:11000186$'s mother. It is engraved with $npcName:11000186$'s family initials.
A bag containing a camera and a tripod.
A wet piece of wood. It's too beat up to even tell what it was used for.
This strange fruit is said to be the source of $npcName:22090007$'s ability to conjure up anything at will.
$npcName:21000169$'s trumpet.
$npcName:21000174$'s cymbals.
$npcName:21000172$'s drum.
$npcName:21000243$'s memory chip.
$npcName:21000240$'s memory chip.
This barrier is all that separates a performer from their legions of rabid fans.
A petition to establish a park in memory of Ten, the legendary hero.
A clump of fur from $npcName:21000111$'s mane. According to an old wives' tale, rubbing this fur on your skin can cure a variety of ailments.
This chip contains the AI of one of Dr. Kartronic's earliest maid robots. Extremely valuable on the black market.
$npcName:11000244$'s wallet. It's stuffed with cash.
An egg carried by the time-eating monsters that live in Ludibrium. It is said that these egg is made of halted time.
A letter to $npcName:11000074$, $npcName:11000058$'s father.
This recording device was placed in $map:02000309$. It looks like it was intentionally destroyed.
Video data that $npcName:11001097$ recovered from the $item:30000380$.
A device that tracks the intensity of atmospheric and geological disturbances in order to identify energy flows.
A report compiled from $item:30000382$ readings.
This sweet-smelling candy makes your mouth water. It can only be used while spinning the Lucky Wheel in $map:02000064$.
A rare herb that can only be found in $map:52000037$. It is highly effective at neutralizing poisons, but it is difficult to harvest due to its thorns.
A key that opens the door at $map:02000330$.
$npcName:21000026$ hide. It's unusual softness makes it popular at the market.
$npcName:21000067$ hide. Its incredible elasticity makes it an excellent leather when tanned.
A leaf prepared by $npcName:11001142$ for $npcName:11000293$'s visits. It's been lightly fermented to highlight its otherwise subtle sweetness.
$npcName:21000031$ sap. It is often used as a substitute for syrup thanks to its distinct sweetness.
Extracted straight from the chocolate spring in $map:02000257$. It's a little too bitter.
$npcName:21000009$ cap powder. It is often used as a sugar substitute because it is sweet and dissolves in water.
An ingredient for $item:30000395$. An colorful, appetizing ingredient.
A strange liquid taken from $npcName:11001145$'s magic pot. You're sure you followed the recipe exactly... What could have gone wrong? It's time to double-check the recipe.
$npcName:11001145$ had a craving for this candy. It's not bad, considering this was your first attempt at making it.
This cannonball is so long forgotten that it probably doesn't even work anymore.
A used tissue. It's disgusting, so you might as well sell it.
An empty flattened can. Maybe a merchant will buy it from you.
A dry maple leaf that someone pressed neatly in a book. Sell it to a shop.
A bouquet made with an assortment of flowers. Sell it to a shop.
A stuffed teddy bear that has all of its fur intact. Sell it to a shop.
Putting this atop anyone's head will make them look beautiful and elegant. Sell it to a shop.
A one-handed flashlight. Sell it to a shop.
It's been dropped so many times that it's beyond repair. Sell it to a shop.
All of the identifying features of this coin have been worn away by time. Sell it to a shop.
A small whipped cream cake made to commemorate a 100 day anniversary.
key.guideDescription: Use this to spin the Lucky Wheel in $map:02000064$ starting from Oct 15, 2015.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher you can use to receive Nexon Cash.
key.guideDescription: Nexon Cash is distributed on Oct 23rd at 7PM.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher you can use to receive Nexon Cash.
key.guideDescription: Nexon Cash is distributed on Oct 23rd at 7PM.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher you can use to receive Nexon Cash.
key.guideDescription: Nexon Cash is distributed on Oct 23rd at 7PM.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher you can use to receive Nexon Cash.
key.guideDescription: Nexon Cash is distributed on Oct 23rd at 7PM.

key.tooltipDescription: A list of rations to be supplied to the guard post at $map:02000076$.
A jack-o'-lantern dropped by $npcName:27000001$. Can be exchanged for Halloween-themed items.
The tape from a security camera that was at the shooting site. It is labeled "#1."
The tape from a security camera that was at the shooting site. It is labeled "#2."
The tape from a security camera that was at the shooting site. It is labeled "#3."
The tape from a security camera that was at the shooting site. It is labeled "#4."
The tape from a security camera that was at the shooting site. It is labeled "#5."

Blood taken from the Unstoppable Heart. It seems to be clotting around something, but the magic holding the blood together makes it impossible to see what it is. This blood draws life force from whatever it touches, and taints it with rage. Can only be obtained by defeating Balrog.
key.guideDescription: Can be used to craft legendary weapons.

key.tooltipDescription: A fragment of the Unstoppable Heart. Though it is a mere fragment, there is untold power contained within it. It has been cleansed of vengeance, and now only pure energy remains. It may be possible to infuse the magic of this fragment into something else if you can gather more fragments.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use. Consume 1 to create 1 drop of Quickening Blood.

key.tooltipDescription: Mysterious ore from a distant land. It attracts ethereal magic in order to maintain its stability. It has many names, including Stone of Balance, Harmony Stone, and Unity Stone. This ore can be used to prevent potent magics from becoming unbalanced or spiraling out of control.

When the Infinite Essence and Cynodia Ore were combined to make this weapon, the power was too great to contain. The Infinite Essence became corrupted and encased the weapon, sealing it away. There is no way to unseal it without first dispelling the sinister magic that surrounds it.

When the Infinite Essence and Cynodia Ore were combined to make this weapon, the power was too great to contain. The Infinite Essence became corrupted and encased the weapon, sealing it away. There is no way to unseal it without first dispelling the sinister magic that surrounds it.

When the Infinite Essence and Cynodia Ore were combined to make this weapon, the power was too great to contain. The Infinite Essence became corrupted and encased the weapon, sealing it away. There is no way to unseal it without first dispelling the sinister magic that surrounds it.
In spite of harsh winds, this tree has thrived on the cliffs of $map:02000051$. Its unique healing properties make it prized as a medicine.

A flower grown from seeds of darkness. If it ever blooms, it will allow the forces of darkness to spread at an unimaginable rate. Spells of purification must be cast upon it regularly to keep it from growing. Lea of Ellinia can teach you how to purify it.
The key to a treasure chest at $map:02000349$.

A shadow that gathered in the body of a creature that ate dark fruit. It harbors an all-encompassing darkness. If you listen closely, you can hear a distant howling. Odessa, who is studying such power in Moldy Tree Cave, might be able to use this for research.
A crispy, crunchy holiday cookie.
key.guideDescription: A holiday event item. It can be used until the maintenance on December 31st.

key.tooltipDescription: Its magic has been drained dry, but the rune's power can be replenished. Once restored, it can power the Whisperstones used by Terrun Calibre for long-range communication.
An ancient text restored by Krend. Contains information about relics and historical sites in Victoria Island. On top of that, it may also hold a clue about finding the lost wisdom of Baz.

A transcription of the runes of Baz's wisdom that was discovered at the first excavation site. It appears to be an ancient primer on the use of rune spells. It also provides a comprehensive overview of magical objects.

A transcription of the runes of Baz's wisdom that was discovered at the second excavation site. It appears to be an ancient primer on the use of rune spells. It also provides a comprehensive overview of magical objects.

A transcription of the runes of Baz's wisdom that was discovered at the third excavation site. It appears to be an ancient primer on the use of rune spells. It also provides a comprehensive overview of magical objects.
A message from Ishura to his pupil and Eupheria. It details his experience following Holstatt into the Land of Darkness. He also notes his worries concerning his pupil at the end of the message.
A fragment of a blue shooting star that radiates with legendary power. Can be obtained in normal adventure dungeons.
key.guideDescription: You can trade this for many treasures from Blue Star Keeper Loarre, Monarre, and Sua. You can find the Blue Star Keepers in Queenstown, Ellinia, and Minar.

key.tooltipDescription: A fragment of a red shooting star. As told in the ancient legends, an indescribable energy emanates from this fragment. Can be obtained in hard adventure dungeons and chaos raid dungeons.
key.guideDescription: You can trade this for many treasures from Red Star Keeper Akorre, Kanerre, and Anae. You can find the Red Star Keepers in Queenstown, Ellinia, and Minar.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher distributed to users who have received Nexon Cash during the On-Time Event. Nexon Cash will be distributed on Monday, Dec 21st.
key.guideDescription: You can trade this for many treasures from Red Star Keeper Akorre, Kanerre, and Anae. You can find the Red Star Keepers in Queenstown, Ellinia, and Minar.

key.tooltipDescription: When the Infinite Essence and Cynodia Ore were combined to make this weapon, the power was too great to contain. The Infinite Essence became corrupted and encased the weapon, sealing it away. There is no way to unseal it without first dispelling the sinister magic that surrounds it.
A portrait of Olivieta, the oil baron of Karkar Island.
Items purchased by Mrs. Arthur from Petit Shopping Mall.
A drink made with the nectar of a coco pine nut. It is often called the "milk of the pine nut" due to its nutritional value.
A mixed drink made from milk and whipped cream.
A melon-flavored soda.
A board rented by Tizzy from the skateboard rental shop in $map:02010014$.
A board from the skateboard rental shop in $map:02010014$. Left behind by unscrupulous customers, it is the product of a collective negligence.
A set of skateboard parts used at the skateboard rental shop in $map:02010014$.
A voucher that can be used at Junk's food cart in $map:02010014$.
A voucher that can be used at Junk's food cart in $map:02010014$.
A voucher that can be used at Junk's food cart in $map:02010014$.
An insect repellent spray developed by Karkar Island's own Kilcos, a company dedicated to killing bugs.
A set of lifesavers always at the ready in case they're needed by the people of $map:02010019$.
A business report compiled by $npcName:11000340$ by order of $npcName:11000504$.
A message from $npcName:11000491$ to $npcName:11000251$.
An anniversary coin minted in Karkar. Due to its limited run, it's in high demand among the local merchants.
key.guideDescription: Bring your coin collection to collectors in Ludari City on Karkar Island or Queenstown on Victoria island to exchange them for rare items.

key.tooltipDescription: Tracks the movement of anything it's attached to.
Records of all the secret dealings among the officers of Tuning Motors.
A crumpled ball of paper.
A fine red sand created by the erosion at Redsand Hills.
A slate recording the culture and customs of the dragons of the past.
A diary kept by $npcName:11001316$ before she lost her powers of clairvoyance.
A pendulum that $npcName:11001316$ once used to tell fortunes.
$npcName:11001316$'s old fortuneteller outfit.
This jewel contains a memory shard taken from Layla, the mother of $npcName:11000735$ and $npcName:11000735$.
This jewel contains a memory shard taken from Layla, the mother of $npcName:11000735$ and $npcName:11000735$.
This jewel contains a memory shard taken from Layla, the mother of $npcName:11000735$ and $npcName:11000735$.
This was left behind by $npcName:24001807$. Try not to get lost in the beauty of its cold, stark luminescence. There are rumors that some scholars need it for their research.
Heartfelt gifts prepared by $npcName:11001373$ for friends and family back home.
A blank check issued by Karkar Island's oil baron, $npcName:11001350$. Who knows how much this is worth?
A customizable sports car by Tuning Motors. Its appearance can easily be changed to suit the driver's taste.
A recording of the martial arts competition taking place at $map:02010020$.
A list of the fights and their odds for the matches that were held at $map:02010020$.

Monogrammed gloves given to $npcName:11001378$ by $npcName:11001377$. It was a gift celebrating $npcName:11001378$'s first win in the ring. Despite their age, they're still a precious piece of memorabilia.
An IOU for a tremendous amount of money. $npcName:11001380$'s name and signature are written on the borrower's line.
A user's manual for "Floaty the Airship," developed by the inventor $npcName:11001276$.
A damaged, misshapen seashell fragment. Someone has already eaten the meat out of the shell. Sell it to a shop.
A sad, lonely slipper. Maybe someone dropped it in the water and forgot about it? Sell it to a shop.
A broken-off piece of coral that's partially decayed. Sell it to a shop.
A steering wheel from a sunken ship. Sell it to a shop.
An anchor from a sunken ship. Sell it to a shop.
A cure-all panacea known only to the Moropapa. Grows in the arid land that they call home. How it is harvested and prepared is unknown.
A voucher that increases the number of dungeon rewards you can receive.
key.guideDescription: Rewards can be obtained 3 times a day. Each time you click the button in the dungeon entry window, 1 voucher is used and a reward is granted. You must claim your reward before the reset time or it will disappear.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher that increases the number of dungeon rewards you can receive.
key.guideDescription: Rewards can be obtained 1 time a day. Each time you click the button in the dungeon entry window, 5 voucher is used and a reward is granted. You must claim your reward before the reset time or it will disappear.

key.tooltipDescription: A pendant controlling $npcName:24001904$'s mind. $npcName:24001904$'s soul is sealed within.
A bundle of tail fur. Upon close inspection, it seems to be the fur of a meerkat.
$npcName:11001430$'s research journal. It's written in a language you don't understand. If you want to learn more about the excavation, you should ask $npcName:11001430$ to read it for you.
Stardust from $map:02010047$. Only those blessed with a special ability may collect it.
A bag of water hidden on a chubby $npcName:21000645$. This allows flowers to bloom even when far away from an oasis.
A bucket filled with a mixture of $item:30000499$ and $item:30000498$. Somehow the bucket is still light. Water a starflower with this to make it perk up instantly.
A torn-up customer transaction list for $map:02010016$.
A packed lunch made by $npcName:11001390$, $npcName:11001396$'s father. It looks a little sloppy, but the important thing is that it was made with love.
A stone fragment carried by $npcNamePlural:21000674$. It is engraved with an unfamiliar writing.
A blend made by $npcName:11001397$. It was made by following clues and hints that were left on a mysterious slate.
The petal of the hiss flower, found only in $map:02010022$. Snakes love these petals; ironically, they're great for treating snakebites. Often confused with lavendar.
The construction schedule of $map:02010012$.
A yellow apple that smells like mustard. The crunchy texture and unique taste make it a popular ingredient, but no one actually enjoys eating it by itself...
A beautiful photograph of $map:02010036$. $npcName:11001381$ shot this photo using a special technique to highlight the charm of this desolate place.
A development plan for the deserts of $map:02010063$. Vibrant illustrations and photographs painstakingly compiled by $npcName:11001381$.
A document confirming the review of $npcName:11001381$'s $map:02010063$ development plan. Signed by $npcName:11001386$ of $map:02010063$.
$npcName:11001381$'s camera. Use it to capture some landscape shots from the peak of $map:02010036$.
Unlocks a lucky box. It can be acquired by defeating elite monsters that appear out in the world.
A map of the interior of Nazkar Temple. Parts of the map have been torn.
A voucher that increases the number of dungeon rewards you can receive.
key.guideDescription: Rewards can be obtained 1 time a day. Each time you click the button in the dungeon entry window, 1 voucher is used and a reward is granted. You must claim your reward before the reset time or it will disappear.

key.tooltipDescription: A book passed down from generation to generation within the Huntis Alliance, an order of knights dedicated to protecting the dragons of Karkar Island.
A strange emblem that can be obtained from boss monsters.
A voucher that increases the number of dungeon rewards you can receive.
key.guideDescription: Rewards can be obtained 3 times a day. Each time you click the button in the dungeon entry window, 1 voucher is used and a reward is granted. You must claim your reward before the reset time or it will disappear.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher that increases the number of dungeon rewards you can receive.
key.guideDescription: Rewards can be obtained 1 time a day. Each time you click the button in the dungeon entry window, 5 voucher is used and a reward is granted. You must claim your reward before the reset time or it will disappear.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher that increases the number of dungeon rewards you can receive.
key.guideDescription: Rewards can be obtained 1 time a day. Each time you click the button in the dungeon entry window, 1 voucher is used and a reward is granted. You must claim your reward before the reset time or it will disappear.

key.tooltipDescription: A medicine modified by $npcName:11001397$ in an attempt to make it more palatable to children. Still smells slightly bitter.
A lunch of snakehead soup made by $npcName:11001388$ for $npcName:11001391$ and $npcName:11001392$. The snakehead is a fish that's known to reinvigorate anyone who eats it. Also includes riceball.
A coin that's good for one free spin of the Lucky Wheel.
key.guideDescription: The Lucky Wheel is located in Queenstown.

key.tooltipDescription: Collect vouchers for half-seasoned Katvan chicken to enter the chicken raffle.
key.guideDescription: Only vouchers collected by 7 AM on March 17, 2016 are valid.

key.tooltipDescription: This fairy gem is one of Puri's specialties. It has the power to open a secret chest, which has been imbued with Puri's purification power.
The warmth of spring flows from this. It feels good in your hand.
An emblem that can only be possessed by fighters with a generous spirit. Compassion is always rewarded.
$npcName:11001537$'s water bottle. Fill it with spring water.
The water in this bottle is said to be $npcName:11000285$'s tears. Take it to $npcName:11001537$.
A herb found in $map:02000074$. It smells pleasant enough, but it's so shriveled up that no one knows if it will have any effect.
A medal awarded by the Imperial Animal Lover's Society. Collect 10 and bring them to $npcName:11001002$ to adopt Doby, a special companion.
Coins for the OK Ducky Board. You can acquire outfits, items, and mounts from the OK Ducky Board. You need 3 Duckling Souvenir Coins to use the OK Ducky Board.
key.guideDescription:
How to Obtain:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive via mail after logging in.
- Receive once every 30 min of continuous time logged in (max 2 hours).</font>

The OK Ducky Board is located in $map:63000031$.
Use the event map shortcut to quickly and easily navigate to the OK Ducky House.

key.tooltipDescription: A secret safe containing confidential Blackstar documents.
Details on the clandestine plans of the ancient rune shamans.
A gift lovingly prepared by $npcName:11001229$ for his pupil.
Its golden body is flat on the side and wide at the tail. You can sell this for a high price.
Kelp with golden stalks. You can sell this for a high price.
This rare octopus has a head that glimmers like a golden marble. You can sell this for a high price.
A sea bream covered with beautiful, shiny scales. You can sell this for a high price.
Used as a rare crafting material, the larger section can also function as a golden trumpet. You can sell this for a high price.
This brilliant golden starfish twinkles almost as brightly as a real star. You can sell this for a high price.
The big, golden claws are bursting with lobster meat. You can sell this for a high price.
Considered good luck by adventurers and enchanters alike. You can sell this for a high price.
A traditional gift for parents in some cultures. You can sell this for a high price.
This sparkling seahorse is a popular decoration the world over. You can sell this for a high price.
Most clams contain pearls. This one contains a huge golden egg. You can sell this for a high price.
Catching even a glimpse of this rare dolphin is said to bring good luck. You can sell this for a high price.

Coins for participating in the 1 year anniversary festival. You can acquire outfits, items, and rides as rewards by using the Festival Lucky Wheel and the Festival Card Board. You need three 1 year anniversary coins to use the Festival Lucky Wheel or the Festival Card Board.
key.guideDescription:
How to Obtain:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive via mail after logging in.
- Receive once every 30 min of continuous time logged in (max 2 hours).
- Complete 2 event quests.</font>

The Festival Lucky Wheel and Festival Card Board is located in $map:61000010$. Use the event map shortcut to quickly and easily navigate to the Festival House.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher that increases the number of dungeon rewards you can receive.
key.guideDescription: Rewards can be obtained 1 time a day. Each time you click the button in the dungeon entry window, 5 voucher is used and a reward is granted. You must claim your reward before the reset time or it will disappear.

key.tooltipDescription: Coins for the OK Ducky Board. You can acquire outfits, items, and mounts from the OK Ducky Board. You need 3 Duckling Souvenir Coins to use the OK Ducky Board.

- Receive once every 30 min of continuous time logged in (max 2 hours).</font>

The OK Ducky Board is located in $map:63000031$. Use the event map shortcut to quickly and easily navigate to the OK Ducky House.

key.tooltipDescription: A coin that's good for one free spin of the Lucky Wheel.
key.guideDescription: The Lucky Wheel is located in Queenstown.

key.tooltipDescription: An emblem that can only be possessed by fighters with a generous spirit. Compassion is always rewarded.
A voucher that increases the number of dungeon rewards you can receive.
key.guideDescription: Rewards can be obtained 3 times a day. Each time you click the button in the dungeon entry window, 1 voucher is used and a reward is granted. You must claim your reward before the reset time or it will disappear.

key.tooltipDescription: A fragment imbued with Narubashan's fury. Can be found in normal adventure dungeons.
key.guideDescription: Can be used to craft weapons imbued with Narubashan's fury.

key.tooltipDescription: This scroll contains a portion of Narubashan's power. Use it to craft a weapon.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to craft a Narubashan's Fury weapon.

key.tooltipDescription: Coins for playing Monsteropoly. You can acquire outfits, items, and mounts as rewards for playing Monsteropoly. You need 3 Maple Town Souvenir Coins to play Monsteropoly.
key.guideDescription:
How to Obtain:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive via mail after logging in.
- Receive once every 30 min of continuous time logged in (max 2 hours).
- Complete 2 event quests.</font>

Monsteropoly can be enjoyed in Monsteropoly Town. Use the event map shortcut to quickly and easily navigate to Monsteropoly Town.

key.tooltipDescription: A beautiful maple blossom unique to Maple World. During the Maple Leaf Festival, you can use them to purchase festival items from Bobby.
key.guideDescription:
How to Obtain:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive via mail after logging in.
- Receive once every 30 min of continuous time logged in (max 2 hours).
- Collect weekly event characters after defeating field bosses.
- Use the holey pot.
- Complete event quests.</font>

Use the event map shortcut to quickly and easily navigate to the location of the Maple Festival.

key.tooltipDescription: A character item created to celebrate the Maple Leaf Festival. Can be acquired from bosses found out in the world.
A character item created to celebrate the Maple Leaf Festival. Can be acquired from bosses found out in the world.
A character item created to celebrate the Maple Leaf Festival. Can be acquired from bosses found out in the world.
A character item created to celebrate the Maple Leaf Festival. Can be acquired from bosses found out in the world.

A character item created to celebrate the Maple Leaf Festival. Can be acquired from bosses found out in the world.
A character item created to celebrate the Maple Leaf Festival. Can be acquired from bosses found out in the world.
An egg with a hard shell. Presumably laid by a rocky bird on a rare visit to its nest.
Uncrumple it to find a floor map of $map:52000073$. Seems to include places that don't actually exist...
Certain parts have been burned away.
A virtual currency earned by completing the Chaotic Battle Simulator. Can be obtained in Chaos Raid Dungeons.
key.guideDescription: Bring this to the battle simulation operator in the Hall of Heroes in exchange for a reward.

key.tooltipDescription: A rare potion made by refining vitality herbs. Take it all at once for the best results.
key.guideDescription: Drink to immediately restore <font color='#00aaef'>30%</font> of your health.

key.tooltipDescription: An extremely rare potion made by refining vitality herbs. Take it all at once for the best results.
key.guideDescription: Drink to immediately restore <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health.

key.tooltipDescription: A rare potion made by refining energy herbs. Take it all at once for the best results.
key.guideDescription: Drink to immediately restore <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> spirit.

key.tooltipDescription: An extremely rare potion made by refining energy herbs. Take it all at once for the best results.
key.guideDescription: Drink to immediately restore <font color='#00aaef'>70</font> spirit.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>60 Sec Cooldown</font>\n<font size='20'>Restores 30% Health/30 Spirit</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A potion made from a blend of vitality and energy herbs. It's extremely rare. Take it all at once for the best results.
key.guideDescription: Drink to immediately restore <font color='#00aaef'>30%</font> of your health and <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> spirit. This cannot be used when you are at full health.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>60 Sec Cooldown</font>\n<font size='20'>Restores 50% Health/70 Spirit</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A potion made from a blend of vitality and energy herbs. It's extremely rare. Take it all at once for the best results.
key.guideDescription: Drink to immediately restore <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> of your health and <font color='#00aaef'>70</font> spirit. This cannot be used when you are at full health.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 200 Health per Sec</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A rare, hard-to-find herb. Its sweet scent hides an extremely bitter taste.
key.guideDescription: Consume to restore <font color='#00aaef'>200</font> health per sec for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> min.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>1 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Restores 20 Spirit every 5 Sec</font>
key.tooltipDescription: A rare, hard-to-find herb. Its fragrant scent hides an extremely sour taste.
key.guideDescription: Consume to restore <font color='#00aaef'>20</font> spirit every <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec for <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> min.

key.tooltipDescription: Won in MC Kay's events. Can be used to spin $npcName:11001953$.
key.guideDescription: $npcName:11001953$ is located in $map:02000064$.

key.tooltipDescription: A mysterious guardstone that contains the essence of fate.
A mysterious guardstone that contains the essence of birth.
A mysterious guardstone that contains the essence of blessings.
$npcName:40000145$'s horns. They're hot as lava. They also tend to grow on their own, so you have to grind them down frequently.
A thick $npcName:40000128$ skin. It continues to grow even after pulled off, which is probably why $npcNamePlural:40000128$ are always throwing them around.
According to legend, tearing the wings off of a wild $npcName:40000126$ will undo the curse and turn it back into an animal.
Peppermint candy is delicious.
An empty lucky pouch. Take it to Ruby in exchange for a full one.

A voucher for the Maple Musketeers event. You can exchange your first voucher for a MapleStory reward from the website. You can purchase the voucher from a merchant. It will vanish after the TKTKTKTKTK maintenance.

A voucher for the Maple Musketeers event. You can exchange your first voucher for a MapleStory reward from the website. You can purchase the voucher from a merchant. It will vanish after the TKTKTKTKTK maintenance.

A voucher for the Maple Musketeers event. You can exchange your first voucher for a MapleStory M reward from the website. You can purchase the voucher from a merchant. It will vanish after the TKTKTKTKTK maintenance.
Coins for playing Monsteropoly. You can acquire outfits, items, and pets as rewards for playing Monsteropoly. You need 3 Maple Town Souvenir Coins to play Monsteropoly.
key.guideDescription:
How to Obtain:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive via mail after logging in.
- Receive once every 30 min of continuous time logged in (max 2 hours).
- Complete 2 event quests.
- Panning and fishing.</font>

Monsteropoly can be enjoyed at Monsteropoly Town. Use the event map shortcut to quickly and easily navigate to Monsteropoly Town.

key.tooltipDescription: A coin that can be used to shop at Monday's event shop. This aptly named merchant opens shop in Tria from 12 PM to 12 AM every Monday.
key.guideDescription:
How to Obtain:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive 1 via mail after logging in during the weekend.
- Receive once every 30 min of continuous time logged in during the weekend (max 90 min).

key.tooltipDescription: Sparkling petals from the Cherry Blossom Forrest. To celebrate the Cherry Blossom Festival, give these to Bobby in exchange for festival items.
key.guideDescription:
How to acquire $item:30000751$<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Acquired via mail upon logging in.
- Acquired once every 30 minutes if connection is maintained (max 2 hours).
- Acquired daily by collecting event characters after defeating field bosses.
- Acquired by using the pink pot.</font>

Use the event map shortcut to quickly and easily navigate to the location of the Cherry Blossom Festival.

$npcName:11000273$ of $map:02000027$ created this first aid kit to distribute to militia members and citizens. Although small, it holds plenty of useful items and is easy to carry.
A lunch box made by $npcName:11000029$ for her dear classmate, $npcName:11000284$. This cute, carefully-wrapped lunch box is the source of an absolutely delicious aroma.
This single earring was left behind in $map:02000109$. Although the design is simple, it's easy to tell this is a finely-crafted item. Looks similar to what $npcName:11003146$ was wearing.
A key that can be used to open a lucky box.
key.guideDescription:
How to Obtain:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive 1 via mail after logging in.
- Receive 1 every 30 min of continuous time logged in (max 90 min).
- Defeat field bosses for a chance to receive 1.

key.tooltipDescription: A chunk of water slime. It's as moist as you'd expect.
The business card of $npcName:11001262$, who runs the $map:52000020$. Found in $map:02000226$.
A coin that can be used to shop at Monday's event shop. This aptly named merchant opens shop in Tria from 12 PM to 12 AM every Monday.
key.guideDescription:
How to Obtain:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive 1 via mail after logging in during the weekend.
- Receive once every 30 min of continuous time logged in during the weekend (max 90 min).

key.tooltipDescription: A document detailing Dark Wind's plans.
Powerful magic taken from Balrog's body.
key.guideDescription: Exchange these for $itemPlural:20300876$ at Ruby's shop.

key.tooltipDescription: An emblem that can only be possessed by fighters with a generous spirit. Compassion is always rewarded.
key.guideDescription: Gather these and take them to Ruby and Bobby in exchange for $itemPlural:20300877$.

key.tooltipDescription: The latest Strider model brochure from Tuning Motors.
A MapleStory 2 2nd anniversary commemorative mark.
key.guideDescription: Exchange these for $itemPlural:30000782$ at Ruby's shop.

key.tooltipDescription: These coins are awarded for participating in the 2nd Anniversary Festival. You can get outfits, items, and rides as rewards by using the 2nd Anniversary Wheel of Joy and Festival Card Board.
key.guideDescription:
How to acquire $item:30000782$<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Acquired via mail upon logging in.
- Acquired once every 30 minutes if connection is maintained (max 2 hours).
- Exchanged daily by collecting $item:30000781$ after defeating field bosses.
- Acquired by using the golden pot.</font>

Use the event map shortcut to quickly and easily navigate to the location of the 2nd Anniversary Festival.

key.tooltipDescription: A scrap torn from the old man's cape. Did something happen to him?
An emblem that can only be possessed by fighters with a generous spirit. Compassion is always rewarded.
key.guideDescription: Gather these and take them to Ruby and Bobby in exchange for $itemPlural:20300920$.

key.tooltipDescription: Powerful magic taken from Balrog's body.
key.guideDescription: Exchange these for $itemPlural:20300876$ at Ruby's shop.

key.tooltipDescription:
Brimming with reverse energy, this scroll upgrades <font color='#ffc000'>Reverse Knight Combat Cap (Lv. 50)</font> to <font color='#ffc000'>Reverse Knight Combat Cap (Lv. 56)</font>.

<font color='#c00000'>Only usable on gear that is enchantment level 10 or below. The target item's enchantment level, experience, and transcendence attributes are preserved. The cost of this process varies based on the gear's level.</font>
key.guideDescription: Double-click the scroll to craft higher-tier Reverse gear.

key.tooltipDescription: A fragment imbued with the power of the Reverse.
key.guideDescription: Used for crafting higher-tier Reverse gear.

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll used to lock an attribute when changing a weapon's bonus attributes. Locking an attribute prevents its type and value from being changed when modifying bonus attributes.
key.guideDescription: When changing the additional stat, it is consumed upon finalizing the stat.

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll used to lock an attribute when changing an armor's bonus attributes. Locking an attribute prevents its type and value from being changed when modifying bonus attributes.
key.guideDescription: When changing the additional stat, it is consumed upon finalizing the stat.

key.tooltipDescription: A currency obtained as a reward for doing activities that help the guild. It's used to purchase useful items from the merchants within the Guild House.
A firm $npc:21000267$ shell.
A stone flower that grows on cliffs. Can be used to treat wounds in the field.
Spring water from $map:02000095$. Revitalizes the body and soul.
A poisonous $npc:21000299$ tail. With proper treatment, the venom can be removed.
A fiery $npc:21000255$ mane.
A medal with an engraved sigil of House Montas. You can get it as a token of appreciation by restocking a product in Scarlet's shop using Merets. Take it to Pietro to exchange for valuable items.
An emblem that can only be possessed by fighters with a generous spirit. Compassion is always rewarded.
key.guideDescription: Gather these and take them to Ruby and Bobby in exchange for $itemPlural:20300920$.

key.tooltipDescription: A coin that can be obtained through event dungeons. Used to spin the event dungeon roulette. You can find the event dungeon roulette in Queenstown.
This scroll looks unremarkable at a glance. The secrets it holds, however...
This mushroom had a vivid red color and star patern in the wild, but it's color faded as soon as you picked it. It's a popular spell reagent, so you'd better hurry back while it's still fresh.
Hard pieces found in Monster's body. The reason why Ludibrium piece are found in monster's body is unknown.
Report $npc:11000868$ quickly wrote and delivered. Only a enthusiastic newbie researcher can write a report with letters this small and fill up the entire paper.
Letter from $npc:11000032$ to $npc:11000005$. For a supposedly important letter, it was left haphazardly along with the mounds of books in $map:02000031$.
A coin earned through premium dungeons, used to spin the premium roulette. You can find the premium roulette in Queenstown.

The Maple World-famous novelist Rollings wrote this book, inspired by the burning tree in Peronia Woods. Besides $npc:11000069$, the borrower record on the back of its book has the name $npc:11000532$. His address is $map:02000222$ in $map:02000111$.

A magazine on environment, published by the environmental group Green Eco. It reports various cases of ecosystem being contaminated. Besides $npc:11000069$, the borrower record on the back of its book has the name $npc:11000532$. His address is $map:02000222$ in $map:02000111$.
A coin used for Rayopoly and Ray Roulette.
key.guideDescription: \nCan be obtained from Participation Check, Ray's OX Quiz, and Rayopoly Daily Quest.

key.tooltipDescription: A scrapbook made by $npc:11000069$. There is a mark on the map of $map:02000133$. Maybe that was a meeting place with someone...
A key that can be used to open a Tier 10 Barbosa Treasure Chest.
An extremely powerful ember. Required to upgrade Barbosa Keys to the next tier.
key.guideDescription:
How to Get It:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive once via mail after logging in every day.
- Receive after 60 min of continuous play time.
- Receive as a reward for completing the 'Barbosa Daily Mission' quest.
- Receive as a reward for completing the 'Barbosa Weekly Mission' quest.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A bundle of candies that can be used to tame monsters. They look tasty even to you.
Coins for the Festival Card Board. You can get outfits, items, and mounts from the board. You need 3 $itemPlural:30000888$ to use the board.
key.guideDescription:
How to Get It:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive 1 via mail on login.
- Receive 1 every for every 30 min of continuous play time (up to 2 hours).</font>

You can find Festival Card Boards in $map:02000360$.

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll used to lock an attribute when changing an accessory's bonus attributes. Locking an attribute prevents its type and value from being changed when modifying bonus attributes.
key.guideDescription: Can be used to lock attributes when changing the bonus attributes.

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll used to lock an attribute when changing an armor's bonus attributes. Locking an attribute prevents its type and value from being changed when modifying bonus attributes.
key.guideDescription: Can be used to lock attributes when changing the bonus attributes.

key.tooltipDescription: The chewy texture is amazing. Mix in $item:30000893$ or $item:30000894$ to make a delicious mooncake.
Nutritional and savory. Put into $item:30000892$ to create a delicious $item:20301055$.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use, consuming 10 to create $item:20301055$.

key.tooltipDescription: Sweet and flavorful. Put into $item:30000892$ to create a delicious $item:20301056$.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use, consuming 1 to create $item:20301056$.

key.tooltipDescription: Distinguished Service Tokens are items which can be obtained based on your total dungeon score from hard adventure dungeons and other more difficult dungeons.
key.guideDescription: A token that can be exchanged for various item. Bring it to Toad who runs the Distinguished Service Token Shop in Queenstown.

key.tooltipDescription: A rice cake in the shape of a snowfield bunny that Bobby likes. The taste and shape are excellent since a very skilled Moon Bunny made it.
key.guideDescription: Gather the Snowfield Bunny Rice Cakes and exchange for items from Event Helper Bobby's shop. The Snowfield Bunny Rice Cake can be obtained from the Mysterious Maple Lucky Pouch.

key.tooltipDescription: It's a shiny moon fragment. It can be exchanged for various items such as outfits, damage skins, and emotes from Event Helper Moon Rabbit and Hawker Tenten in Star Sands Fishing Hole.
key.guideDescription:
How to Get It: <font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive once every 30 min of continuous play time (up to 3 hours).
- Receive as Running Against Time event reward.
- Receive by fishing at the Star Sands Fishing Hole with the Starlight Magnetic Lure.
- Receive via attendance check on the Moon Bunny and Moon Fragment event page.</font>

Use the event map shortcut to quickly and easily navigate to Star Sands Fishing Hole.

key.tooltipDescription: Shifts the camera perspective to the OX arena.\nPress the shortcut key again to return to the standard character view.
Shifts the camera perspective to the O section.\nPress the shortcut key again to return to the standard character view.
Shifts the camera perspective to the X section.\nPress the shortcut key again to return to the standard character view.
Shifts the camera perspective to the elimination zone.\nPress the shortcut key again to return to the standard character view.
Shifts the camera perspective to display the whole map.\nPress the shortcut key again to return to the standard character view.
A scroll used to lock an attribute when changing an armor's bonus attributes. Locking an attribute prevents its type and value from being changed when modifying bonus attributes.
key.guideDescription: Can be used to lock attributes when changing the bonus attributes.

key.tooltipDescription: It's a ripe orange Jack-o'-lantern. Exchange it for various Halloween goods from Halloween Merchant Pumpkini in Tria, Queenstown, and Ludari City.
A voucher used to alter item attributes.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's bonus attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">Only usable on epic quality level 50 hats, suits, tops, bottoms, gloves, and shoes. Values of the target item's bonus attributes will change upon use.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attribute change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

<font color="#FFFFFF">Not usable on the following items:
- Armor that has two strength, intelligence, dexterity or luck bonus attributes (excluding gloves).
- Gloves that have a single intelligence, dexterity, or luck bonus attribute.</font>

key.mainDescription: <font color='#ffffff'>Trains Pets\n</font><font color='#909090'>Increase pet experience by 3,000</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This fusion stone dust can increase your pet's experience. This dust is the byproduct of refining more complete fusion stones, but there's still a fair amount of magic within it.
key.guideDescription: Used as material for pet fusion.

key.mainDescription: <font color='#ffffff'>Trains Pets\n</font><font color='#909090'>Increase pet experience by 5,000</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This fusion stone shard can increase your pet's experience. Handle with care, or it will crumble into dust!
key.guideDescription: Used as material for pet fusion.

key.guideDescription: Used as material for pet fusion.
