key.tooltipDescription: Use this voucher to change your hairstyle and hair color one time.
key.guideDescription: To change your hairstyle, go to $map:52000008$ in $map:02000107$ and talk to $npcName:11000255$.

key.tooltipDescription: Use this voucher to change your face and eye color one time.
key.guideDescription: Go to $map:52000010$ in $map:02000107$ and talk to $npcName:11000071$ to change your face.

key.tooltipDescription: Use this voucher to change your cosmetics one time.
key.guideDescription: Go to $map:52000008$ in $map:02000107$ and talk to $npcName:11000256$ if you want to liven up your face and experiment with new cosmetics styles.

key.tooltipDescription: You can change the color of your equipment one time for free by using this voucher.
key.guideDescription: Go to $map:52000009$ in $map:02000107$ and talk to $npcName:11000257$ if you want to breathe new life into your equipment by changing its color.

key.tooltipDescription: Use this voucher to change your skin tone one time.
key.guideDescription: To change your skin tone, talk to Doctor Zenko at $map:52000010$ in $map:02000107$.

key.tooltipDescription: The bottled experiences and memories of heroes past.
key.guideDescription: Consume to immediately gain <font color='#00aaef'>500</font> experience.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Cooldown | 30 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Kay Mini-game Experience +100%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Use to increase the experience gained from Kay's mini-games by <font color='#00aaef'>100%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> minutes. You may only use one at a time.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Cooldown | 30 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Fishing Experience +100%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Use to increase the experience gained from fishing by <font color='#00aaef'>100%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> minutes. You may only use one at a time.
A coin used for Layopoly and Lay Roulette.
key.guideDescription: \nCan be obtained from Participation Check, Lay's OX Quiz, and Layopoly Daily Quest.

key.tooltipDescription: A box containing an item to make your character stronger.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory to get what's inside.

key.tooltipDescription: It is not known in which machine this machine mass was used in.
A black crystal that is said to be the remains of the god of darkness.
It's part of a book written about ancient magic engineering technology. No one can read it due to being severely damaged.
A rusted old key. It's used to unlock... something, but you're not quite sure what.
key.guideDescription: Natalie in Tria can analyze it.

key.tooltipDescription: This key allows you to enter the Abandoned Mine in the Andrea Barony. It has been closed due to the appearance of many monsters.
key.guideDescription: A key that is required to enter Abandoned Mine B1.

key.tooltipDescription: You can enter a secret passage deep within the Abandoned Mine with this key. It's assumed to have been used by the miners before the mine was closed, but it's currently blocked due to the appearance of violent monsters.
key.guideDescription: A key that is required to enter Abandoned Mine B4.

key.tooltipDescription: A map that reveals the treasure's location, made out of materials used by the royal court. You can tell at a glance this is a high-end item.
It's a shiny moon fragment. You can exchange it for various items from Event Helper Moon Rabbit's Shop at Star Sands Fishing Hole.
key.guideDescription:
How to Get It:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive by fishing at the Star Sands Fishing Hole with the Starlight Magnetic Lure.</font>

Use the event map shortcut to quickly and easily navigate to Star Sands Fishing Hole.

key.tooltipDescription: A key that can be used to open a Tier 10 Barbosa Treasure Chest.
An extremely powerful ember. Required to upgrade Barbosa Keys to the next tier.
key.guideDescription:
How to Get It:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive once via mail after logging in every day.
- Receive after 60 min of continuous play time.
- Receive as a reward for completing the 'Barbosa Daily Mission' quest.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll used to lock an attribute when changing an excellent accessory's bonus attributes. Locking an attribute prevents its type and value from being changed when modifying bonus attributes.
key.guideDescription: Can be used to lock attributes when changing the bonus attributes.

key.tooltipDescription: A key that can be used to open a lucky box.
key.guideDescription:
How to Obtain: <font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Receive 1 via mail after logging in.
- Use life skill gathering and crafting for a chance to receive 1.
- Defeat field bosses for a chance to receive 1.

key.tooltipDescription: A snowball made by lumping white snow. Fuse with $item:30001043$ to get $item:20301303$ or fuse with $item:30001044$ to get $item:20301304$.
A crystal created by gathering the power of light.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use, consuming 1 Snowball and 10 Light Crystals to create $item:20301303$.

key.tooltipDescription: A crystal created by gathering the shiny power of light.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use, consuming 1 Snowball and 1 Shiny Light Crystal to create $item:20301304$.

key.tooltipDescription: A commemorative coin created to cheer the Infernog Expedition.\nCan be used to exchange for various items from Event Helper Bobby in Queenstown.
key.guideDescription:
How to Get It:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Collect via mail after logging in.
- Receive another one after staying logged in for 60 min.
- Receive by doing daily quests.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: It's a relationship token issued by Temple Knight Mason. Collect 10 to complete the [Mason's Special Someone] event quest given by $npc:11001002$ and get the reward.

How to Get It:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Obtain 20% of the Chinese New Years limited item purchase amount sold by the Roaming Merchant.
- Obtain 10% of the meret item purchase amount sold by the Roaming Merchant.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A salted chocolate that was inside the chocolate balloon. It's a great gift for someone who needs something sweet.

key.mainDescription: <font size='14'>30 Min Cooldown | 30 Min Duration</font>\n<font size='24'>Performance Experience +100%</font>
key.tooltipDescription: Use to increase the experience gained from performing by <font color='#00aaef'>100%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> minutes. You may only use one at a time.
A coin that can be used to shop at Monday's shop. This aptly named merchant can be found in Tria anytime, but his shop is only open on Mondays.
key.guideDescription:
How to Get It: <font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Collect via mail after logging in during the weekend of the event.
- Receive for each 30 min of continuous time play time during this period (up to 90 min).

key.tooltipDescription: A commemorative coin to kick off the new semester.\nTake it to Bobby in Queenstown to exchange for items.
key.guideDescription:
How to Get It:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Collect via mail after logging in.
- Can also be obtained by staying logged in for 60 min.
- Can also be obtained by clearing random dungeons, performing, fishing, gathering, foraging, mining, or crafting.
- Not obtainable via Instant Gathering Vouchers.
- Not obtainable via dungeon reward boosters.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A commemorative coin created to cheer the Infernog Expedition.\nCan be used to exchange for various items at the Fleet Goods Supplier's Shop that landed in Queenstown.
key.guideDescription:
How to Get It:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Collect via mail after logging in.
- Receive another one after staying logged in for 60 min.
- Chance to get another one when clearing dungeons, gathering, foraging, mining, or crafting.
- Can't obtain when using the Auto-gathering Voucher.
- Can't obtain when using the Dungeon Reward Booster.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A beautiful amaryllis seed.\nDouble-click the flower seed in Queenstown to make it sprout.
key.guideDescription:
How to Participate:<font color='#FFFFFF'>
- Open flower seed pouches and magic solution boxes collected via mail after logging in.
- Double click the flower seed in Queenstown to plant it.
- A character of the opposite gender gives the magic solution to the sprout and waits 30 sec for it to bloom!
- Pick the flower when it blooms.
- Exchange the flower for various items from Ruby. </font>

key.tooltipDescription: A commemorative coin for the Mutual Help Campaign that aims to create a kinder Maple World where we all help one another.\nTake it to Knight Errant Merchant $npc:11003560$'s shop in $map:02000064$ to trade for event items.

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used during enchantment to prevent equipment from become unstable.
key.guideDescription: Can be used when attempting a +11 to +13 enchantment on level 20-50 epic tier or below equipment. If the enchantment fails, the equipment will not become unstable and the enchantment will be set back to +10. When attempting to enchant +11 to +13 gear of epic tier or lower, you will be offered the chance to use this item. <font color="#FF5F5F">When used, Protection Scrolls will be consumed regardless of whether the enchant succeeds or fails.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used during enchantment to prevent equipment from become unstable.
key.guideDescription: Can be used when attempting a +11 to +13 enchantment on level 20-50 legendary tier or below equipment. If the enchantment fails, the equipment will not become unstable and the enchantment will be set back to +10. When attempting to enchant +11 to +13 gear of legendary tier or lower, you will be offered the chance to use this item. <font color="#FF5F5F">When used, Protection Scrolls will be consumed regardless of whether the enchant succeeds or fails.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: An enchantment booster that harnesses the power of defiance crystals to improve gear performance without rendering the item unstable.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher that can alter the attributes of an item.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's attributes.

<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on level 50 epic weapons. The max attack of the weapon, its type, and the value of its bonus attributes will change upon use.

</font><font color="#FF5F5F">Cannot use on weapons that do not have bonus attributes or allow a max attack increase.
Voucher cannot be used on items with fixed bonus attributes.
Even after using the voucher, you may wind up with the same attribute types and values.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher that can alter the attributes of an item.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's bonus attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">Only usable on epic quality level 50 hats, suits, tops, bottoms, gloves, and shoes. Values of the target item's bonus attributes will change upon use.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attribute change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

<font color="#FFFFFF">Not usable on the following items:
- Armor that has two strength, intelligence, dexterity or luck bonus attributes (excluding gloves).
- Gloves that have a single intelligence, dexterity, or luck bonus attribute.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher that can alter the attributes of an item.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's attributes.

<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on level 50 epic hats, suits, tops, bottoms, gloves, and shoes. The value of its bonus attributes will change upon use.
The bonus attributes will never become lower than their original minimum value, and will trend closer to the maximum value.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attribute change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

<font color="#FFFFFF">Cannot be used on the following items:
- Armor that has two strength/intelligence/dexterity/luck bonus attributes (except gloves).
- Gloves that have strength/intelligence/dexterity/luck bonus attributes.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to unlock sockets.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use the scroll.\n\n<font color="#FFFFFF">Sets the number of unlocked sockets to 1. Can only be used on level 50 epic earrings that have 0 sockets unlocked. Note that this scroll does not add unlocked sockets, but only changes the number of unlocked sockets to 1.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to unlock sockets.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use the scroll.\n\n<font color="#FFFFFF">Sets the number of unlocked sockets to 2. Can only be used on level 50 epic earrings that have 1 or fewer sockets unlocked. Note that this scroll does not add unlocked sockets, but only changes the number of unlocked sockets to 2.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to unlock sockets.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use the scroll.\n\n<font color="#FFFFFF">Sets the number of unlocked sockets to 3. Can only be used on level 50 epic earrings that have 2 or fewer sockets unlocked. Note that this scroll does not add unlocked sockets, but only changes the number of unlocked sockets to 3.</font>

</font><font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attribute change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.

<font color="#F52B52">Powerful protection scrolls can only be used once per item.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to unlock 1 earring socket.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use the scroll.\n\n<font color="#FFFFFF">Sets the number of unlocked sockets to 1. Can only be used on level 50 epic earrings that have 0 sockets unlocked. Note that this scroll does not add unlocked sockets, but only changes the number of unlocked sockets to 1.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to unlock 2 earring socket.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use the scroll.\n\n<font color="#FFFFFF">Sets the number of unlocked sockets to 2. Can only be used on level 50 epic earrings that have 1 or fewer sockets unlocked. Note that this scroll does not add unlocked sockets, but only changes the number of unlocked sockets to 2.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: An enchantment booster that harnesses the power of defiance crystals to improve gear performance without rendering the item unstable.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the scroll to enchant equipment.\nCan only be used on level 20-50 normal, rare, exceptional, and epic weapons, tops, bottoms, and suits, with a 100% chance to enchant the item to +10.\nUsing the booster will make the enchanted item untradable.

key.tooltipDescription: A runestone imbued with the power of defiance crystals. Can be used to make equipment more powerful.
key.guideDescription: Double-click this runestone to enchant equipment. Only usable on normal, rare, exceptional, and epic main hand weapons that are level 20-52. Instantly enchants the item to +10 without fail. The enchanted item will no longer be eligible for trade or repackaging.

key.tooltipDescription: A runestone of unknown origin. Can be used during enchantment to prevent equipment from become unstable.
key.guideDescription: Can be used when attempting a +10 enchantment on level 20-50 epic tier or below one-handed weapons. If the enchantment fails, the equipment will not become unstable, and the enchantment will remain +9. When attempting to enchant +9 gear of epic tier or lower, you will be offered the chance to use this item. <font color="#FF5F5F">Each rune can be used only once, regardless of whether the enchant succeeds or fails.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher used to alter item attributes.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on epic daggers, longswords, scepters, thrown weapons, shields, and codices. Weapons' max attack, shields' defense and codices' magic attack will change on use, in addition to the types and values of the target item's bonus attributes.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attributes change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher used to alter item attributes.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on epic greatswords, bows, staves, cannons, blades, knuckles, and orbs. The weapon's max attack, and the type and value of the bonus attribute will change upon use.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attributes change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to unlock sockets.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use the scroll.\n\n<font color="#FFFFFF">Sets the number of unlocked sockets to 1. Can only be used on level 52 epic rings that have 0 sockets unlocked. key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to unlock sockets.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use the scroll.\n\n<font color="#FFFFFF">Sets the number of unlocked sockets to 2. Can only be used on level 52 epic rings that have 1 or fewer sockets unlocked. key.tooltipDescription: A voucher used to alter item attributes.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's bonus attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">Only usable on epic and legendary quality armor. The value of its bonus attributes will change upon use.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attribute change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

<font color="#FFFFFF">Not usable on the following items:
- Armor that has two strength, intelligence, dexterity or luck bonus attributes (excluding gloves).
- Gloves that have a single intelligence, dexterity, or luck bonus attribute.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A runestone of unknown origin. Can be used during enchantment to prevent equipment from become unstable.
key.guideDescription: Can be used when attempting a +10 enchantment on level 50 ascendant main hand weapons. If the enchantment fails, the equipment will not become unstable, and the enchantment will remain +9. When attempting to enchant +9 gear of epic tier or lower, you will be offered the chance to use this item. <font color="#FF5F5F">Each rune can be used only once, regardless of whether the enchant succeeds or fails.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A runestone of unknown origin. Can be used during enchantment to prevent equipment from become unstable.
key.guideDescription: Can be used when attempting a +10 enchantment on level 50 ascendant one-handed weapons. If the enchantment fails, the equipment will not become unstable, and the enchantment will remain +9. When attempting to enchant +9 gear of epic tier or lower, you will be offered the chance to use this item. <font color="#FF5F5F">Each rune can be used only once, regardless of whether the enchant succeeds or fails.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A runestone of unknown origin. Can be used during enchantment to prevent equipment from become unstable.
key.guideDescription: Can be used when attempting a +10 enchantment on level 50 ascendant two-handed weapons. When attempting to enchant +9 gear of epic tier or lower, you will be offered the chance to use this item. <font color="#FF5F5F">Each rune can be used only once, regardless of whether the enchant succeeds or fails.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A runestone of unknown origin. Can be used during enchantment to prevent equipment from become unstable.
key.guideDescription: Can be used when attempting a +10 enchantment on level 50 ascendant suits. If the enchantment fails, the equipment will not become unstable, and the enchantment will remain +9. When attempting to enchant +9 gear of epic tier or lower, you will be offered the chance to use this item. <font color="#FF5F5F">Each rune can be used only once, regardless of whether the enchant succeeds or fails.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to unlock sockets.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use the scroll.\n\n<font color="#FFFFFF">Sets the number of unlocked sockets to 1. Can only be used on level 50 legendary earrings that have 0 sockets unlocked. Note that this scroll does not add unlocked sockets, but only changes the number of unlocked sockets to 1.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to enchant equipment.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the scroll to enchant your equipment.\nCan only be used on level 20-50 normal, rare, exceptional, epic, and legendary weapons, tops, bottoms, and suits, with a 100% chance to enchant the item to +10.

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to enchant equipment.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the scroll to enchant gear.\nCan only be used on level 20-50 normal, rare, exceptional, epic, and legendary weapons, headgear, tops, bottoms, suits, gloves, and shoes, with a 100% chance to enchant the item to +10.

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to enchant equipment.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the scroll to enchant your equipment.\nCan only be used on level 20-50 normal, rare, exceptional, epic, legendary, and ascendant weapons, headgear, tops, bottoms, suits, gloves, and shoes, with a 100% chance to enchant the item to +10.

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to unlock sockets.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use the scroll.\n\n<font color="#FFFFFF">Sets the number of unlocked sockets to 1. Can only be used on level 50 epic necklaces that have 0 sockets unlocked. Note that this scroll does not add unlocked sockets, but only changes the number of unlocked sockets to 1.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to unlock sockets.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use the scroll.\n\n<font color="#FFFFFF">Sets the number of unlocked sockets to 2. Can only be used on level 50 epic necklaces that have 0 sockets unlocked. Note that this scroll does not add unlocked sockets, but only changes the number of unlocked sockets to 2.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher that can alter the bonus abilities of a pet.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to use.

<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on level 50 epic pets. Bonus talent values will change upon use, but types will remain the same.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Not usable on pets without bonus talents, or which lack talent re-roll counters. It is possible to roll the same talent values as before the change.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A scroll imbued with mysterious powers. Can be used to stabilize unstable equipment, allowing them to be enchanted.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use the scroll. Can only be used on level 20-50 unstable gear. Resets the item's enchantment to +0 so that you can enchant it anew.

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher used to alter the item's type and value.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's bonus attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on level 50 legendary hats, suits, tops, bottoms, gloves, and shoes. Types and values of the target item's bonus attributes will change upon use. The new value will always be toward the higher end of the possible range.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attribute change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher used to alter the item's type and value.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's bonus attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on level 50 legendary accessories. Types and values of the target item's bonus attributes will change upon use. The new value will always be toward the higher end of the possible range.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attribute change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher used to alter the item's type and value.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's bonus attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on level 50 legendary daggers, longswords, scepters, thrown weapons, shields, and codices. Types and values of the target item's bonus attributes will change upon use. The new value will always be toward the higher end of the possible range.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attribute change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's bonus attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on level 50 legendary greatswords, bows, staves, cannons, blades, knuckles, and orbs. Types and values of the target item's bonus attributes will change upon use. The new value will always be toward the higher end of the possible range.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attribute change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

<font color="#FFFFFF">Only usable on epic quality capes, belts, earrings, necklaces, and rings. Values of the target item's bonus attributes will change upon use.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attribute change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher used to alter item attributes.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's bonus attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on legendary capes, belts, earrings, necklaces, and rings. Values of the target item's bonus attributes will change upon use.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attribute change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher used to alter item attributes.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on legendary greatswords, bows, staves, cannons, blades, knuckles, and orbs. The weapon's max attack, and the type and value of the bonus attribute will change upon use.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attributes change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher used to alter item attributes.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on legendary daggers, longswords, scepters, thrown weapons, shields, and codices. Weapons' max attack, shields' defense and codices' magic attack will change on use, in addition to the types and values of the target item's bonus attributes.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attributes change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A voucher used to alter item attributes.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click to change an item's bonus attributes.
<font color="#FFFFFF">This voucher can only be used on legendary hats, suits, tops, bottoms, gloves, and shoes. Values of the target item's bonus attributes will change upon use.</font>

<font color="#FF5F5F">Does not affect attribute change count. Not usable on items without bonus attributes, or which do not display an attribute change counter. It is possible to roll the same attribute types and values as before the change.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: A runestone of unknown origin. Can be used to make equipment more powerful.
key.guideDescription: Double-click this runestone to enchant equipment. Only usable on normal, rare, exceptional, and epic main hand weapons that can be enchanted. Instantly enchants the item to +10 without fail.

key.tooltipDescription: This healthy vitamin-infused candy will give your pet a boost for a few days.
key.guideDescription: Double-click this item, then drag a hungry pet into the Feed Pet window. Using the same kind of candy will cause the duration to stack. You can feed your pet for up to 365 days. Feeding this candy to your pet will overwrite any other type of candy effects. Hungry pets get no benefit from candy.

A portable keyboard supplied by the Royal Music Academy. Lightweight and reasonably priced, it's a popular instrument for a reason.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: An acoustic guitar supplied by the Royal Music Academy. This affordable, simple instrument is perfect for beginners.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A portable keyboard supplied by the Royal Music Academy. Lightweight and reasonably priced, it's a popular instrument for a reason.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: An acoustic guitar supplied by the Royal Music Academy. This affordable, simple instrument is perfect for beginners.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A clarinet supplied by the Royal Music Academy. The low price tag makes it popular among novices.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A harp supplied by the Royal Music Academy. Lightweight and reasonably priced.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A timpani supplied by the Royal Music Academy. Lightweight and reasonably priced.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A piano made by the Arlano Music Company. It creates delicate yet clear notes. Highly recommended by classical enthusiasts and members of the Arlano Symphony.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A guitar made by the Arlano Music Company. It combines an elegant design with luxurious, warm tones. It's also durable enough to withstand lengthy and frequent performances. Highly regarded by the Arlano Symphony.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A clarinet made by the Arlano Music Company. Its deep, rich sound make it a favorite among Arlano Symphony players and amateurs alike. Even beginners like it due to its easy assembly.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A harp made by the Arlano Music Company. The dignified design would fit perfectly in a royal classic. Anyone with an ear for classical music will instantly fall in love with its vibrant harmonies. And the accompanying chair is so well made, with a sturdy frame and comfortable cushions, that customers often ask if it can be purchased separately.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A timpani made by the Arlano Music Company. Its melodic tone draws the audience in. The immaculate design of this instrument make it beloved by anyone who has a passion for music.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: This electric guitar is crafted from the finest materials from Taliskar. The hardy yet modern design is popular to both beginners and experts alike. For a pure sound, choose Purio by Trio Workshop.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: You can feel the deep, dulcet tones in your soul when this bass guitar is played by a true musician. The hardy yet modern design is popular to both beginners and experts alike. For a pure sound, choose Purio by Trio Workshop.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: This simple drum kit is outfitted with a robust metal frame and quality leather padding. The new materials make it a delight to play. For a pure sound, choose Purio by Trio Workshop.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition piano made by the Arlano Music Company. Its strings produce a delicate, clear sound. Both classical enthusiasts and members of the Arlano Symphony recommend this instrument.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition guitar made by the Arlano Music Company. It sounds as beautiful as it looks, and it's durable enough to handle lengthy performances. A versatile instrument that's favored by hobbyists and professionals.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition clarinet made by the Arlano Music Company. It produces a deep, rich sound that is a signature of the Arlano Symphony. The ease with which can be assembled and disassembled makes it popular among beginners, too.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition harp made by the Arlano Music Company. The dignified design would fit perfectly in a royal classic. Anyone with an ear for classical music will instantly fall in love with its vibrant harmonies. And the accompanying chair is so well made, with a sturdy frame and comfortable cushions, that customers often ask if it can be purchased separately.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition timpani made by the Arlano Music Company. Its melodic tone draws the audience in. The immaculate design of this instrument make it beloved by anyone who has a passion for music.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A violin made by the Arlano Music Company. The Arlano Symphony recommends this violin for everyone, from beginners to professional violinists.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A cello made by the Arlano Music Company. The gorgeous finish is reminiscent of autumn. Even members of the symphony are hard pressed to match the elegance of this instrument.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A pan flute made by the Arlano Music Company. Its gentle tones bring to mind images of nature. No other instrument can match the pan flute's unique ambiance, and it's easy enough to play for brand new musicians.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A saxophone made by the Arlano Music Company. Perfect for a jazz ensemble.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A trombone made by the Arlano Music Company. Its unique shape has captured the popular imagination, but its soft, invigorating tones reveal that it is more than a novelty.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A trumpet made by the Arlano Music Company. The brilliant, clear sound of the trumpet makes it ideal for joyous celebrations and regal pronouncements.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: An ocarina made by the Arlano Music Company. This classic instrument is fun for all ages. The beautiful, gentle tone is favored by the Arlano Symphony.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: An acoustic bass guitar made by the Arlano Music Company. It's a quieter instrument, but no one can doubt the quality of the sound. Widely appreciated by those who enjoy nuance in their music.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A vibraphone made by the Arlano Music Company. This key instrument fits in many jazz and percussion ensembles. It's played using a small rubber mallet.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition piano produced by the Arlano Music Company for the Maple Festival. The spirit of maple leaves fills your very soul when you perform with this instrument. The exquisite design allows it to create delicate yet clear sounds.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition guitar produced by the Arlano Music Company for the Maple Festival. The spirit of maple leaves fills your very soul when you perform with this instrument. It's already well liked thanks to its elegant design, but the luxurious, warm tones enhance its popularity even further. The durability of the guitar also allows it to handle lengthy performances.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition clarinet produced by the Arlano Music Company for the Maple Festival. The spirit of maple leaves fills your very soul when you perform with this instrument. The deep, rich sounds it can produce make it a favorite among members of the Arlano Symphony and other classical music admirers.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition harp produced by the Arlano Music Company for the Maple Festival. The spirit of maple leaves fills your very soul when you perform with this instrument. The dignified design would fit perfectly in a royal classic. Anyone with an ear for classical music will instantly fall in love with its vibrant harmonies.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition timpani produced by the Arlano Music Company for the Maple Festival. The spirit of maple leaves fills your very soul when you perform with this instrument. The immaculate design of this instrument make it beloved by anyone who has a passion for music.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: There's no mistaking this electric piano for an acoustic one. This plays to its advantage, and music critics praise its crisp, clear notes. For a pure sound, choose Purio by Trio Workshop.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: The excellent finish and vivid color captivates all who look at this pick bass. The sounds it produce are just as beautiful. For a pure sound, choose Purio by Trio Workshop.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: This steel drum produces refreshing, piercing beats. For a pure sound, choose Purio by Trio Workshop.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: Mint's practice harp. You're only borrowing it for a few days, so it wouldn't hurt to squeeze in a few practice sessions.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: An oboe made by the Arlano Music Company. A melodic instrument that acts as a unifying sound for other instruments.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A violin made by the Arlano Music Company. It is specially designed to be played pizzicato, by plucking with your fingers rather than using a bow.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A harpsichord made by the Arlano Music Company. It possesses a unique, elegant charm wholly different from its relative, the piano.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition piano produced by the Arlano Music Company for the Cherry Blossom Festival. The spirit of cherry blossoms fills your very soul when you perform with this instrument. The exquisite design allows it to create delicate yet clear sounds.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition guitar produced by the Arlano Music Company for the Cherry Blossom Festival. The spirit of cherry blossoms fills your very soul when you perform with this instrument. It's already well liked thanks to its elegant design, but the luxurious, warm tones enhance its popularity even further. The durability of the guitar also allows it to handle lengthy performances.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: Rock out with the ever-adorable Pink Bean on this radical pink electric guitar!
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A clarinet designed to look like a lily. The craftsmanship is so exquisite that you can't tell it's an instrument from far away.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A beautiful harp featuring floral designs and gold.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A beautiful Grand Piano decorated with flowers and gold.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A harmonica produced by the Arlano Music Company. Its compact size makes it quite portable. While it's a very easy instrument to learn, mastering it will take practice and dedication.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A Xylophone produced by the Arlano Music Company. It is a charming little instrument where a mallet is used to strike wooden bars.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A piano decorated with Ray's name. If you play it, Ray dances near the piano and watches you perform.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it. Can play music continuously if used with 3 solo music scores.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition clarinet made by the Arlano Music Company. It produces a deep, rich sound that is a signature of the Arlano Symphony. The ease with which can be assembled and disassembled makes it popular among beginners, too.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: An electric guitar that resembles a witch's broomstick. When played, it conjures up a mysterious magic symbol.
key.guideDescription: Double-click from your inventory window to use. Possesses 3 solo performance slots for playing songs back-to-back.

key.tooltipDescription: A bass guitar. When played, it summons intense flames which engulf you.
key.guideDescription: Double-click from your inventory window to use. Possesses 3 solo performance slots for playing songs back-to-back.

key.tooltipDescription: A tom-tom drum engraved with comical jack-o'-lanterns. When played, tasty chocolates pop out.
key.guideDescription: Double-click from your inventory window to use. Possesses 3 solo performance slots for playing songs back-to-back.

key.tooltipDescription: A limited-edition timpani produced by the Arlano Music Company for the Maple Festival. The spirit of maple leaves fills your very soul when you perform with this instrument. The immaculate design of this instrument make it beloved by anyone who has a passion for music.

key.tooltipDescription: A grand piano decorated with soft velvet and a big poinsettia. You should use it to play something romantic!
key.guideDescription: Double-click from your inventory window to use. Possesses 3 solo performance slots for playing songs back-to-back.

key.tooltipDescription: A violin designed to look like a Christmas Tree ornamented by stars.
key.guideDescription: Double-click from your inventory window to use. Possesses 3 solo performance slots for playing songs back-to-back.

key.tooltipDescription: An electric guitar with the strong symbol of Dark Wind.

key.tooltipDescription: A tom-tom drum with a strong symbol of the Tria Guard.

key.tooltipDescription: A saxophone with a strong symbol of the Maple Alliance.

key.tooltipDescription: An electric piano with the strong symbol of the Lumiknights.

key.tooltipDescription: A harp with a strong symbol of the Green Hoods.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: Only adventurers who are rich in Treva coins can get their hands on this cello. The unsettlingly life-like wings and intricate carvings make it a very popular instrument.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: Only adventurers who are rich in Treva coins can get their hands on this oboe. With a design reminiscent of a small dragon, it remains one of the top oboes available.

key.tooltipDescription: Only adventurers who are rich in Treva coins can get their hands on this violin. Despite being limited to only pizzicato, the crimson coloration and elaborate designs keep this violin highly-regarded.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory window to use it.

key.tooltipDescription: Only adventurers who are rich in Treva coins can get their hands on this piano. The antique design, accented with wax drippings, gives it an ominous air even before you factor in the bat.

key.tooltipDescription: A lovely pink ocarina. It tune is both beautiful and graceful.

key.tooltipDescription: A fancy pink vibraphone. Its notes leave behind a delicate resonance, allowing it to create beautiful melodies.
key.guideDescription: Double-click from your inventory window to use. Possesses 3 solo performance slots for playing songs back-to-back.

key.tooltipDescription: A recorder produced by the Arlano Music Company. It's an accessible but very versatile instrument, capable of deep and rich tones.

key.tooltipDescription: A celesta produced by the Arlano Music Company. It adds variety to any orchestra as a keyboard instrument with a clear, pure sound.

key.tooltipDescription: An electric piano with a tropical summer theme. The parrot sings along to the music.

key.tooltipDescription: A steel drum with a tropical summer theme. Perfect for playing on the beach.

key.tooltipDescription: A graphic novel that tells the tragic tale of a young griffin. It's a famous story that's been told for generations among the Vayar tribes.
A precious picture diary from $npcName:22000022$'s treasure chest. The photos from $npcName:22000022$'s past are almost unreasonably cute.
A dismal, ragged book found on a $npcName:21000102$. Just the sight of the cover fills you with dread.
Currently the best-selling graphic novel in all of Maple World. Though the tale is bittersweet, fans cannot get enough of this perky piggy.
A scrapbook containing clippings about the MSL robot recall scandal that shocked the world.
Doctor Kartronic's research notes on the Mark-52 Project. Surely there are secrets to bring to light within.
A promotional brochure full of Tuning Motors' Strider lineup for the year. It appears multiple pages have been torn out.
The 69th issue of a series of journals documenting the travels of the legendary adventurer Hephaestus. It discusses at length the myth surrounding the location of Stoniconda's heart.
A guide for tourists at $map:02000124$. It goes into great detail about the types of facilities, the kinds of uniforms, and the... quirks of the warden.
A quirky scientist's research journal concerning the Shadow World. You can tell from the tattered pages and well-worn cover that this log has been through a great deal.
An encyclopedia that covers the monsters found in $map:02000023$ and all of their characteristics.

A best-selling novel from one of Maple World's most renowned novelists, <font color='#00aaef'>Rawling</font>. He was inspired to write this novel when he witnessed for himself the <font color='#00aaef'>burning tree of Peronia Woods</font>.

A nature magazine issued by the environmental protection organization <font color='#00aaef'>Green Hood</font>. It contains a thorough report concerning the pollution that's affecting $map:02000100$ and the surrounding areas.

Stay up to date with all of the hot hairstyles with this magazine. The editors are among the most passionate and dedicated people around when it comes to hair, and are often Maple World's leading trend-setters on all things fashion. As one of their editors once said, fashion begins and ends with hair!

A magazine focused on all aspects of architecture and interior design. The publication began when up-and-coming architects decided that there needed to be a dedicated source of information for aspiring designers out there.
Though issues of this magazine are not published on a regular schedule, it's always praised for having consistently unique content that provides inspiration for many.
This magazine has pages upon pages of sleek, practical, and affordable interior designs that were personally recommended by professionals.
Each issue of this publication covers a different element of interior design. This one is all about simple designs anyone can do by themselves.
Each issue of this publication covers a different element of interior design. This one is all about the designs of $map:02000051$.

A new block-shaped robot toy that can be disassembled and reassembled as you like! The catalog for the Block Golem series can be used to receive 5% off on all purchases, though the hotline to order them is not always as helpful as it should be.
Fashion tips to capture the distinct punk style of $npcName:21000013$ are here! Give the unique yet subtle charm of $npcName:21000013$ a try.
Every moment that $npcName:11000178$ was away from $npcName:11000492$ is recorded here, from the day $npcName:11000492$ was born.
A detailed account of the daily habits of both the palace servants and $npcName:11000492$ is recorded here.
An exhaustive overview of $npcName:11000492$'s plans to smuggle valuables from the palace.
$npcName:11000526$'s secret diary. There are subtle hints all throughout which suggest that someone else has been manipulating $npcName:11000526$ behind the scenes this entire time.
A blueprint for building the largest clocktower in Maple World.
A collection of pictures from fans of $npcName:11000735$ that have seen $npcName:11000735$ in person.
The saga of $npcName:21000161$'s stinky growing pains.
A legendary dish that only the most powerful of adventurers can eat. Do you dare?
Experts $npcName:11000071$ and $npcName:11000072$ keep you up to date on all the latest skin tips.
A biography of the legendary female warrior of $map:02000051$.
The diary of the missing captain from Victoria Island.
Book 2 of the saga of $npcName:21000161$ and his foul weapon.
A scrapbook made by $npcName:11000069$.
An issue from the popular Maple Comics series, drawn by adventurers. Featuring: Sinanju
An issue from the popular Maple Comics series, drawn by adventurers. Featuring: Boss, SatanNim, and CandyDuck
An issue from the popular Maple Comics series, drawn by adventurers. Featuring: UhDeOop
A booklet on UGC instructions, guidelines, and warnings about copyright infringement.
An issue from the popular Maple Comics series, drawn by adventurers. Featuring: HSN, ABearWithOneHand, Kshatriya, and SatanNim
An issue from the popular Maple Comics series, drawn by adventurers. Featuring: Kshatriya, Sinanju, and SatanNim
Book 3 of the saga of $npcName:21000161$ and his foul weapon.
The infamous tale of the girls who vanished without a trace.
The infamous tale of the girls who vanished without a trace.
A collection of pictures from fans of $npcName:11000735$ that have seen $npcName:11000735$ in person.
An issue from the popular Maple Comics series, drawn by adventurers. Featuring: HSN, MinSung, and Cube
The forgotten chronicles of Drachenheim and the dragons of light.
Instructions on how to properly compose music.
A promotional flier for $map:02010053$'s grand opening celebration.
A promotional flier for the opening celebration of $map:02010053$. $npcName:11001292$ has covered it in doodles.

key.tooltipDescription: A rare gem that glimmers with warm, green light. It can be obtained from world bosses and golden treasure chests.

key.tooltipDescription: The light is gone from this once precious gem.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the item in your inventory to receive 4 blue stars.

key.tooltipDescription: A smooth gem that radiates black light. It can be obtained by dismantling gear.
key.guideDescription: Catalysts used when enchanting or transcending your gear. Use to improve the strength, durability, and the power of your gear during enchanting or transcendence.

key.tooltipDescription: A rare onyx crystal that glows with spectral light. Despite its instability, it is highly valued for its unique properties. It can be obtained by dismantling Epic tier gear or better.
key.guideDescription: Catalysts used when enchanting or transcending your gear. Used alongside onyx crystal, to improve the strength, durability, and the power of your gear during enchanting or transcendence.

key.tooltipDescription: This crystal is an important ingredient in runes for high-level enchants. It is obtained from failed enchants on gear level 50 or above whose quality is epic or better, and which has a bonus of +10 or higher.
key.guideDescription: A material used to create defiance runes.

key.tooltipDescription: A small, cube-shaped power source that radiates mysterious starlight. You can trade blue stars, red stars, and rues with merchants in Queenstown to receive metacells.
key.guideDescription: Take this special battery to $npcName:11000508$ in $map:02000203$ or $npcName:11000510$ in $map:02010063$ to change the bonus attributes on level 50 or higher epic equipment. It can also be used to change the bonus abilities of pets.

key.mainDescription: Place and Press C to Configure
key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff5401'>The latest prototype out of FUNFUN Labs. This beta portal is being offered for 0 mesos while it is in testing.</font>\nThis magic portal can be connected to other portals in your home or to areas that you have already visited in the outside world.
key.guideDescription: After placing a portal in your home, select it while in Build Mode and press the C key. This will let you set either another portal in your house or an area you've visited before as a destination. These settings will be cleared if you remove the portal.

key.tooltipDescription: Activate to enable PvP in your home.
key.guideDescription: Can be activated once placed in your home. Starts a PvP battle after configuring the battle rules and pressing Start. You can choose One-on-One or Party duels, and set health, potion, revival, and match rules. Guests must wait 5 sec after entering the home before joining a duel. Pets cannot be used during a duel.

key.tooltipDescription: After years spent tending to the gardens of $map:02000328$, this fairfolk has decided to set out and see Maple World for herself. Will you be her companion?
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A ferocious horse empowered by the power of infernal flame. Only a rider with an inner fire of their own could tame such a beast.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Ishura is such a heartthrob! From the illustration on this pillow, you can totally see his wild side. Imagine the soothing sound of his voice whispering in your ear as you hold this pillow tight...
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Oska: leader of the Green Hoods, master archer, and now, star of her very own body pillow! Imagine the melodious sound of her voice whispering in your ear as you hold this pillow tight...
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Guardsman Marmut has made it his mission to provide a mount for all of Maple World's heroes. Since he can't afford that many horses, he's personally giving them all piggyback rides, instead. Is this how Empress Ereve gets around?
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: As it turns out, a heart of gold beats under Urza's grizzled hide. If you entrust yourself to Urza, the great bear will get you where you need to go.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A flock of adorable ducklings will carry you to adventure.

key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Rainbows and sparkle follow this unicorn everywhere it goes. When you're on this steed, you can't help but overflow with happiness.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A special skateboard to commemorate the anniversary of your adventures in Maple World.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: This mysterious spirit was discovered in the lair of an ancient rune sorcerer. It once protected the sanctuary from intruders, but now it serves loyally under a new master.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount.

key.tooltipDescription: This plump slime thinks it's a ball. It's soft and cool, tempting many adventurers to lean against it to escape the summer heat. That's probably safe... right?
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A sunset fox with a beautiful purple sheen. Most sunset foxes are aloof, but some can be made into fast friends. This particular fox seems to be especially friendly.

key.tooltipDescription: This Halloween, go trick-or-treating with Maple World's premier lady killer, Michael!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: She may not smile much, but her charm is undeniable. Explore Maple World with Rebecca, the chic maid.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Celebrate Halloween with a night on the town followed by four-star cuisine. It's Maple World's master chef, Startz!

key.tooltipDescription: One of Frey's warhorses, Alexion is the best companion you could ask for on the battlefield. His shiny black coat makes an unforgettable first impression and his tail looks like the flames of justice. He is bridled in ancient armor forged from the deepest mines and kept in top condition by Frey's ancestors.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action. Complete chaotic raids to obtain $itemPlural:30000601$, which you can use to purchase $item:50600153$.

key.tooltipDescription: A docile dairy cow. Her name is Lucky, but how lucky is she if she's got an adventurer riding her all day?
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A reliable yellow bull. His name is Hefty because of his broad back and strong legs.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A fox of the glacial plains. Most ice foxes are susceptible to the heat, but this one has managed to adapt to warmer climes. This ice fox will be a steadfast companion through Maple World.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: This scooter is a great travel companion. It will quickly get you anywhere you want to go.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A panda with a round belly. It may look slow, but it can go stunningly fast when it puts its mind to it. This mount will surely bring you luck.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A classic camper van. Just looking at it makes you want to drive off into the great unknown.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A team of engineers created this scooter for a singular purpose: the speedy delivery of noodles.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A cute pink camper van. Drive into the great unknown!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A golden lucky pig. Simply looking at it brings good fortune.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Why break a sweat traveling, when you can sit back in a fancy chair atop your reliable Yeti friend? Just enjoy the ride!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A lion costume that moves while dancing excitedly. You can feel the excitement of the people controlling the lion costume.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: When Zakum fell, a portion of his evil power remained in this hand. It now serves as a terribly uncomfortable mount. Some people think the hand walks like a spider because it's possessed by the ghost of a spider that Zakum crushed, but these people are idiots.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: An authentic replica of an Equirria, a vintage motorcycle. It features the symbol of the Gray Wolf.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A stylish REDACTED CAR.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount.

key.tooltipDescription: Ride in Ray's arms. To take you to your destination safely, Ray keeps his gaze forward, but if there are any brief stops, he looks at you with loving eyes.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A ripe chestnut. Roll on to grand adventure!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A fresh new grassy green camper van. Drive off into the great unknown!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A sleek red camper van. Drive into the great unknown!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A chic black camper van. Drive into the great unknown!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A panda with a round belly. It may look slow, but it can go stunningly fast when it puts its mind to it. This mount will surely bring you luck.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: The ghost of a shy girl. In life, there was nothing she loved more than chocolate. Give her some and she might just become your friend.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.
