A lovely heart with wings.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Go for a spin with Maple World's premier lady killer, Michael!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: She may not smile much, but her charm is undeniable. Explore Maple World with Rebecca, the chic maid.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Celebrate with a night on the town followed by four-star cuisine. It's Maple World's master chef, Startz!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Little Horus is looking for a friendâ€”do you want the job?
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: An adorable white duck. Take it to the water and watch it splash around in delight.\n\n<font color='#00aaef'>Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.</font>
Many $npcPlural:21000149$ can be found in $map:02000250$. The broccoli on its back is stunted, making it easy to climb.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Ride around on the back of a pink whale. Thar she blows!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Ride around on the back of a blue whale. It's like taking the sea with you wherever you go!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: According to legend, creatures such as this were once loyal to the Fairy King. Some say that a creature such as this was the Fairy King...
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Ride on the shoulders of a robot controlled by a couple of friendly octopuses! The Yellow Octo-Robo normally toddles along merrily, but can run on all fours when you're in a hurry.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A cute Pharaoh Cat was discovered in a hidden region during a Sky Fortress Maple World biological exploration mission! The crewmembers were surprised by their adorable appearance and spent a long time with them... But one day, they boarded in secret and would not get off! That is how the Pharaoh Cats joined Sky Fortress.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Nairin, the Green Hood aide-de-camp, is drawn on this pillow. Your steps become light as you hold on to this pillow of Nairin who backs up Maple World and is a reliable support.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: Mason, a temple knight of the Lumiknights, is drawn on this pillow. Your steps become light as you hold on to this pillow of Mason who displays a charismatic performance to eradicate dark energy from all over Maple World.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: It's a cute, adorable Tamed Lil Boogie. Contrary to expectations, it move by floating, and not rolling.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount.

key.tooltipDescription: This calf gives off a holy aura.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: You can hold tight on the back of the soft Chow Chow to move. It's very snuggy that you can fall asleep.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A large elephant with a sun symbol printed on its forehead. It looks ferocious but won't harm you.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: This adorable mythical beast is adorned in a harmony of colors.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: This mystical rabbit flops its ears as it hops around. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A magic piggy that ran away from an unidentified traveling circus. The ears and tail that flap every time it runs is cute.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: It's a huge golden mic. You're obviously on your way to streaming super-stardom!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: You can become Armored Checky in this large robot mount.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A pleasantly plump fairy rabbit that rolls up like a ball of snow.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount.

key.tooltipDescription: These two adorable fluffuses are best friends. They can be your friends, too!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action. Can carry multiple adventurers.

key.tooltipDescription: A zooming hand cart that can be used when participating in the Mushking Royale. It can't be used outside of Mushtopia.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: It's a cute Ducky Car. Ducky's eyes shine when you increase the speed.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A rickshaw decorated with a panda face and a red lantern. You'll need to pull it yourself since there's no one to pull it.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action. Can carry multiple adventurers.

key.tooltipDescription: A very responsible panda who is an expert at delivery. Call it to take you wherever you want to go. It will gently wrap you in lotus leaf, carry you on its back, and run there quickly... Why does it feel like the panda is treating you like a lotus leaf rice packed lunch?
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A vampire unicorn enveloped in red light. Its gaze feels like it drains the life from you.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A carriage decorated with luxurious gold ornaments and purple velvet.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action. Can carry multiple adventurers.

key.tooltipDescription: It's a large Chromite Sedan with a glossy shine.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount.

key.tooltipDescription: A warhorse running with sparkling eyes and its wings spread out.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A Sloth Owl whose wings turned into legs for living in a place with barely any trees.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: It's a cute Jungle Spider. Don't tease it because it only has 4 legs.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: This lobster isn't a big fan of water. The bowl on its back is surprisingly comfortable.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: An adorable duck with a thirst for adventure. Hop on its back to get around more quickly.\n\n<font color='#00aaef'>Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.</font>

Ride this flying fan to ascend <font color='#ff8ae5'>0.5</font>Â m every sec to a maximum of <font color='#ff8ae5'>4</font>Â m. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff5f5f'>6.5</font>Â m per sec. You cannot use this item indoors or in certain restricted regions.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount.

key.tooltipDescription: Two friends can get on this Orange Mushroom. How lovely it is to see two plump mushrooms moving together!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action. Can carry multiple adventurers.

key.tooltipDescription: A treasure chest that can run like the wind. Forget the gold, the real treasure is zipping around in a magic box!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: A rickshaw pulled by a panda. If you watch carefully, you might catch the panda doing tricks!
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: This banana boat comfortably seats three. Not for use in water.

key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use from a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a directional key to perform a special action. Your mount's appearance has been altered by your equipped medals.

The bloody feud between $npcName:23000019$ and humankind began when some human thieves foolishy attempted to steal $npcName:23000019$'s eggs.
$npcName:23000020$ is ever-vigilant against humans who would steel her eggs. With unrelenting rage, she flaps her magnificent wings to blow these would-be thieves away.
As the leader of the griffins, $npcName:23000021$ constantly broods over the plight of his kin.

The first of the Baphomets, $npcName:23000026$ is feared for his merciless cruelty.

key.tooltipDescription: A rare salamander imported by the Allicari merchants. It grows hot and spits burning sparks when upset.
key.guideDescription: Place it inside or outside your home and use it to receive a buff.

key.tooltipDescription: A rare snake imported by the Allicari merchants. This one is particularly colorful.
key.guideDescription: Place it inside or outside your home and use it to receive a buff.

key.tooltipDescription: A rare bat imported by the Allicari merchants. It has a tendency to spit fire, so approach with caution.
key.guideDescription: Place it inside or outside your home and use it to receive a buff.

key.mainDescription: In the Dark Descent:\nPhysical Attack/Magic Attack +10%
key.tooltipDescription: A souvenir that grants special powers while in $map:02000350$.
key.guideDescription: Place it inside or outside your home and use it to receive a buff.

key.tooltipDescription: A golden carp that only a truly worthy fisher may possess.
A souvenir honoring Ducky Di Mozzarella, the legendary conductor.

A special souvenir given only to those who prove their courage.\n\nPhysical and magic damage increases by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> in (Normal) Frozen Sanctum, Illusory Pyramid, Tronix Bunker, Blaknov, and Abandoned Marina.

A special souvenir given only to those who prove their courage.\n\nPhysical and magic damage increases by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> in (Chaotic) Moonlight Fortress, Shadow Altar, (Challenge) Labyrinthine Halls, Pyratalos, (Normal) Baraska Ice Cave, Blueshade Cave, and Casa de Luna.
A souvenir that grants special powers while in $map:02000350$.
key.guideDescription: Place it inside or outside your home and use it to receive a buff.

key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000512$ hails from Cadimia Island, a small isle near Maple Island. She's a whiz at household chores, but not so good with electronics or cooking tools, leading to some silly situations. She always tries her best, so it's hard to hold a grudge.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.
\nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: Inspired by $npcName:11000444$'s voyage, $npcName:11000019$ dreams of one day setting sail to explore the world. Since work at the $map:02000068$ has grown scarce, he's started accepting housekeeping jobs to save for the journey. He was never formally trained as a housekeeper, but he performs his duty with cheerful thoroughness.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000003$ spent every last meso to get to $map:02000001$ for the ceremony with $npcName:11000075$, but then the ceremony was canceled. He realized he needed to find work if he wanted to eat, so he became a housekeeper. He's lazy and lounges in bed when the owner is away, but somehow still keeps the house squeaky clean.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: After his wife passed away, $npcName:11000225$ mourned for years. Determined to distract himself from how much he missed her, he started working as a housekeeper. His wife always took care of the cleaning, cooking, and laundry, so he has much to learn, but he's a quick study and uses his age and experience to his advantage.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: A resident of $map:02000001$, $npcName:11000002$ is a professional maid who has years of experience. She's an especially good cook. Anyone who has tasted her special unagi can never forget its taste. It's so delicious, $npcName:11000119$ is devising a plot to seduce the demons of the Land of Darkness with $npcName:11000002$'s delicious cooking.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000420$ works tirelessly to support her timid mother. She's got a steel will and never complains, no matter how overwhelming the situation gets. She acts tough but actually has a sensitive, caring heart.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: Dr. Kartronic's first everyday use robot. $npcName:11000772$ can behave oddly when she encounters a system error but handles her chores pretty well overall. Sometimes, you'd swear she has emotions. What secrets could be hiding behind her expressionless blue eyes?
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: The $npcName:11000773$ treats injuries in the treacherous Land of Darkness, but he seems more interested in mesos than in helping the sick. No one knows what he used to do before he chose this profession. Looking into his soulless eyes, you sometimes wonder if he's human at all...
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: The world is $npcName:11000253$'s canvas. An artist, and proud of it, $npcName:11000253$ never lets the haters get to him. He may seem like he's in his own world, but he cares deeply about what makes people tick and the experiences that shape them. He can't resist anything new or interesting, which is how he picked up housekeeping. You can't help but wonder what interesting tidbits he knows.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.
\nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.
\nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: Once, $npcName:11000777$ lived in $map:02000025$ with the royal family, and she never lets anyone forget it. She's currently searching for someone to pamper her and thinks you might be a good fit for the job. If you make her happy, she might offer you some unexpected help, but only if she feels like it.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000711$ was a member of the Bunnies. She's a bit clumsy but also cheerful and charming. She prances about, laughing about how everything's great, but she harbors a painful secret. Maybe she'll tell you if you gain her trust.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: Gorgeous, charming, and one of the most talented traders in the entire $map:02000216$, $npcName:11000515$ isn't someone you'd picture working as a servant. Something feels off, but all suspicions melt away when she captures you in her bewitching blue eyes.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000406$ is sooo jaded with the entertainment industry and all it's superficial fame and fortune. All he wants is to return to life before he was so darn famous, but he never expected chores to be difficult! He's constantly peeking over his shoulder, afraid someone will recognize him with his make-up off.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: When $npcName:11000617$, one of $npc:11000119$'s royal guards, decided to become a servant, everyone was shocked. He's done well so far, despite being a bit indecisive at times. With $npcName:11000617$ waiting on you hand and foot in his shining armor, sometimes you feel like the empress herself.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: With endless stamina and deadly bow skills, there's no doubt that $npcName:11000547$ from $map:02000076$ will keep your home safe from all intruders. But why is a Green Hood taking on such menial work? Could there be something important $npcName:11000547$ is saving up for?
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000787$ once worked as a $map:02000100$ bartender. His dream is to be the emcee of a fabulous show, and then he can leave his servant days behind him. He loves to debate, so it can be a bit tiring conversing with him.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000022$ is determined to captain a giant ship and discover a new world one day, which is why he's working hard to save up the money now. He may have never been on an adventure in his life, but he grew up in $map:02000062$ and knows how to talk big. Whether there's any substance behind his words remains to be seen.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: As an elf from $map:02000023$, $npcName:11000036$ has an affinity for trees and flowers. Most fairfolk refuse to have anything to do with humans, so she must have a special reason for working as an assistant. The job itself isn't difficult, but dealing with humans makes her anxious.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: He was once found wandering $map:02000051$ and begging for scraps, but he's found a new gig as a servant. No one knows his real name or where he comes from. He's grumpy and nonsensical, but if you're nice, he'll pray for you. You have a hunch he took this job just so he'd have a roof over his head.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: A member of the Barrota Trading Company, $npcName:11000097$ peddles his wares in dangerous places no one else dares venture. He's also known for his superb memory. It's strange to find him working as a servant, but some speculate is has something to do with the Company's new business plan.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: He may look young, but this fairfolk is older than you'd think. He loves to read and share everything he learns, but ask him about anything personal, and he clams right up.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000185$ runs $map:02000123$ in $map:02000001$. She thought signing up for work as a servant would put her on the ground floor of drumming up some new clientÃ¨le, but people only seem interested in her personal life.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: $npcName:11000081$ may be shy, but he's also a whiz with magic and crafting. Unlike others of his ilk, he wants to give humans the benefit of the doubt. Nonetheless, it took him some time to work up the guts to accept a job as a servant.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: The epitome of a household servant. He's courteous and loyal, to the point you might get a little uncomfortable. The one thing he can't resist is the fragrance of a light, refreshing cup of earl gray tea in the morning.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: Self-conscious about her popularity, this maid can act coy and unfriendly when you approach her. But once you get to know her, you'll see a loving side you never expected. Just keep in mind that her bad sense of humor may throw you off at times.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: Often quiet and calm, she doesn't show much emotion and tends to be a loner. When you get to know her, you'll realize her hard exterior is merely protection for her soft heart. Maybe you're the one she's been waiting for to break through...
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: Perfectly competent and capable, he is the ideal servant. He sees to your needs before you're even aware of them, but there's something about him... Don't try to ask him questions about himself. He prefers to keep your relationship strictly professional.
key.guideDescription: \nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.
\nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.
\nPlace this in your home to hire an assistant. You can hire up to two assistants and ask them to craft items for you. This item must be placed on the floor.

key.tooltipDescription: This is your chance to get a Scarlet Heart outfit and weapon! Contains a tier 3 fantastic gemstone box and a spirit spellstone.
key.guideDescription:
Double-click in your inventory to get what's inside.

<font color='#FFFFFF'>Special Scarlet Heart Package (M) Contents Guide
 - The outfit inside the Scarlet Heart Outfit Package (M) will be bound to whoever opens it.
 - You can pick 1 weapon from the Scarlet Heart weapon box.
 - The gemstone box contains a random tier 3 fantastic gemstone.

Scarlet Heart Outfit Attributes
[Basic Attributes]
 - Eyewear: Accuracy +2
 - Earrings: Critical Rate +10
 - Headgear: Critical Evasion +10
 - Suit: Strength/Dexterity/Intelligence/Luck +2
 - Gloves: Damage vs. Elite Monsters +2%
 - Shoes: Movement Speed +1%
[Set Attributes]
 - 3 Pieces: Damage vs. Elite Monsters +2%
 Damage vs. Boss Monsters +2%
 Scarlet Rose Heart
 - 6 Pieces: Piercing +2%
 Blooming Scarlet Rose</font>

<font color='#ff8ae5'>3 Pieces - Scarlet Rose Heart</font>
Your skills have a <font color='#ff8ae5'>4%</font> chance to increase attack speed by <font color='#ff8ae5'>2%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>120</font> sec.
 This effect also applies to normal attacks.
This can only occur once every <font color='#ff8ae5'>180</font> sec.
<font color='#ff8ae5'>6 Pieces - Blooming Scarlet Rose</font>

key.guideDescription: Double-click the capsule from your inventory to obtain a pet.

key.tooltipDescription: A package of crispy organic pet food. 1kg of food is good for 1 day. Can be consumed by any pet.
key.guideDescription: Double-click the package in your inventory to get pet food. The package can be traded one time before it is opened.\n\nYou have to feed your pet regularly if you want to keep it at its best! Double-click this item, then drag a hungry pet into the Feed Pet window. You can feed your pet for up to 365 days.

â€¢ Pet attacks have a chance to reduce target's critical rate by 90 for 5 sec

key.tooltipDescription: Candy designed for and beloved by monsters. The bottom of the package reads: "Recommended by 9 out of 10 monsters."
key.guideDescription: <font color='#9FC93C'>Throw these at "hungry" monsters that appear in the fields to make them like you. When you increase their fondness enough, they become "docile", and you can try to capture them using the snares.</font>\nYou need to be level 50 or higher to capture a pet. Dryad Candies can be purchased from Supply Merchants in major cities.

key.tooltipDescription: Candy designed for and beloved by monsters. It's said to be more filling than the standard flavor, which doesn't really make sense. The package reads: "Kid tested, monster approved!"
key.guideDescription: <font color='#9FC93C'>It's delicious pet candy! Throw it at a hungry monsters to increase their fondness toward you. Once they become docile, you can attempt to capture them using a snare.</font>\nYou must be level 50 or higher to tame a pet.

key.tooltipDescription: Candy designed for and beloved by monsters. You can use it to pacify hungry monsters around the world, allowing you to capture them. It's said to be more filling than the mild flavor. The package reads: "Kid tested, monster approved!"
key.guideDescription: <font color='#9FC93C'>It's delicious pet candy! Throw it at a hungry monsters to increase their fondness toward you. Once they become docile, you can attempt to capture them using a snare.</font>\nYou must be level 50 or higher to tame a pet.

key.mainDescription: <font color='#ffffff'>Pet Taming Tool\n</font><font color='#909090'>For Docile Monsters</font>
key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ffffff'>Taming Pets
 â€¢ Very high chance of capturing a normal pet
 â€¢ Very low chance of capturing rare, exceptional, or epic pet</font>

A monster snare developed by Dryad Co. Because the designs are publicly available, anyone with some knowhow can assemble a snare, however no one quite understands how it works.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#9FC93C'>This item can be placed on the floor for a set time before it breaks. If a docile monster steps on the snare, they are captured and become your pet. However, if a hungry monster steps on the trap, the trap will be broken.</font>\nYou need to be level 50 or higher to capture a pet.

Throw this next-gen electric snare at a monster to capture them with ease!</font>

key.mainDescription: <font color='#ffffff'>Trains Pets\n</font><font color='#909090'>Increase pet experience by 1,500</font>
key.tooltipDescription: This amazing holo-emitter from Dryad Co. is the final word in pet training. Just boot it up and follow along with the virtual instructor. Small print letters on the device read: "Beware of imitation products."
key.guideDescription: You can use this item to train a pet, increasing their experience immediately.

key.tooltipDescription: Allows you to make chosen gear and outfits invisible.
key.guideDescription: Drag this badge to the corresponding slot in your character window, or right-click it in your inventory to use. While equipped, you can access transparency settings via a button over the badge in your character window. Only one transparency badge can be equipped at a time. Weapons cannot be made invisible.

key.tooltipDescription: While equipped, continuously gathers until the chance becomes none. Usable for mining, foraging, ranching, or farming.
key.guideDescription: When equipped to the appropriate badge slot, auto-gathering will be enabled when mining, foraging, ranching or farming.

key.tooltipDescription: A badge that triggers a special visual effect when you come within 1.5Â m of the character with the paired badge.
key.guideDescription: The special effect only triggers when two characters with paired badges stand in close proximity. Moving causes the effect to end after 5 seconds. If your buddy changes their name, equip the badge again after they log in to update it.

Armor made from the scales of a lumarigon, an ancient dragon race that died off in the war against darkness. The power of darkness still clings to the scales, but this power can be used to help you in battle if you wear several pieces. However, you should be careful to not let the power corrupt you.
key.guideDescription: Set effects are not active in battlegrounds or arenas.

The power of darkness still clings to the scales, but this power can be used to help you in battle if you wear several pieces. However, you should be careful to not let the power corrupt you.
key.guideDescription: Set effects are not active in battlegrounds or arenas.

key.tooltipDescription: A necklace that holds the song of the sirens. Long ago, the sirens sang with all their hearts to sailors passing by their islands. Apparently the singing was so terrible that it through the sailors into a frenzied rage.
A ring containing Bjorn's sadness. Wearing it for too long may result in frostbite.
A belt containing Erda's sadness. It drains the warmth from your body.
A fragment of Dark Lumari equipment.

key.tooltipDescription: Extreme power can be felt from the fragment
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use, consuming 24 to create the Extreme Weapon Box.

key.tooltipDescription: Raging power can be felt from the fragment
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use, consuming 48 to create the Raging Weapon Box.

key.tooltipDescription: Frantic power can be felt from the fragment
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use, consuming 96 to create the Frantic Weapon Box.

key.tooltipDescription: The fragment radiates with the power of the lord of the underworld.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to combine 16 in create a Pluto's Accessory Box.

key.tooltipDescription: The fragment radiates with the power of the god of war.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to combine 16 to create a Mars's Accessory Box.

key.tooltipDescription: It's an Armor Trader's Ribbon Fragment
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use. Consume 160 to create 20 Armor Trader's Ribbons.

key.tooltipDescription: An ash pile that remained after Zakum the Demon Tree burned.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use, consuming 2,400 Demon Tree Ash Piles and 2,400 Burning Embers to create the Demon Tree Seed.

key.tooltipDescription: The power of life can be felt from this mysterious ember that burns on its own and doesn't burn anything.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to use, consuming 2,400 Burning Embers and 2,400 Demon Tree Ash Piles to create the Demon Tree Seed.

key.tooltipDescription: The fragment radiates with the power of the lord of the underworld.
key.guideDescription: Double-click to combine 300 in create a Pluto's Accessory Box.

key.tooltipDescription: This is the fearsome Pyrros Fard, a dragon created by the dark fairies. The power of fire permeates its very soul.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: This is the fearsome Pyrros Fard, a dragon created by the dark fairies. The power of fire permeates its very soul.
key.guideDescription: Double-click in your inventory or use in a quickslot to get on and off the mount. While mounted, hold the basic attack key and a direction key to perform a special action.

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5'>Madria's Whim</font>\nWhen attacked, something unpredictable might happen. The effect can't be triggered in battlegrounds or arenas.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nEarrings crafted from rare lumarium. The Lumarigons aren't around anymore, so there's no one to restore the metal to its golden sheen after Madria had them coated with black steel.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5'>Madria's Whim</font>\nWhen attacked, something unpredictable might happen. The effect can't be triggered in battlegrounds or arenas.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\n"I hate this stupid cape. It's pointy and it drags behind me everywhere. But... the Black Mage makes me wear it. So annoying!" - Exceprt from Madria's Diary</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>Contract of Suffering<font color='#ff8ae5'>
On hit, has a chance to increase your damage by <font color='#ff8ae5'>10-30%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>12</font> sec. However, your max health will be reduced by the same amount. Will not activate when health is below 10%.

<font color='#ff8ae5'>Wings of Conspiracy</font>
Rarely activates in place of Contract of Suffering. Damage increases by <font color='#ff8ae5'>100%</font> but max health is reduced by <font color='#ff8ae5'>50%</font>. 

Inactive in battlegrounds and arenas.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nAt first, Commander Turka's infiltration into Maple World was subtle. As his influence grew, however, his followers began to wear these pendants to mark themselves as servants of Conspiracy.</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>Contract of Suffering<font color='#ff8ae5'>
On hit, has a chance to increase your damage by <font color='#ff8ae5'>10-30%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>12</font> sec. However, your max health will be reduced by the same amount. Will not activate when health is below 10%.

<font color='#ff8ae5'>Wings of Conspiracy</font>
Rarely activates in place of Contract of Suffering. Damage increases by <font color='#ff8ae5'>100%</font> but max health is reduced by <font color='#ff8ae5'>50%</font>. 

Inactive in battlegrounds and arenas.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nThis seal marks the covenant of master and servant between Turka and his thralls. Those fools who would accept Turka's power all come into a ring marked with this seal.\n"Katvan... This power is yours..." -Turka</font>

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and triggered effects are inactive.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nIn the early days, Winn Stilton had one equal among rogues: Kakind the Shadow Hunter. He slew countless corrupted lumarigons. All the remains of Kakind now is this fabled blade.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and triggered effects are inactive.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nRedat, a knight commander of the lumarigons, always stood as a vanguard against the forces of darkness... until his order was wiped out at the Battle of Kabrium. When he finally reappeared, it was as a villain corrupted by the darkness he once fought.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and triggered effects are inactive.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nScepters like this one are used in dark rituals to raise lumarigons as undead thralls.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and triggered effects are inactive.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nThis weapon is also known as the Reaper's Blade. Most assassins covet daggers like this as a rare treasure, but it was in fact standard issue for the lumarigon army. The technology that allowed such a powerful item to be mass produced is now long lost.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and triggered effects are inactive.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nThe blade of this greatsword is made from filed-down lumarigon fangs. Even after all these years, the sword carries the curse of its former owners, and it turns its dark power against any who would dare wield it.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and triggered effects are inactive.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nThe core of this bow is made from the wing of Godmother Lucaracia, reinforced with ravensteel. It is said that the forces of darkness captured Lucaracia and made this weapon while she still drew breath. The mere sight of it threw the lumarigons into a rage.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and triggered effects are inactive.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\n"A true mage matches strength of mind with strength of body." The unconventional archmage, Hines Gertolf Dajerius, demonstrated this philosophy during the war on darkness. Impressed, the lumarigons gifted him this combination staff/halberd. Unfortunately, he had to turn it down, as it "looked too scary" for the great mage.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and triggered effects are inactive.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nEven after becoming corrupted, the lumarigons were unrivaled craftsdragons. The forces of light captured one of these weapons, but years of attempted reverse engineering have revealed nothing of its inner workings.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and triggered effects are inactive.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nThere was a school of swordsman who considered themselves among the lumarigons' closest allies. When the lumarigons were corrupted, these swordsmen took it upon themselves to end their friends' suffering. To accomplish this terrible task, they forged this blade. Today, these swordsmen are known as Terrun Calibre.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and triggered effects are inactive.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\n"The modern soldier takes up the gun and the cannon, while the romantic warrior clings foolishly to the sword. But the fallen dragons knew a secret. The true champion... fights with her fists." - Excerpt from the Records of a Corrupted King</font>

key.tooltipDescription: <font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and triggered effects are inactive.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nCountless lumarigons and humans were sacrificed to forge this. If you listen closely, you can hear whispers promising unlimited power. Other than that, it's an ordinary orb.</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>Shadow-touched</font>
Weapon attack is decreased by <font color='#ff8ae5'>90%</font>, but bonus attack is increased by <font color='#ff8ae5'>4120</font>.

<font color='#ff8ae5'>Light-touched</font>
Use a Lumenstone Shard to increase attack speed and all damage by <font color='#ff8ae5'>20%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> sec. Switches from shadow-touched to light-touched status for <font color='#ff8ae5'>30</font> min. While light-touched, successful attacks reduce the target's defense by <font color='#ff8ae5'>1%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>1</font> sec.

In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and item abilities are inactive. You must have one in both hands to gain the bonus attack increase and defense reduction effects.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nIn the early days, Winn Stilton had one equal among rogues: Kakind the Shadow Hunter. He slew countless corrupted lumarigons. All the remains of Kakind now is this fabled blade.</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>Shadow-touched</font>
Weapon attack is decreased by <font color='#ff8ae5'>90%</font>, but bonus attack is increased by <font color='#ff8ae5'>4120</font>.

<font color='#ff8ae5'>Light-touched
</font>Use a Lumenstone Shard to increase attack speed and all damage by <font color='#ff8ae5'>20%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> sec. Switches from shadow-touched to light-touched status for <font color='#ff8ae5'>30</font> min. While light-touched, successful attacks reduce the target's defense by <font color='#ff8ae5'>1%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>1</font> sec.

In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and item abilities are inactive. You must have one in both hands to gain the bonus attack increase and defense reduction effects.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\n"A true mage matches strength of mind with strength of body." The unconventional archmage, Hines Gertolf Dajerius, demonstrated this philosophy during the war on darkness. Impressed, the lumarigons gifted him this combination staff/halberd. Unfortunately, he had to turn it down, as it "looked too scary" for the great mage.</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>Shadow-touched</font>
Weapon attack is decreased by <font color='#ff8ae5'>90%</font>, but bonus attack is increased by <font color='#ff8ae5'>4120</font>.

<font color='#ff8ae5'>Light-touched
</font>Use a Lumenstone Shard to increase attack speed and all damage by <font color='#ff8ae5'>20%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> sec. Switches from shadow-touched to light-touched status for <font color='#ff8ae5'>30</font> min. While light-touched, successful attacks reduce the target's defense by <font color='#ff8ae5'>1%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>1</font> sec.

In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and item abilities are inactive. You must have one in both hands to gain the bonus attack increase and defense reduction effects.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nEven after becoming corrupted, the lumarigons were unrivaled craftsdragons. The forces of light captured one of these weapons, but years of attempted reverse engineering have revealed nothing of its inner workings.</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>Shadow-touched</font>
Weapon attack is decreased by <font color='#ff8ae5'>90%</font>, but bonus attack is increased by <font color='#ff8ae5'>4120</font>.

<font color='#ff8ae5'>Light-touched
</font>Use a Lumenstone Shard to increase attack speed and all damage by <font color='#ff8ae5'>20%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> sec. Switches from shadow-touched to light-touched status for <font color='#ff8ae5'>30</font> min. While light-touched, successful attacks reduce the target's defense by <font color='#ff8ae5'>1%</font> for <font color='#ff8ae5'>1</font> sec.

In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and item abilities are inactive. You must have one in both hands to gain the bonus attack increase and defense reduction effects.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nThere was a school of swordsman who considered themselves among the lumarigons' closest allies. When the lumarigons were corrupted, these swordsmen took it upon themselves to end their friends' suffering. To accomplish this terrible task, they forged this blade. Today, these swordsmen are known as Terrun Calibre.</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>Shadow-touched</font>

In battlegrounds and arenas, bonus damage reduced by half, and item abilities are inactive. You must have one in both hands to gain the bonus attack increase and defense reduction effects.
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\n"The modern soldier takes up the gun and the cannon, while the romantic warrior clings foolishly to the sword. But the fallen dragons knew a secret. The true champion... fights with her fists." - Excerpt from the Records of a Corrupted King</font>

key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nCountless lumarigons and humans were sacrificed to forge this. If you listen closely, you can hear whispers promising unlimited power. Other than that, it's an ordinary orb.</font>

key.tooltipDescription: Reverse gear is touched by the dark energies which warped reality when the Black Mage's seal on the Land of Darkness broke. key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>This item once belonged to an ancient warrior tribe that entered the Land of Darkness in search of conquest and glory during the War of Light and Darkness. It is made of expertly crafted steel, and imbued with life energy by shamans of old. Although the warriors fell in battle, their equipment has lived on to protect generations of warriors.</font>

\n<font color='#7A7A7A'>An expertly crafted piece of armor that once belonged to Athanasia, the legendary Dragon Hunter. Athanasia is said to have specially crafted a suit of armor for each dragon she would face, and their craftsmanship was without peer. The armors remained unscratched, despite having taken blows from some of the fiercest dragons to ever roam the land. Athanasia guaranteed her armor for the lifespan of its wearer, though this claim was never put to the test, as the whole lot of them vanished mysteriously long ago.</font>

Athanasia is said to have specially crafted a suit of armor for each dragon she would face, and their craftsmanship was without peer. The armors remained unscratched, despite having taken blows from some of the fiercest dragons to ever roam the land. Athanasia guaranteed her armor for the lifespan of its wearer, though this claim was never put to the test, as the whole lot of them vanished mysteriously long ago.</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5'>Flame Orb</font>
Chance to accumulate a flame orb on hit. Each orb increases physical attack by <font color='#ff8ae5'>3</font>.

<font color='#ff8ae5'>Meteor</font>
At <font color='#ff8ae5'>5</font> flame orbs, a blazing meteor crashes down, dealing <font color='#ff8ae5'>129%</font> damage <font color='#ff8ae5'>3</font> times to <font color='#ff8ae5'>5</font> enemies. All orbs are consumed when Meteor triggers.

Inactive in battlegrounds and arenas.</font>

It was forged for personal use by Athanasia, a legendary dragon hunter famous for mastering over 13 types of weapons. Nearly all the weapons she had crafted mysteriously vanished long ago.</font>

Triggers when there is 1 enemy target within a 10Â m radius.

key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nAn exclusive combat gear of the Crimson Balrogs, the most elite soldiers of the Balrog species. Their gear is different from the regular soldiers as the Ancient Balrog's hellfire polishing technique was used to create it. Many years have passed but it's still sturdy and powerful. Although it was created using a forgotten technique and can't be repaired using modern technique, this gear will never break until there are no more wars on this world.</font>

Although it was created using a forgotten technique and can't be repaired using modern technique, this gear will never break until there are no more wars on this world.</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>[Crimson Mark]
Triggers when there is 1 enemy target within a 10Â m radius.

Inactive in battlegrounds and arenas.</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>[Vitality]
Increases stamina recovery speed by 10%. Increases bonus attack by 250 if stamina is full.

Inactive in battlegrounds and arenas.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nInfernog's energy settled strongly in this combat gear. Research was conducted from many sides to enhance the gear by utilizing the collected energy from Infernog, and this item had a magical result by transplanting Infernog's hellfire into the gear. It's a known fact that this gear has exceptional performance compared to other regular gear due to that, but the Luminknights were against the supplying of this gear since the hellfire of an ancient demon was used as is. "Although we are hanging by a rope, there are certain things that we can and cannot use. Remain content for just this one time that this gear was made." Temple Knight Mason</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>[Dark Flame Power]
Chance to consume health instead of spirit for 7 sec on hit to use skills. The decreasing health is proportional to the amount of spirit used.

Inactive in battlegrounds and arenas.</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>[Reception Bandwidth Enhancement]
When each faction's flare is used on the Orbis-class aircraft carrier, you can receive each faction's support effects for 15 min.

Â· Lumiknights: increases health by 2000
Â· Dark Wind: increases evasion by 50
Â· Tria Guard: increases accuracy by 12
Â· Green Hood: restores 150 health every sec
Â· Maple Alliance: increases bonus attack by 220

The effects are removed when you leave the area where it was used.</font>
key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nThis gear is a protective item grafted with the [Anti-magic Coating: Bright Star] technique. It's the result of the Sky Fortress Magic Engineering Division's Member Protection Project. This technique was created to protect the user from a dangerous natural mana environment or a magical region with significant dangers. In contrast to the hostile environment suit that is massive and dulls one's movements, a simple magic particle coating is applied on the combat gear that provides similar or equal effects. Gear with this technique applied are designated as weapons to be used against Infernog and supplied to members.</font>

This technique was created to protect the user from a dangerous natural mana environment or a magical region with significant dangers. In contrast to the hostile environment suit that is massive and dulls one's movements, a simple magic particle coating is applied on the combat gear that provides similar or equal effects. Gear with this technique applied are designated as weapons to be used against Infernog and supplied to members.</font>

key.tooltipDescription:
<font color='#ff8ae5' size='14'>[Reception Bandwidth Enhancement]
When each faction's flare is used on the Orbis-class aircraft carrier, you can receive each faction's support effects for 15 min.

Â· Lumiknights: increases health by 2000
Â· Dark Wind: increases evasion by 50
Â· Tria Guard: increases accuracy by 12
Â· Green Hood: restores 150 health every sec
Â· Maple Alliance: increases bonus attack by 220

The effects are removed when you leave the area where it was used.</font>

key.guideDescription: <font color='#7A7A7A'>\nThis gear is a protective item grafted with the [Anti-magic Coating: Bright Star] technique. It's the result of the Sky Fortress Magic Engineering Division's Member Protection Project. This technique was created to protect the user from a dangerous natural mana environment or a magical region with significant dangers. In contrast to the hostile environment suit that is massive and dulls one's movements, a simple magic particle coating is applied on the combat gear that provides similar or equal effects. Gear with this technique applied are designated as weapons to be used against Infernog and supplied to members.</font>
